But a sudden visit from Rei's friend, who harbors an interest in Mira's illness, may be the end of their peaceful days…

Genres: Boys' Love
Title: Dekisokonai no Love Song
Description: A dramatic rock-band story about a younger, assertive guitarist and a stubborn, beautiful singer! Kazari's the popular singer in a band, but he has a secret he can't tell a single soul. After a concert, Kei, the bassist and Kazari's step-brother, introduces a new member, Kotaro, who's a guitarist. From the moment Kotaro sees Kazari, he tries everything he can to close the gap between them. Kazari, though annoyed, decides to somewhat go along with it. One day, Kotaro sees a wistful expression on the usually aloof singer's face and encourages him to open up. The gap slowly closes, as Kazari pours his heart out...

Genres: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Aekanaru
Description: Sadai, looking for a place to die, headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years, continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura — from the remains of their wasted lives, the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
Title: Whisper Me a Love Song
Description: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…

Genres: Traditional Games, Psychological, Mafia, Drama
Title: Akagi: The Genius Who Fell Into Darkness
Description: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."

Genres: Historical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: My Gemini
Description: Who died at that time... Which one? John is red-haired and freckled. His only pride is that he is a close friend of the school's popular twins, Jekyll and Hyde. The twins always pretended to be each other, but suddenly one of the twins died. Who was left... Which one!?

Genres: Demons, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Totsukuni no Shoujo - Siúil, a Rún
Description: *It is a tale full of sorrow. From now let's recite a slow and beautiful story from long ago.* Shiva, a young girl who loves to stroll about in the countryside, lives in an otherwise deserted village with her guardian, a wendigo-like gentleman known only as “Teacher.” He forbids her from going outside, so she won't be cursed, but Shiva's curiosity makes her yearn for more. What is really behind the mystery of the curse from the Outside? --- In a world split between the Inside and the Outside, those living in both realms are told never to cross over to the other side, lest they be cursed. A young girl named Shiva lives on the other side, in a vacant village with a demonic guardian known only as "Teacher." Although the two are forbidden to touch, they seem to share a bond that transcends their disparate appearances. But when Shiva leaves Teacher’s care to seek out her grandmother, the secret behind her mysterious living arrangement comes to light.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
Title: Mikadono Sanshimai wa Angai, Choroi.
Description: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!

Genres: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~
Description: Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever. Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?

Genres: Comedy, Magic, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Kuro Mahou Ryou no San Akunin
Description: By the Reiwa era, delinquents have been completely eliminated even from schools of magic...or so everyone thought. Even the "Black Magic Dormitory", formerly a wild and out of control place where the dark magic ne'er-do-wells gathered, is now on the verge of being demolished due to no new students having been placed into it for ages. The dorm's poor environment, residents receiving scorn and distain from teachers, and resulting low prospects of employment after graduation made the dorm's popularity sharply drop starting with Gen Z...until this year, when three female students are placed into it! So each of them makes an oath to themselves that they'll escape from the dorm, no matter what happens to the other two! However, those girls do not yet know the dreadful prophecy, which will affect the entire magical world, that is descending upon them. (Source: Shogakukan)

Genres: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: D.Gray-man
Description: Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence." After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Momogusa-san ga Momogusa Sugiru!!
Description: A romantic comedy about a cute housekeeper who takes care of Momokusa-san in various ways ♡ Shoji Hatakeki, an ordinary high school boy, ends up working part-time as a housekeeper at the house of Momokusa, the most beautiful girl in school!! Momogusa-san is a perfect girl who is talented and talented in both literary and military arts, but at home she becomes a super lazy "Momogusa-san"!? For some reason, Hatakeki has grown fond of her, and ends up taking care of Momokusa, who is unsuspectingly pampered at close range...!? A romantic comedy about flirtatious housework with a lazy girl!!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?
Description: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life
Title: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru
Description: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking, Music
Title: Me & Roboco
Description: The year is 20XX… A time when every household owns cute maid robots known as OrderMaids. Average grade-schooler Bondo dreams of having his very own robot. But what he got was… Unable to compute!!! Life is gonna get a whole lot weirder when Roboco, the most powerful clumsy maid ever created, shows up at his door!

Genres: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Banana Fish
Description: Nature made Ash Lynx beautiful; nurture made him a cold ruthless killer. A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of "Papa" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…

Genres: Award Winning, Historical, Psychological, Drama, Mystery
Title: Chi.: Chikyuu no Undou ni Tsuite
Description: The setting is 15th century Poland. It was a time when heretical ideas lead those to who possessed such a mindset to being burned at the stake for their beliefs. Rafal, a child prodigy, is expected to major in theology, the most important subject at the time, at the university. One day, however, he comes across a mysterious man, and is now studying a possible "truth" in the midst of heretical thought!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Sakamoto Days
Description: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!

Genres: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: To Your Eternity
Description: An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra. The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever? --- - **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** --- **Links:** **Officially Translated:** - Alternative English version by [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>) - Alternative English version by [Inkr Comics](<https://inkr.page.link/Hmgv5BX51rftn9ar5>) - In French by [Pika](<https://www.pika.fr/serie/your-eternity>) - In Italian by [Star Comics](<https://www.starcomics.com/fumetto.aspx?Fumetto=281315>) - In Polish by [Kotori](<http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/ku-twej-wiecznosci/>) - In Russian by [Istari](<https://istaricomics.com/katalog-knig/manga/istari-comics/to-your-eternity/>) - In German by [Egmont](<https://www.egmont-shop.de/to-your-eternity-01.html>) - In Indonesian by [m&c!](<http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01>) as **Untukmu yang Abadi** (2019) - In Brazilian Portuguese by [NewPOP](<https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289>)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life
Title: Yume to Koi dewa Tsuriawanai
Description: Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.

Genres: Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy
Title: Muryoku Seijo to Munou Oujo ~Maryoku Zero de Shoukansareta Seijo no Isekai Kyuukokuki~
Description: One day, listless part-timer Tamura Nana was summoned out of her room and into another world, after which her summoners declared her a saint and asked her to save their world. However, though she was hailed as a saint, it turned out that Nana possessed no magical power at all! To make matters worse, she was chosen as a partner by a princess who can't use magic...

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru
Description: Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game? ___ The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Emiya-san Chi no Kyou no Gohan
Description: "Fulfilling meal…a familiar view.” In this story, Fate and food meet in a delicious and gentle world. It’s nothing but an ordinary meal scene… Delicious meals are served at the Emiya’s dinner table every day, through spring, summer, fall and winter. – Let's see… what's for dinner today?

Genres: Thriller, Action
Title: Daiakutou Shounen
Description: The manga's story teases of a boy who thinks everything in the world is worthless: the heroes who pretend to fight with grace, his classmates who only know how to flock together, and his own weak, miserable self. That is why the boy aspires to be the lonely, solitary, and ultimate villain, to change himself and the world.

Genres: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama
Title: Giant Killing
Description: A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! --- Official Release: - English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing) - Indonesian release by Level Comics --- - In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life
Title: Honey Lemon Soda
Description: Fifteen-year old Ishimori Uka is a very shy girl that can't stand being in front of someone. One day she meets a boy on the streets who's just as refreshing as lemon soda. He helped her when she was bullied and that boy made her wanting to change so she can properly express herself. --- **Link:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Ribon](http://ribon.shueisha.co.jp/rensai/honeylemon/)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Oshitai shite Orimasu.
Description: On the day of a matchmaking interview between distinguished families... Riko wanted to call it off because she's in love with her Oshi, while her counterpart Taiyou was also aiming to call it off because of his fear of women! However, they're both able to value what the other "loves" and come to an understanding, so they decide to pretend to be dating in order to deceive their parents!? This is the start of your new favorite Handcraft Boy x Yumejoshi Girl Fake Love Lifestyle♪

Genres: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural
Title: Sewayaki Kitsune no Senko-san
Description: Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin. Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul. --- **Notes:** - Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life
Title: Sensei to Seito wa, Ai wo Shiranai.
Description: “The person I loved the most in the world turned out not to love me at all. I had no choice but to hate that person.” This is a story about two people who don't know how to love and gradually become attracted to each other.

Genres: Crime, Drama
Title: Favela no Mangaka
Description: Japanese comic artist Takei Hiroto, who was rejected once again at a serialization meeting, decided to give up on his dream and go on a heartbroken trip to Brazil to get over everything. In a favela (slum) he accidentally wandered into, Hiroto meets a poor boy with sharp eyes named João. Living on the exact opposite side of the Earth, João surprisingly has a dream of becoming a mangaka (Japanese comic artist)…!! No matter who you are or where you live, you don’t have to give up. The story of two slum mangakas chasing their dreams begins!!

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Bakuon Rettou
Description: In the 80s, Kaze Takashi's parents moved to a quiet area in Tokyo to protect their son from the bad influence of his friends. In class, Takashi doesn't wait to make new friends. Passionate for motorcycle rallies, they invite Takashi to join the next event. It became a revelation for the young man and he decides to join a biker gang! Now all that's left is to find a motorbike…

Genres: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Philosophical, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Fool Night
Description: In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants? ___ [Alt Official English (Shougakukan Asia)](https://shogakukan.asia/fool-night/)

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Onna no Sono no Hoshi
Description: The story starts when Kagawa, a student, delivers the class journal to Hoshi-sensei. As the students play word chain game "Shiritori" in the form of drawings in the remarks column of the journal, Hoshi-sensei becomes troubled... --- - **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award for Manga in 2022**

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Military, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Zannen Jokanbu Black General-san
Description: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Sket Dance
Description: The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard! - Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga. --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015) **Links:** - [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_) - [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)

Genres: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Koori Zokusei Danshi to Cool na Douryou Joshi
Description: A cute fluffy romance about the decendant of a yuki-onna who freezes the surrounding area every time he talks to his cute coworker. x.5 chapters are longer than normal chapters and have more fluffy content, make sure to read them! --- Himuro is a living descendant of the Snow Woman from Japanese folklore. But anytime he's around his eccentric yet kind colleague, Fuyutsuki-san, he totally freezes up! Despite the snowstorm of love that rages on in his heart, and her complete cluelessness, will he take a step forward or stay frozen in place? --- **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [Penguin Random House](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/series/FQP/the-ice-guy-and-the-cool-girl/)

Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Saint Seiya: Rerise of Poseidon
Description: The sanctuary is exhausted after the battle against the Lord of Darkness Hades. In the absence of Seiya and the others, the land was about to meet its end in the wrath of the goddess Nemesis! At that moment, the Emperor of the Sea Poseidon awakens to Hades' call and, together with the Seven Marina Generals challenges Nemesis and their Heroic Souls who serve her in battle!

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Touch
Description: Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...! --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008) --- - **Won the 28th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life
Title: Toru ni Taranai
Description: Two university students struggling with money get inspired after watching a couple earn big money through adult content streaming. Despite not being in a relationship, they end up caught in the flow of making videos.

Genres: Animals, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu
Description: Minato Seno’s high school life had just begun when his homeroom teacher requested his help with Nekozane, the cat-like chronic napper who sits next to him in class. Timid and socially anxious, Minato has never talked to her or even seen her face. But when he finally musters up the courage to wake Nekozane, she unexpectedly hugs him on the spot! Thus begins a sweet tale of two teens awkwardly stumbling into a new friendship, unaware that their feelings are slowly turning into something more! (Source: Manga UP! Global)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
Description: "И на меня тоже обрати внимание..." Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!

Genres: Historical, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Snow White with the Red Hair
Description: Shirayuki, a young girl born with unique apple-red hair, happens to meet a famous but foolish young man, Prince Raji. He falls in love with Shirayuki at first sight, and orders her to become his concubine. Determined to do whatever it takes to resist his advances, but with nowhere else to go, Shirayuki cuts her hair and escapes to a neighboring country. While traversing through the forests, she meets an injured boy, Zen. After she boldly heals his wounds, he in return helps her. Meanwhile, Prince Raji sends out his henchmen to search for her. What will become of Shirayuki? What is Zen’s true character? A refreshing fantasy story between an optimistic heroine and a prince who constantly stays on her watch. **Extra stories:** v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (Four-season Colour of August) v02 - Bokura o Tsunaide. (Bind Us) v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 Day of Summer Holiday)

Genres: School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music
Title: Gakuen Idolm@ster: Gold Rush
Description: The story of girls who attend a school where dreams come true!

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Tensei Akuma no Saikyou Yuusha Ikusei Keikaku
Description: Kakyu, a former Japanese who was reincarnated as a low-level devil in hell, has acquired unparalleled strength over two thousand years. However, unexpectedly, he is exiled to another “different world,” liberated from the harsh underworld. Kakyu, who was enjoying his dream slow life, witnesses the village he owes everything to being attacked. Despite rushing to the scene, the village is annihilated. Picking up the only surviving baby, Alus, Kakyu resolves to raise Alus to become the happiest person in the world to repay the debt…!?

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life
Title: From Bureaucrat to Villainess: Dad's Been Reincarnated!
Description: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks… ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/48434) **Official English:** [emaqi](https://emaqi.com/manga/from-bureaucrat-to-villainess-dad-s-been-reincarnated) - United States & Canada only!

Genres: Award Winning, Time Travel, Genderswap, Traditional Games, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Shut Hell
Description: Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future… Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield... Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ? - **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Tonikaku Kawaii
Description: Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but… Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.

Genres: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!
Description: Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Gachiakuta
Description: A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear. ___ Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder. One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash. When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss. ___ **Additional Links:** - Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Office Workers, Isekai, Villainess, Slice of Life
Title: Oji Tensei – Akuyaku Reijou no Kareinaru Seikatsu
Description: The infamous villainess, Chloe Demantoid, vanished at the execution grounds. On the brink of death, Chloe swore to live a righteous life if she were to be reborn. She was reincarnated into modern-day Japan as a middle-aged man with a body reeking of age, named Masamichi Kuroe...!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: The Witch and the Mercenary
Description: Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. "I want you to protect me," she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent! ___ [Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)

Genres: Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: YuruYuri
Description: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!

Genres: Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Meshinuma
Description: Iinuma, a somewhat dull salaryman, eats food as his craving drives him! This is an appetite-stimulating gourmet manga where you can just watch him eating his food!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life
Title: Countach
Description: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

Genres: Time Travel, Romance, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: 7th Time Loop: The Villainess Enjoys a Carefree Life Married to Her Worst Enemy!
Description: Rishe, the daughter of a duke, is stuck in a time loop that begins at the moment her engagement is annulled and ends with her early demise at the age of 20. She has now begun her seventh loop. In her past do-overs, Rishe experienced various occupations, including being a merchant, a pharmacist, and a knight. But this time around, she simply wishes to live a long and leisurely life! That *was* the plan, only for it to be derailed by an unprecedented marriage proposal from her killer in the previous loop, the neighbouring country's Crown Prince—?! --- - [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1784ga/)

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Tanaka-kun wa Itsumo Kedaruge
Description: Sighing, leaning on his elbows, sleepy eyes. Tanaka-kun is a boy that basically doesn't try but isn't disliked. This is a laid-back youth comedy about Tanaka-kun and the quiet Oota who can't leave him alone.

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Akebi-chan no Sailor Fuku
Description: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!

Genres: Romance, Supernatural
Title: Komen Fuufu
Description: In a world where the supernatural blends in with regular life, there is an old Japanese house. Living there is a newlywed couple, a human man and a kitsune woman. What can disturb their happy life together… except for a man-eating sparrow? The daily life between human and youkai is dangerous by day, but sweet by night!?

Genres: Monsters, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: This Monster Wants to Eat Me
Description: High school girl Hinako is living a quiet life in a seaside town, but she feels somewhat detached from her friends during the summer months when she is reminded of when her family died years ago. One day, she meets Shiori, a mysterious girl who reminds her of the ocean, especially when it comes to her translucent blue eyes, but Shiori soon reveals that she is actually a mermaid who has been looking for Hinako for a long time.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Imaizumi Brings All the Gals to His House
Description: Imaizumi is a high school boy who lives alone in his apartment for a reason. He has a secret that he can't tell to anyone. And the secret is that he lives with the top three Gyarus (gals) of his school, Hamasaki, Kurumizaka, and Sasaki. He spends his day playing, talking and getting physical with these Gyarus, all of whom have a quirk or two. Imaizumi-kun is getting more and more addicted to his lazy, naughty and free "youth"...?

Genres: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: School Back
Description: Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will! This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.

Genres: Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Wicked Spot
Description: Sada is a modern-day witch who is tired of living quietly deep in the mountains. In fact, she wants more attention! Why can't witches be known by humans?! This is a story of modern “witches” who break the curse and live freely and uninhibitedly!

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Koi yori Aoku
Description: Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls? ------------ Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Urasekai Picnic
Description: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking, Mystery
Title: Cooking Papa
Description: Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He’s also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox… It’s time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills! (from Manga Helpers): Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it. His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother. With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story. --- - **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**

Genres: Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: White Tiger and Black Tiger
Description: White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp. It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).

Genres: Historical, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Arte
Description: Firenze, early 16th century. The birthplace of the Renaissance era, where art is thriving. In one small corner of this vast city, one sheltered girl's journey begins. She dreams of becoming an artist, an impossible career for a girl born into a noble family. In those days, art was an exclusively male profession, with woman facing strong discrimination. In spite of these challenges, Arte perseveres with hard work and a positive attitude!

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
Title: The Anemone Feels the Heat
Description: Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool, who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: The Tsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsundere Girl Getting Less and Less Tsun Day by Day
Description: The tsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsundere girl getting less and less tsun day by day.

Genres: Monsters, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires
Title: Mamono no Hanayome
Description: Sumioka Hana has lived on her job without making her lover. One day when her overwork peaked, she fell off the platform of the station. When she noticed, she was transferred to the world of fairy tales she read when she was young. Hana, who was injured by herself, is saved by Flora, the main character of her picture book. She was, however, caught by her brother Nicholas, and she was sacrificed to a human-eating monster. When I thought she was sucked by a man who was a vampire, she suddenly got hot in her body ...?

Genres: Action, Martial Arts, Gore, Delinquents
Title: Isshou Senkin
Description: "Yup! Just as slow as I thought." After retiring from public fighting and getting fired from underground fighting, 27 year old Tenma Nozomi's zest for life is gradually dwindling away. It's hard to be at the bottom with nowhere to go, and that's exactly where she and her two friends are. However, Nozomi hits upon an idea that may just solve all of their problems: they could make their own underground fighting circuit for women, and tap into an underexplored market. As good as that sounds, her insistence on including the unknown quantity Hongou Hina may prove to be more than she bargained for...

Genres: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Police, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Tokyo Ghoul
Description: Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as "ghouls," who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki, an unsuspecting university freshman, finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh. [Written by MAL Rewrite]

Genres: Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Izakaya "Nobu"
Description: Imagine there is a bar with many weird kind of food and drink that might bring you to another world! The bar, so-called "Nobu" is located in a alley of the old city Aiteria. At the very first step, diners feels like falling into another completely country, with cold, super cool beer, so-called "Toriaezu Nama"! (from: MU) Adapted from [web novel (raw)](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n9773bj/) / light novel of same name. [See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20594) - [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%95%B0%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%B1%85%E9%85%92%E5%B1%8B%E3%80%8C%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B6%E3%80%8D)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Yume de Furarete Hajimaru Yuri
Description: For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream. The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now! [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)

Genres: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Youkai Gakkou no Sensei Hajimemashita!
Description: Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms, but he also wants to be a good teacher. However, his new school isn’t exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters, demons, ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!

Genres: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Gaman Shinaide, Hades-sama. ~Reikoku na Meiou no Jun'ai wa Michishirenai hodo Fukakude, Omoi~
Description: "I … ..can't live without you." A handsome man slides his moist fingers over the smooth skin of a young girl. His eyes are warm and his delicacy is such that you will believe he’s in love. The world divided between the "World of the Gods", the "Other World", and the "Earthly World", was filled with chaos. In the realm of the gods, the gods enjoyed eternal life. The goddess Persephone works hard every day to care for the plants so that her life will sprout on the earth, but the shoots she raised withered. She will be taken over by Hades, the master of the underworld, who has come to welcome "death". Persephone laments her grief, but she is moved by Hades' encouragement, and is drawn to his quiet, calm and gentle side... Meanwhile, Persephone decides to offer her own body to save Hades, who has been caught up in the conspiracy of the divine world.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Pseudo Harem
Description: The story of Nanakura Rin of the Drama Club, who has indisputable talent as an actress, and her senpai in the same club, Kitahama Eiji. With the power of her acting, Rin teases Eiji with a variety of personas, giving him the harem he's always dreamed of!

Genres: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Ryuroden
Description: Middle schoolers, Shiro and Masumi, encountered a mysterious dragon that brought them back to the time of the Three Kingdoms; situated in ancient China. As soon as they arrived, they were rescued by the Han Kingdom. Not long after these events, Masumi was kidnapped and Shiro barely escaped death… Soon the story gets more complicated as they are stuck in the past. In 1997, Ryuurouden won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen manga.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Hanninmae no Koibito
Description: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Survival, Magic, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Centuria
Description: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Iken Senki Völundio
Description: On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern! Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!

Genres: Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
Title: Whispering You a Love Song "Official Comic Anthology
Description: The first official "Sasayaku You ni Koi o Utau'" comic anthology is here! Talented authors with unique styles tell stories that begin with a crush at first sight. [Participating Authors] COVER: Aono Nachi. ILLUSTRATIONS: Yosuke Kaneda, Miman. COMICS: Aotsubaki Toto, Aono Shimo, Ito Hachi, Inui, Utatane Yuu, Sikusiku, Torii Shizuku, Nekotarou, Haruhana Aya, Mukunoki Nanatsu, Yuama, Yukiko.

Genres: Historical, Ghosts, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: The Holy Grail of Eris
Description: Constance, the daughter to a Viscount whose only value is her honesty, and Scarlet Castiel, the most reviled villainess of the era who was sentenced to death ten years ago. When the two people who were never supposed to meet encountered one another at a night party, the story that should have ended with Scarlet's death began anew. Although their relationship only began out of mutual interest, they soon became true partners in an effort to unravel the mysteries of a grand conspiracy borne out of the past, that still has a vicious grip on the present.

Genres: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Rikon Shinai Otoko CASE２
Description: Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected. Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!! (Source: Comic-Days)

Genres: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」
Description: After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice. Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library. However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants. Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace! A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins! ___ **Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

Genres: Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Sachiroku 〜Sachi’s Book of Revelation〜
Description: ‘Humanity’s Judgment’ — a process by which an angel and a demon meticulously pass judgment upon a human, and the final score determines the fate of mankind. But this time, the chosen subject is the incredibly mischievous 6-year-old elementary school student, Sachi Ueno?! Just how will the unconventional living arrangement of an angel, a demon, and a human shape the future of humanity?

Genres: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto ~Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou~
Description: In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the female apothecary from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young apothecary will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!? ---

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.
Description: Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules! Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries! Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?! ___ [Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Fukigen na Mononokean
Description: Ashiya has spent his first seven days of high school stuck in the infirmary because of a youkai attaching itself to him. He ends up asking the owner of a small tea room called the 'Mononokean' for help. This is a tale involving the very morose owner of the Mononokean guiding mononoke that happened to wander into this world go to the next world.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life
Title: Red Blue
Description: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Delinquents
Title: Worst Gaiden Mr. Zetton
Description: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!

Genres: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Drama, Mystery
Title: The Ravages of Time
Description: Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal. Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

Genres: Action, Romance, Superhero, Mystery
Title: GOLDEN MAN
Description: The city of freedom, Neo York, is targeted by villains day and night, but it's also home to the strongest hero, Golden Man!!! But one night, during a rescue operation at a fire at an abandoned factory, Golden Man suddenly disappears. Left in his place, a single amnesiac young man with the Golden Man suit in his hands... Who on Earth is he? ___ - **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550668106005965940) - [Official X](https://x.com/goldenman_comic)

Genres: Animals, Slice of Life
Title: Good Morning Leon
Description: Jack (Siamese cat) — the cat who never fails to look after his owner so that the latter can be a good fella, a fella who will not be an embarrassment. So what if Jack causes a ton of trouble for his owner, Leon? Can’t blame the dashing, handsome cat who performs his duty with all stoic elegance. Presenting to you, the story of Leon, the Gentleman, and Jack, the Dashing Cat, who live together in the grace and elegance of England.

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi o Hajimemashita
Description: When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill – Taming – and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start – at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name. And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame. - [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Do It Yourself!!
Description: Building furniture and friendships have a lot in common. Intention, effort, and hard work are needed for both crafts. This is a story of girls in a DIY club building both as they carve out their futures. None of it comes easy, but that doesn’t stop any of ’em. Furniture, friendships, and the future—they’re building it all with their own hands!

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Sachiiro no One Room
Description: One day, a fourteen year-old girl was kidnapped… or so the police have been lead to believe. Actually, she tried to run away from her abusive parents and was helped by her stalker who then shelters her in his apartment. Although he considers his actions as kidnapping, the girl is happy about the situation and proposes to him, with the condition that if they are caught, they will commit suicide. --- One day, a girl was kidnapped. However, that girl started to desire a life living with her captor, and swears that she will marry him. In return, her captor provides her with happiness that she had always longed for. How could a story between a girl and her captor be so heart warming?

Genres: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: JIN
Description: After a strange encounter with a mysterious carcinogenic fetus he found inside a patient’s skull, brain surgeon Minakata Jin slipped back through time. Equipped with modern medical knowledge, he faces various fatal diseases and injuries. He meets the ordinary people of Edo as well as illustrious figures, as his surgical knife carves out a new history. ___ Notes: - Won the Grand Prize at Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2011. - Author Murakami Motoka fully commissioned an English translation of the manga himself. It can be found on [his Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/motokamurakami), [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D23CB5NS), or [Mangamo](https://www.mangamo.com/manga/jin).

Genres: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
Title: Hotaru no Yomeiri
Description: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Ane no Tomodachi
Description: Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother... or rather, pet? ___ **Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**

Genres: Action, Ghosts, School Life, Horror, Supernatural
Title: Kaya-chan Isn’t Scary
Description: Kaya-chan is an infamous problem child in kindergarten. However, when Chie-sensei is assigned to look after her, she finds out that Kaya has an ability... Presenting to you, the strongest horror action series set in a kindergarten!!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Otome Kaijuu Caramelize
Description: Afflicted by a "mysterious illness," high school first year Kuroe has spent her entire life avoiding socializing with others. However, after coming into contact with Minami Arata, the most popular boy in school, something changes— and Kuroe's true powers are unleashed…

Genres: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de
Description: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

Genres: Reincarnation, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Aku no Kadou wo Ikimashou
Description: Celestine, the villainess, suddenly recalls her memories of her past life when she's at the altar, about to be married off to a Prime Minister twice her age and surrounded by the most awful rumours as a punishment for her misdeeds against the Prince and his lover. She realizes that this is the world of an otome game she played in that previous life, but more importantly than that, she also inherits past life's very specific tastes...

Genres: Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls
Title: Like Blue Like Summer
Description: 《This is a story about the time I spent with that person, which was as quick as a blink of an eye, but which I will never forget.》 Dan was the basketball club's first-year ace and had been drawing attention from the club. However, with the IH approaching, he was injured and needed a month and a half to recover, and now he was in the depths of despair. He tried to attend club activities for the first time in a while, but felt uncomfortable, and just as he was about to leave, he was harassed by some delinquents. Then, Kaito, a third-year student he had never met, suddenly appeared, helped him and asked him to come to the art club after school...!? [Innocent basketball boy x mysterious art club member], an unforgettable summer love begins, a fresh depiction of the youth and struggles of a high school boy.

Genres: Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural
Title: Akuma Nisei
Description: "My mother's body had no heart." The story of a daughter with a deformed blood who is called a "child of the devil" by her relatives.

Genres: Oneshot, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Raden no Roukaku
Description: Chika, a boy who cannot reveal his hobbies and interests to others, gradually becomes attracted to his friend's older sister, Hanako.

Genres: Reincarnation, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Doumo, Zense de Satsuriku no Madougu wo Tsukutteita Shishaku Reijou desu.
Description: The viscount's daughter, Chloe, was the chief magical tools artisan for a country that perished a thousand years ago in her previous life. On the country's orders, she had created many weapons of slaughter. She laments her previous life and decides to, "live a respectable life this time." One day, at her graduation party, her best friend's engagement is broken off because of a lie. Chloe tries to save her best friend by unraveling the truth.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Daigaku Nyuugakuji Kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta.
Description: The three sisters, once clingy and needy as children, have now grown into beautiful young women—and for some reason, they've developed a strong possessive streak! This youth romance-comedy kicks off as they reunite, and the beautiful trio start competing for attention!

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love
Title: Unmei Dakara Akiramete?
Description: Taichi, who moved to Tokyo and dreamed of meeting his "soulmate" on his first day at university, suddenly fails miserably on a dating app! He is saved by a mysterious handsome man when he is in trouble at a hotel, and things are going well... or so he thinks, but they break up just before the two of them get together. While he is feeling frustrated about being toyed with, he meets the "mysterious handsome man" again, now known as Kiryu Chisato, who is actually a senior at the same university as Taichi!? A foolish DK who tends to go out of control and a super cool senior who is good at paying attention, are these mismatched two destined to be together? Or...?

Genres: Boys' Love, Slice of Life
Title: Koi ni Suruniha Ayafuya Sugiru
Description: “Give me just one memory.” Since elementary school, Minami has had feelings for Yudai, his childhood friend. Even after becoming a university student, this remained an important thing that he carried with him without telling anyone. However, Minami finds out that Yudai, who he met for the first time in a while, has a girlfriend and that they are living together. He ends up drinking alcohol out of sadness. At the end of his drunken state, he dreams that Yudai appears in front of him, cries, clings to him, and holds him in his arms. The next morning, when he woke up, there was a handsome stranger next to him...!?

Genres: Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
Title: Lonely Girl ni Hanataba wo
Description: A collection of one-shots written by Kashikaze, including some original content for Can't Defy the Lonely Girl. Included chapters: 1. marking (https://mangadex.org/title/9cb600fb-c1a7-4116-913c-72002f634392/marking) 2. Kekkyoku Sonna Kimi ga Suki (https://mangadex.org/title/7984732d-5912-4a11-b42d-737ed5e6cb4c/kekkyoku-sonna-kimi-ga-suki) 3. Lonely Girl ni Sakaraenai more! (original) 4. Bukiyou na Aijou (original) 5. Shiranai Watashi mo Suki desu ka (https://mangadex.org/title/0a388cd0-6165-44a6-b352-3de5ea2bf5d5/shibuya-gal-yuri-anthology) 6. Watashi no Shiroi Bara (https://mangadex.org/title/38c8c836-3083-456e-8ca1-a3ba53ac352c/canele-soeur-yuri-anthology) 7. Renzu Goshi ni Oni wa Nai (https://mangadex.org/title/e8bdc7b1-3544-4fa6-b5a5-0903851f3722/renzu-goshi-ni-oni-wa-inai) 8. Hanaya no Ano Hito 9. Osake no Aji yori Amai Mono (https://mangadex.org/title/d8ee38bd-8054-4699-9090-2e58b7587bcc/alcohol-yuri-anthology-strong) 10. Osananajimi no Trophy (https://mangadex.org/title/30a46213-85cb-4e93-9f84-740677ddd7f5/jyoshikou-no-ouji-sama-ga-watashi-shika-ganchyuu-ni-nai-rashii-yuri-anthology-comic) 11. Futari de Hitotsu da kara (https://mangadex.org/title/2ba01ee0-5d82-4822-80ce-c7d1a579af01/private-life-is-theirs-alone-celebrity-x-yuri-anthology) 12. HItokoto Love Letter (https://mangadex.org/title/09ad07f8-4038-4ea1-af20-cdf8dff01244/tonari-no-seki-ga-sukina-hito-datta-gakusei-yuri-anthology)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Aliens, Supernatural
Title: Dai Dark
Description: A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World
Description: When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world! (Source: Seven Seas Entertainment) - [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/) - [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Versus
Description: Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear. In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying! ___ **Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71) **Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)

Genres: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kawaii nante Kiitenai!!
Description: Madoka is obsessed with shoujo manga—specifically manga that features younger, innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her father’s restaurant…except he’s rude and standoffish, and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans, he finds that maybe he’s found someone letting his walls down for…! --- Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day, Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome, but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him, but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!

Genres: Ghosts, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural
Title: Kaii-san to Ore
Description: **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/222807) **Notes:** - The Pixiv series does not contain all of the chapters and combines some. Do not follow the chapter numbering on Pixiv. Instead, enable Japanese chapters on MangaDex to see the proper chapter order and links to all of the raw chapters. - This series uses characters the author used in illustrations beforehand.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life
Title: Koisuru (Otome) no Tsukurikata
Description: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: I'm in Love with the Villainess
Description: Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story! Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!

Genres: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Blade of the Immortal
Description: "To end his eternal suffering, he must slay one thousand enemies!" Manji, a ronin warrior of feudal Japan, has been cursed with immortality. To rid himself of this curse and end his life of misery, he must slay one thousand evil men! His quest begins when a young girl seeks his help in taking revenge on her parents' killers… and his quest won't end until the blood of a thousand has spilled! [Official English](https://digital.darkhorse.com/series/373/blade-of-the-immortal) --- - **Won the 1st Japan Media Arts Award Division Excellence Prize** --- AnimeNewsNetwork Links: [Anime](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=9691) [Live-Action Movie](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18861)

Genres: Romance, Drama
Title: Inukai-san wa Kakure Dekiai Joushi
Description: Nagisa, a web editor, has a crush on Inukai, her boss. She is often compared to her sister, who is a famous model, and the quiet and kind Inukai is the only one who looks out for her. One day, Nagisa receives a 'Magic Charm of Love' at a drinking party, and she accidentally presses its button on her way back home in a taxi with Inukai. To her surprise, she hears a song that says "You've been called to fall for the person in front of you" and the very next moment, Inukai kisses her. Nagisa, who has been keeping a lid on her feelings, is unable to stop them from overflowing at the slightest opportunity. The handsome editor-in-chief, and the woman with a courageous crush - it's a sweet love story of two people who are in love with one another.

Genres: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Crime, Superhero, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Magic, Military, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Music
Title: Dr. Slump
Description: When goofy inventor Senbei Norimaki creates a precocious robot named Arale, his masterpiece turns out to be more than he bargained for! --- Official Release: - English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/dr-slump) - Indonesian release by Elex Media (2022) --- - **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen/Shojo in 1982**

Genres: Monsters, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de, Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita
Description: Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct. He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...? A warm and fluffy fantasy featuring the rookie dad Weiss and his cute little elven daughter!

Genres: School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Super Cub
Description: In early summer, 2nd year of high school, Koguma's mom suddenly abandons her, leaving only a note that says "Bye." She is alone, having no parents, no friends, no hobbies. She silently reflects, "I don't have anything." But a chance encounter results in her buying a Honda Super Cub with a disturbing history, and a new life suddenly blossoms open. Based on the [light novel series with the same name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_Cub_(novel_series)).

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Komi-san wa Komyushou Desu.
Description: Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others. Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Gyaru
Title: 7-Kakan Gentei Kanojo
Description: A yuri romantic comedy centered on a temporary relationship between a gal and an honor student. The story begins when Manatsu, a gal who is on the verge of repeating a grade, starts receiving tutoring from Sumie, an honor student. Manatsu loves shoujo manga and romantic gossip but has the vague that having a boyfriend somehow doesn't fit her. When she casually brings this up, Sumie suggests, "Why not try starting with just the form?" and offers "How about dating me for just 7 days?"

Genres: Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Music
Title: IDOL×IDOL STORY!
Description: Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other. (Source: Comic Fuz, translated) ___ * [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)

Genres: Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Drama, Police, Tragedy
Title: Soloist in a Cage
Description: In a prison so big that it is called a city, all sorts of criminals have been amassed. Due to the inescapable walls, the population only continues to grow. Within are a pair of siblings - a young girl and a recently born boy. What will be their fate in this desolate, cold city…? A story of hope and struggle begins. ___ **Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/soloist-in-a-cage/)

Genres: Action, Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya
Description: Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past. For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future. Feel the Love in it!

Genres: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery, Music
Title: Onban Kikou
Description: The secret of the record left by a grandfather, an underground record shop dealing with forbidden pop music, and an old jukebox in a future diner... A collection of short stories that traces the memories and feelings contained inside music records.

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life
Title: Major
Description: Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams. Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Star Tripper: Planetarium Ghost Travel
Description: The vast sky is populated with a great many stars on which most of the inhabitants have fallen into a deep sleep, called simply the “Slumbering Stars”. This is the story of a traveler of the stars, a worker for the Planetarium Ghost Travel Company (aka. PGT) named No. 303, as he spends his time visiting those sleeping stars in an attempt to preserve the memories and culture their peoples have left behind. Would you care to join No. 303 on a journey into the quiet night? TL;DR - Story? Nah. Atmosphere? Yah. --- Ranked No. 5 on the 2023 Kono Manga wa Sugoi! for the female readers category. - Fun Fact: The creator, Sakatsuki Sakana, is a huge fan of Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou! So much so that she even did an [interview](https://natalie.mu/comic/pp/hoshitabi) with the YKK mangaka Hitoshi Ashinano recently.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: A Galaxy Next Door
Description: After the death of his father, Kuga Ichirou, a shoujo mangaka fresh out of high school, has to take care of his two little siblings, Machi and Fumio, all by himself.
