Struggling to meet a deadline after his previous assistants get their manga debuts, he hires a new assistant through his editor. However, his life takes an unexpected turn after this new assistant is revealed to be a beautiful and mysterious girl… [Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/a-galaxy-next-door/)

Genres: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Alice-san Chi no Iroribata
Description: After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past... Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.

Genres: Award Winning, Official Colored, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Gal-loving JK wants to be a gal
Description: "Living as a gal is seriously the best!!" Mimuru was an introvert in middle school, but when she entered high school, she made her long-awaited debut as a gal, thinking "Maybe I can become a gal too!?" She made friends with three girls: Yuuhi, a cool beauty with a calm and pretty look; Fuuka, a cute gal with a soft and fluffy look; and Kurumi, a cheerful and energetic gal who is good at sports. Now she has joined the gal group she has always admired! While she lives the sparkling life she has always dreamed of, she also pushes herself too hard to keep up with her friends. And she also notices new feelings growing within her...

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life
Title: My Crush's Crush
Description: This story begins when the protagonist, a boy named Sora Akizuki, confesses his love to Miya Fuwa, a girl he has been in love with for a long time, and is rejected. When Sora learns that Miya likes someone else, he visits the dubious “Trialing Club," of which he is president, and tries to find out if he is the right person for her. The first episode shows the reality of the Trialing Club, whose activities one cannot imagine from its name, and the reason why its president, Suzukaze, created the club.

Genres: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Sports, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Kinnikuman
Description: Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes. --- - **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.** - **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)** --- - **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**

Genres: Thriller, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Drama
Title: Madame Petite
Description: It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama
Title: Kono Koi wo Hoshi ni wa Negawanai
Description: Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever. And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
Title: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko
Description: A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime! Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!

Genres: Genderswap, Action, Comedy, School Life
Title: J<->M
Description: J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld. Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school. When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Garuru Girl
Description: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Shima-chan Chi no Tsugai Jijou
Description: Let's… Let's get married! Shima-chan has two fathers, happy go lucky Akane (α) who likes to do things his own way and tender Aoi (Ω) who is a man of reason. Presently, they’re happy parents who love their daughter Shima-chan, but things were not smooth in the past. From their first encounter to their wedding, this omegaverse memoir tells the story of two young bad boys and how they formed their happy family.

Genres: Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Hanamonogatari
Description: The manga centers on Hanayo, an elderly woman whose husband of many years has only recently died. After finishing a Buddhist service for her husband, she finds herself walking out in town alone for the first time in a long time. She stumbles onto a cosmetics store, and meets a beautiful woman named Yoshiko Doujima, and falls in love at first sight. Hanayo had long given up on makeup after her husband nagged her about it, but putting some on with Yoshiko's help brightens her heart.

Genres: Monsters, Psychological, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: BIBLIOMANIA
Description: Alice had woken up in Room 431 of a mysterious manor. "You must not leave this room," warned the Serpent, but she paid it no heed and her body began to rot… Will she be able to escape the cursed manor? *Was nominated for the [2019 Japan Media Arts Festival Awards - Manga Category](http://archive.j-mediaarts.jp/en/festival/2019/manga/).*

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy
Title: Ichi the Witch
Description: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!

Genres: Genderswap, Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Mr. Mallow Blue
Description: Featuring a cynical beauty, a reclusive NEET, and an expressionless hot guy. A group of high school students and a NEET find themselves in a boarding school in which a story unfolds through the sudden meeting of those with jaded hearts and the misfits of society.

Genres: Animals, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Fairy Cat
Description: A slightly mysterious and heartwarming story about the smallest cat in the world and a high school boy. A fantastic cat named Tenohira Neko, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, appears to Kanade, a first-year high school student. He is told that if he likes it, it will live with him…?

Genres: Historical, Adventure, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Fushigi no Kuni no Bird
Description: Scottish adventuress Isabella Bird journeys to Japan in 1878, becoming the first Westerner traveling to many remote locations and heading northward to Hokkaido to study the aboriginal Ainu people. A true story based on her book "Unbeaten Tracks in Japan".

Genres: Genderswap, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Until I Become Me
Description: A boy who used to be abusive to girls wakes up one day as one. "I'll go back being a boy soon," he thought, however that was not the case. Follow Akira as he grows and learns little by little to accept the puzzling changings in her surroundings and her heart.

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Shonan Pure Love Gang!
Description: Eikichi Onizuka and Ryuji Danma are members of infamous biker gang, Oni Baku. When not out riding around, they can be found in school, trying to pick up young women. This is the story of the young Onizuka, who would later become the greatest teacher in Japan.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Senryuu Shoujo
Description: Yukishiro Nanako is a cute, cheerful high school girl with one peculiar trait: instead of verbal communication, she writes senryu (a type of haiku) poems to relay her thoughts. Together with ex-delinquent Busujima Eiji, they are budding freshmen of the school's Literature Club. Even though Nanako doesn't talk, with the power of senryu, the adorable pair has no problem enjoying their fun school-life through the tune of 5-7-5 syllables. ---

Genres: Action, Sports, Slice of Life
Title: MF Ghost
Description: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Umineko WHEN THEY CRY Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch
Description: The time for logical debate and magical feints has come to an end; the revelation of the truth about Beatrice the Golden Witch is at hand. To facilitate this, game master Bernkastel has chosen Will Wright the Mage-Hunter to step onto her board and answer a single question: Who killed Beatrice? Joining him in the game is Lion Ushiromiya, Krauss's firstborn and heir, whose role is a mystery in its own right. Will's line of questioning draws together the stray strands from all the previous games, twisting them into a thread of truth, revisiting Kinzou's first encounter with the young Beatrice and working through the legends that have since sprung up around her... [Yen Press]

Genres: Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Gyaru
Title: THE iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors - Coherent Light
Description: Serizawa Asahi, Mayuzumi Fuyuko, and Izumi Mei, members of the idol unit *Straylight*, openly declare themselves as rivals. While they occasionally clash, they further polish their talents, shining even brighter. The new manga adaptation of the game *The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors*, compatible with the *Enza* platform, is here!

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural
Title: Ranma 1/2
Description: (from ebookjapan): Soun was disappointed to find that Ranma was a girl. However, when Ranma got out of the bath, he turned into a boy and the panda turned into Ranma's father, Genma. The two had fallen into a fountain during their training in China, a fountain that turned them into a woman and panda respectively when they touched the water. The Tendo family is initially in turmoil, including Akane, who has become a prospective bride, as they face the troublesome duo who go back and forth between man and woman, human and panda, although they can be restored to their original state if they are bathed in hot water. This is the first volume of a new edition of the popular manga. --- Official Release: - English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/ranma-1-2) - Indonesian release by Elex Media

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Now That We Draw
Description: Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?

Genres: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
Title: Blue Archive! (Global)
Description: Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos! For the Official English and Korean versions, you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account. The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma. --- **Links:** - [Blue Archive EN's Twitter](https://twitter.com/EN_BlueArchive) - [Blue Archive KR's Twitter](https://twitter.com/KR_BlueArchive) - [JP Server's 4-Koma](https://mangadex.org/title/1f63ea84-6bc6-4312-81bf-b28d5592d802/blue-archive-japan)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Colori Colore Creare
Description: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!

Genres: Thriller, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy
Title: Doku Doku Mori Mori
Description: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.

Genres: Award Winning, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Music
Title: Girl Meets Rock!
Description: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: To Aru Kagaku no Railgun
Description: Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status. Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!

Genres: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
Title: Blue Archive! (Japan)
Description: Blue Archive JP's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos! The series is titled (Japan) to differentiate it from the Global 4-Koma. --- **Links:** - [Blue Archive JP's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Blue_ArchiveJP) - [Global Server's 4-Koma](https://mangadex.org/title/6348a562-067b-45cb-ab2b-c6f33f0e7ead/blue-archive-global)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Boku no Tsuma wa Kanjou ga Nai
Description: A story about the humble marriage of a corporate slave salaryman and a housework robot.

Genres: Time Travel, Action, Delinquents
Title: Nine Peaks
Description: After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life. At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Vampires
Title: Oshi ni Amagami
Description: Hina is a reclusive otaku vampire. She wants to move to a sacred place for otaku life, but a boy who looks exactly like her favorite vampire lives next door! And this boy seems to have blood that attracts vampires from all over the world...? A bloody love comedy between an otaku vampire and a slightly tongue-tied handsome man! Note: Adapted from the author’s oneshot that was released in Hana to Yume 10-11/2022 combined issue.

Genres: Reincarnation, Historical, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Isekai Shikkaku
Description: A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powers—sounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead. Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay. Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy? Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book *Ningen Shikkaku* (*No Longer Human* / *Disqualified from Being Human*).

Genres: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie
Description: The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies. ___ **Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/), [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0002)

Genres: Historical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Waters
Description: In the midst of a blazing hot summer beset by water shortages, middle-school girl Chinami faints from heat exhaustion. Upon waking up, she finds herself in a mysterious town by a beautifully pristine river whose waters hide many secrets…

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Kyou mo Veranda de
Description: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.

Genres: Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Yoru no Kurage wa Oyogenai
Description: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

Genres: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Tengoku Daimakyou
Description: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?" Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!

Genres: Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Nina the Starry Bride
Description: Nina had a rough start to life, stealing to survive—and eventually being sold into slavery by her own brother. But to her surprise, her captor, Prince Azure, ordained that she would live the life of a princess...specifically, that of the recently deceased princess-priestess, Alisha. But despite her changing fortune, Nina won't give up her old life without a fight...and Azure might just be the one to finally match her wits. But how much can she trust Azure? And can she stop the feelings budding in her heart, knowing she must eventually marry another...? [Kodansha]

Genres: Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Mitsuba  Monogatari
Description: This world revolves around me. While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world. Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path. The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

Genres: Award Winning, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Tori Kissa!
Description: Wilcome, wilcome! This is a 4-koma about a cafe run by two avian sisters. Originally a oneshot, before winning a newbie contest and being awarded a serialization. **Wikipedia** - [Chinese (Traditional)](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%B3%A5%E5%A8%98%E5%92%96%E5%95%A1) - [Japanese](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%A8%E3%82%8A%E3%81%8D%E3%81%A3%E3%81%95!)

Genres: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Supernatural
Title: Tatari
Description: Tatari is a lone stray cat. He is taken care of by his siblings Takeru and Yuki. In a ramshackle apartment, they lived a poor but happy life. Until that day. "Tatari" is the Japanese word for the curse of a vengeful ghost, by the way.

Genres: Historical, Action, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Drama
Title: Hell’s Paradise: Jigokuraku
Description: Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence… Or so he thought. Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. What awaits them is a journey like no other!

Genres: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Ookiku Furikabutte
Description: *Ookiku Furikabutte* isn't just a baseball manga. It's the story of a timid young man who was made an ace pitcher in middle school because of family connections. Now he's in high school and it's his time to shine as an ace in his own right. Reading this story will get your blood boiling, heart pumping, and tears flowing. It has been popular since it was serialized, a true Japanese high school baseball manga! --- * Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize for best creative work in 2006 * Won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga in 2007. *Discrepancy in chapter numbering (mag vs. tank), there are no chapters missing inbetween 25.2 and 53.

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
Title: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love
Description: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.

Genres: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Watashitachi, Rikon Shimasu
Description: One night just before their third wedding anniversary, Kazuomi was surprised by his wife's proposal for divorce. While he was confused, his wife, Saya only smiled carelessly, saying: "Let's get along with each other for the rest of the time." But in the early morning, he found out her secret. A moving love story about the marriage and divorce of a couple.

Genres: Drama
Title: Oyacocco
Description: Oyacocco centers around the relationship between a single dad and his child. (Source: Anime News Network)

Genres: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Magic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Kagurabachi
Description: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Military, Drama, Horror, Aliens, Supernatural
Title: Kaiju No. 8
Description: A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…! --- Kafka hopes to one day keep his pact with his childhood friend Mina to join the Japan Defense Force and fight by her side. But while she’s out neutralizing kaiju as Third Division captain, Kafka is stuck cleaning up the aftermath of her battles. When a sudden rule change makes Kafka eligible for the Defense Force, he decides to try out for the squad once more. There’s just one problem. He’s made the Defense Force’s neutralization list under the code name Kaiju No. 8. --- **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)

Genres: Slice of Life
Title: Nijiiro Photograph
Description: Yamabuki Aoi is an exceedingly withdrawn first-year high school student who lives together with her older sister Satsuki, a popular novelist. What will happen to their daily lives when, due to certain circumstances, Sara Flory, a little foreign girl, begins to live together with them?

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Mix
Description: Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch. Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame. Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship. (Source: MAL, edited)

Genres: Action, Animals, Crime, Drama, Delinquents
Title: WORST Gaiden Saburoku Santa Namonaki Karasu-tachi
Description: This manga depicts the one-year gap in the story when Harumichi Bouya leaves Suzuran Boys High School until Hana Tsukishima arrives at Toaru City.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy
Title: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama o Horesasetai!
Description: My family is in debt, and we don't have enough money for my sick sister's treatment... The troubled noble, Clarice, finds herself engaged in a political marriage with the most feared Black-Knight in the kingdom, Frost, known for "slaughtering beasts with his bare hands". In an attempt to secure the fortune, Clarice tries to seduce the "Black-Knight", but just as she does, she discovers "her" secret...

Genres: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Tragedy
Title: Oishinbo
Description: Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen. --- - **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

Genres: Thriller, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Survival, Office Workers, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Death Note
Description: A shinigami, as a god of death, can kill any person—provided they see their victim's face and write their victim's name in a notebook called a Death Note. One day, Ryuk, bored by the shinigami lifestyle and interested in seeing how a human would use a Death Note, drops one into the human realm. High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note and—since he deplores the state of the world—tests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note, Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be. With this divine capability, Light decides to extinguish all criminals in order to build a new world where crime does not exist and people worship him as a god. Police, however, quickly discover that a serial killer is targeting criminals and, consequently, try to apprehend the culprit. To do this, the Japanese investigators count on the assistance of the best detective in the world: a young and eccentric man known only by the name of L.

Genres: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
Title: I Picked Up This World's Strategy Guide
Description: Sana is the hardworking daughter of a shop owner, and she often ventures out into the forest to gather the herbs needed for the restorative potions they sell. But on one trip, she happens to pick up a mysterious strategy guide for a game—and it’s filled with detailed information about her town, those around her, and even what’s yet to come! However, the future may not be at all what she expects… With such a powerful—and dangerous—book in hand, what will Sana do? (Yen Press)

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Neko no Inai Isekai ni Neko ga Tensei Shichatta Ohanashi
Description: A story about a cat reincarnated in a different world where there are no cats.

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy
Title: Mission: Yozakura Family
Description: Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?! --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023) - [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)

Genres: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Okiku-san wa Ichatsukitai
Description: The centuries-old evil spirit Okiku has decided to return with one objective: flirting as much as possible with Hijiri Ryouyou - the most powerful and beautiful exorcist of modern times.

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Mushoku Tensei ~Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu~ Shitsui no Majutsushi-hen
Description: After separating from Eris, Rudeus falls into the depths of depression. He travels to Rozenberg, the second city of the Principality of Basherant, to search for his missing mother, Zenith. Desperate, Rudeus tries to accept a high-ranking quest alone in order to make a name for himself. However, by chance, he ends up working with a party of B-rank adventurers called the Counter Arrow. One of the party members is a girl named Sara, who reminds him of Eris...! A complete manga adaptation of the seventh volume of the light novel series, depicting the aftermath of Rudeus' separation from Eris!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Ragna Crimson
Description: Ragna is a dragon hunter along with his partner, the strongest dragon hunter Leo. He didn't have much talent at hunting dragons but he had decided to entrust his whole life for her. However he was shown the feel of true despair by his future self on what would happen if he stays weak as he is now. With that, it seems that the reaper of the dragons had now appeared earlier than the original history, but will it be enough to change the future?

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
Title: Kimi Meku Yoru ni Kogarete
Description: At Saint Ruri Girl's Academy, there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class," consisting of refined, well-bred ladies, and the "Ai Class," made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki, among the students of the Ai Class, is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance, though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night, she meets Hosho Yuka, a young lady wandering alone at night...

Genres: Monsters, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls
Title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
Description: Saliphie, the 99th sacrifice to the terrifying demon king, learns two secrets about the king: The first, that he has been letting the sacrifices go in secret. The second, that half of his blood is that of a human. She gets to know the king's kindness and sorrow, and then it's announced that the king has taken Saliphie, who wishes to become a source of energy for the king, as his queen, and…?

Genres: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Samurai, Drama, Cooking, Tragedy
Title: Nobunaga no Chef
Description: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?

Genres: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou
Description: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...

Genres: Demons, Romance
Title: Noipa-chan wa Abunai!
Description: At school, no one seems to care what transfer student Noipa-chan wears. In fact, they don't even seem to notice her existence, except for one person. Yuu is the only one who wonders what's going on with that girl.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: D Genesis: Dungeon ga Dekite 3-nen
Description: Three years after monster-infested dungeons start appearing on Earth due to an American experiment gone awry, anonymous researcher Keigo Yoshimara strikes gold when he accidentally kills a creature. This earns him a magical “D-Card” and a mysterious skill that allows him to see RPG-style stats. Deciding to quit his job and go into dungeon diving, Keigo seeks the assistance of his highly knowledgeable colleague, Azusa Miyoshi, to help him conquer the dungeon exploration market and make millions. But it’s a face to obtain all the treasure and magic he can before the masses amount of government agencies and like-minded explorers take it first. No one said getting rich would be easy! --- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/d-genesis)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Monster Girls, Supernatural
Title: Mato Seihei no Slave
Description: The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment. Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons. However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Samurai, Mafia, Gore, Drama, Police
Title: Youchien Wars
Description: Welcome to Kindergarten Noir, an exclusive school catering to children of the global elite! Rita, one of the teachers, has been on the hunt for a boyfriend but has had absolutely zero luck so far. One day, an assassin comes after one of the children... and he’s totally dreamy?! Dive into this action-packed rom-com as it unfolds inside the world’s "safest" kindergarten!

Genres: Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life
Title: Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu
Description: _"Why don't the two of us date? …In secret"_ Tateishi, who works in accounting at a snack-making company, has a secret. That secret is the existence of his cute lover that he's had since yesterday. Why keep it a secret, you ask? Because his lover is his unyielding colleague from the planning department of the same company— Mitsuya! A pure office romance story about a couple who started their relationship in secret, and want to keep it that way!

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Sports, School Life, Gyaru
Title: Desire for a Reply!
Description: A oneshot by Nisioisin and Miyokawa Masaru. Sunaki is a back-up player on the baseball team and he finally gets the courage to give a love letter to the idol of the school. Where will his actions take him?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Amagami-san Chi no Enmusubi
Description: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine.

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Tonari no Seki-kun
Description: The boy who sits next to Yokoi in class, Seki-kun, is always up to something at his desk. He manages to somehow play very elaborate games without attracting the teacher's attention. From dominoes, to shogi, to go, to mecha models, to playing with cats and more, he always has something new to do. Yokoi often finds herself getting reluctantly interested in his games, even though they always seem to end up getting HER in trouble with the teacher! [See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15587) [See AnimeNewsNetwork for the live action show.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2015-05-27/tonari-no-seki-kun-rumi-phenomenon-school-comedies-get-live-action-show/.88620)

Genres: Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: 100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death
Description: One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred… (Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Kaette Kudasai! Akutsu-san
Description: Ooyama-kun normally doesn't get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place! Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san's sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space... he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn't?

Genres: Award Winning, Animals, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Ogami Tsumiki to Kinichijou
Description: Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings. One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

Genres: Action, Psychological, Boys' Love, Gore, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Stigmata
Description: Asako Minami has a "unique constitution." He senses the lingering thoughts of murder victims, and experiences the circumstances under which they died with his own body in a reaction similar to stigmata. This proves useful in solving difficult cases with the Metropolitan Police Department's Special Investigations Unit Six. Asako's partner is the reserved Superintendent Kuroiwa Hiroto, rising through the MPD ranks despite doubting his own abilities.

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Yumemiru Shoujo no Yume wo Minai
Description: Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...

Genres: Time Travel, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
Title: Otona ni Narenai Bokura wa
Description: The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"! (Source: Young Magazine)

Genres: Genderswap, Monsters, Self-Published, Gore, Fantasy
Title: The Embodiment of Sins
Description: A life of a savage and proud Goblin King, Ish changed forever after being rendered into a human.

Genres: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Tensai Majo no Maryoku Kare
Description: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!

Genres: Thriller, Award Winning, Reincarnation, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: Buddha
Description: (from ebookjapan): Some 3,500 years ago, the Arians living on the banks of the Indus River had established a caste system with Brahmins at the top. Shortly before the birth of Siddhartha, the hero of this story, Chapra, who was born a slave, became his adopted son after helping a general of the Kosala kingdom. He then hid his origins and sought the position of power, but Chapra, too, could not escape the curse of the status system... Here begins the epic story of the Buddha's life and the times in which he lived! The complete biography of Buddha, as seen by Osamu Tezuka. --- Official Release: - English release by [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/buddha/) - Indonesian release by Kepustakaan Populer Gramedia (KPG) --- - **Won the 21st Bungei Shunju Manga Award in 1975, along with another short work of Tezuka's, Animal Tsurezuregusa (included in Paper Fortress)** --- **Volumes 287-300 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

Genres: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
Title: Ad Astra - Scipio and Hannibal
Description: This is the story of two of the greatest military commanders in history: the Roman Publius Cornelius Scipio and the Carthaginian Hannibal. The story follows the two of them from their early life on. Hannibal is initially shown as a strangely silent infant, who seemed like the gods forgot to put a soul in his little body. However, he soon begins to speak in a way that shows his remarkable abilities. Hannibal and Scipio are driven enemies, and their struggle shaped an era.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Do Chokkyuu Kareshi x Kanojo
Description: Meet Shinichi Honda and Mako Wakamiya. One’s a boy, and the other’s a girl. But both don’t hesitate to say exactly what’s on their mind **IN CAPITAL LETTERS.**

Genres: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Dead Dead Demon's Dededede Destruction
Description: Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed. No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers. "No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me." ___ - **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** - **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: I Was Reincarnated as the Heroine on the Verge of a Bad Ending, and I'm Determined to Fall in Love!
Description: One day, office worker Suzune (Reine) is reborn as Raine, the heroine of a "work-based otome game" that is too far away from romance. She wants to fall in love with a handsome man in this life! However, she finds herself in a world where there is a magical caste system, and to her surprise, she is the lowest rank! Her family treats her coldly and she is on the verge of being expelled from school. ...... Even so, she is undeterred by the "strong mentality" she has developed in her previous life. Practising magic, studying, and increasing the likability of her targets, she runs hard to avoid a bad end and get a sparkling school life! As Rene pushes forward with such a bright and positive attitude, her high-spec brother Julius, with whom she was supposed to be on bad terms, somehow begins to dote on her - or does he? A school fantasy about a strong mental heroine who is loved by everyone!

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!
Description: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.

Genres: Time Travel, Action, Adventure, Fantasy
Title: Albus Changes the World
Description: The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late. Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!

Genres: Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Kowloon-jou de Mou Ichido
Description: Kowloon Walled City: A lawless slum packed to the brim with high-rise buildings. In this confined city where various races and families live crowded together like sardines, Ryouma works as a landlord. But one day, he meets Méi Zhī, a spirit who had been inhabiting a tea pot...

Genres: Historical, Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore
Title: Tenkaichi - Nihon Saikyou Bugeisha Ketteisen
Description: Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan. ___ **Alt Official Raws:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/3269754496359886083), [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%83%86%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AB%E3%82%A4%E3%83%81_%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E6%9C%80%E5%BC%B7%E6%AD%A6%E8%8A%B8%E8%80%85%E6%B1%BA%E5%AE%9A%E6%88%A6) **Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10585/episode/356567) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Isekai Ojisan
Description: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

Genres: Historical, Action, Demons, Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Kyouganeke no Hanayome
Description: The "Kyokane family" is a prestigious family of degenerate magicians that has been in existence for a thousand years. The current head of the family, the eccentric KYOKANE Kuroro, is brought to a bride who has a "secret" behind her pretty appearance, A bride with a "secret" behind her pretty appearance...? If you decide to "live together," break off the yoke, the causality, and everything else, and be together! This marriage battle fantasy, written in a clear and elegant style, is about to begin!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Yomi no Tsugai
Description: The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village. ___ **Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/daemons-of-the-shadow-realm)

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Ichigo Mashimaro
Description: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

Genres: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Doumo, Suki na hito ni Horegusuri wo Iraisareta Majo desu
Description: "I want you to make me a love potion." The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion. If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet… The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love. --- [Official English Light Novel](http://www.crossinfworld.com/news-articles/New-Release-Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)

Genres: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Hotel Helheim
Description: Tanaka-san is a legendary hotel man (concierge), and after his death, he became a legend in the underworld. In the underworld, Mei works at the dilapidated Hotel Helheim. It was once a glorious hotel, and one where Mei has many fond memories. One day, Tanaka-san appears, ready to restore the Hotel Helheim to its former success. Mei will become the famous Tanaka-san's assistant, as he works to make Hotel Helheim a top-class underworld hotel! *Originally published in Jump Square as a 3-volume series from November 2014 to September 2015, the series was later republished under the Shonen Champion Comics label from December 2019 to January 2020. The volume count reflects the republished version, as it is the only one currently available.*

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Pinky Candy Kiss
Description: Takara Itosaki's boyfriend of two years, whom she had been thinking of marrying, suddenly dumps her. He states, "I'm not sure if you like me anymore because you don't get jealous." She has liked and cherished her past boyfriends in her own treasured way, but for some reason she is not always depressed when they break up. One day, a beautiful woman visited the real estate agency where she works. After talking with her for a while, she realizes that she is Ema, a classmate of hers, who transferred to another school in the second year of junior high school...

Genres: Award Winning, Comedy, Drama
Title: Akane-banashi
Description: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!

Genres: Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Delinquents, Supernatural
Title: Rappa - Yankee Ninpuuchou
Description: Kazama Endo is the ultimate delinquent, unbeaten in a fight. He goes to scope out a boy who beat up his henchmen, but it turns out this boy is anything but ordinary!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Inherit the Stars
Description: In 205X, armed forces and conflicts are a thing of the past and people live safe, peaceful lives, all thanks to a cheap, inexhaustible source of energy. One day, something strange is discovered on the moon: an ancient corpse in a spacesuit. The corpse is undeniably human, but it appears to be about 50,000 years old! What does this mean about the history of our species and what effect will this discovery have on current human society?

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Onna Tomodachi to Kekkon Shitemita
Description: Two women who are just friends make a pact… "If both of us are still single in 5 years, let's get married." Five years later, they meet again, and their married life begins. [Serialised in Yuri Hime starting in November 2020.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-17/donuts-under-a-crescent-moon-shio-usui-launches-new-manga-in-november/.165322)

Genres: Historical, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure
Title: Yongbi the Invincible
Description: A mysterious stranger rides into town. The peaceful village of Gang-Ho is disturbed when Yongbi, a seemingly foolish bounty hunter, comes to town looking to claim the bounty for the leader of Gang-Ho's deadliest clan of assassins. Will Yongbi collect the bounty unscathed, or will he fall victim to a vengeful pack of assassins hell-bent on retribution for their captured leader?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?
Description: Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets." When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?

Genres: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Aono-kun ni Sawaritai kara Shinitai
Description: "I would die if it would allow me to touch you. That is my love." Airhead Yuri and her boyfriend Aono had a perfectly normal relationship until one day Aono suddenly “passed away” … They will never be bound together, and they cannot even touch. This is their difficult and almost too sincere love story.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Takou no Boyish Kanojo
Description: Daichi and Akira have been childhood friends forever but have only started dating recently. While Akira is very much a tomboy, there are some parts of her that are surprisingly girly?

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu
Description: High school student Misumi Makoto is called into a fantasy world by the god Tsukuyomi, in order to be a hero. However, powerful others in this world aren't as thrilled to have him there, and they kick him to the edge of the world just as Tsukuyomi declares that he must leave Makoto to find his own way. Now it's up to Makoto to find his own way! [Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/tsukimichi-moonlit-fantasy/)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Kowloon Generic Romance
Description: The greatest labyrinth of the 20th century, a drama for working men and women in a town called Kowloon Walled City. A daily adult romance in a gentle dystopia. (…can a dystopia be gentle?)

Genres: Girls' Love, School Life, Music
Title: Kimi ga Hoeru Tame no Uta wo,
Description: Oogami Haru, a high schooler troubled by her childish appearance and contrasting deep voice secretly uploads videos of herself singing on the internet. One day, when her classmate Narumiya Yuu finds out about this, instead of the ridicule she expected, Yuu instead invites Haru to form their own musical group… A shared story of music and youth between two girls, each burdened by the past.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Bless
Description: Young Aya Udagawa has already managed to work as a model, but at one time he abandoned the dream of making a career as a makeup artist because of fears of being rejected by others. One day, he decides to help out the nondescript Sumizaki and does her make-up to participate in the school competition. Aya feels that Sumizaki has a hidden charm and charisma and needs only to help the girl prove herself.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru
Description: I'm the only one who knows my senpai's face. Senpai, who was supposed to hate me, ended up saying "I like you" to me... The perfect but slightly scary Student Council President, "Wolf-senpai" aka Ookamigawa Rina, and the frivolous and clumsy Vice-President, Tsukiyama Yuuga. These two are complete opposites of each other, save for the fact that both of them have a secret face. One day, at his secret part-time job, he discovers Wolf-senpai's secret face...?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: School Rumble
Description: She's a second-year high school student with a single all-consuming question: Will the boy she likes ever really notice her? He's the school's most notorious juvenile delinquent and he's suddenly come to a shocking realization: He's got a huge crush, and now he must tell her how he feels. Chapter 232 does not exist, there's no chapters missing. Special Chapters: bb1 What's up Doc (February 9, 2010) Diamonds on the Inside (November 30, 2016) Give it Away (March 15, 2017) Hello Again (November 8, 2017)

Genres: Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Ohayou Toka Oyasumi Toka
Description: "When you lose something, there is something that you remember." Hinata Wahei, a 28-year-old professional house-building planner, with the sole ambition to start his new single lifestyle, was suddenly forced to live together with three sisters from his father's second marriage. The unforeseen co-existence is filled to the brim with trouble, as Wahei adheres to a self-sufficient, no-family-sentimentalisms personal code, having been raised as an only child in a family marred by divorce. A story about a small family of four. It's a tale that goes from "I'm home" to "I'm off", and from "building a house" to "building a home".

Genres: Historical, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Description: Since ancient times, rumors have abounded of man-eating demons lurking in the woods. Because of this, the local townsfolk never venture outside at night. Legend has it that a demon slayer also roams the night, hunting down these bloodthirsty demons. Ever since the death of his father, Tanjirou has taken it upon himself to support his mother and five siblings. Although their lives may be hardened by tragedy, they've found happiness. But that ephemeral warmth is shattered one day when Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor, his sister Nezuko, turned into a demon. Adding to this sorrow, a demon hunter named Tomioka Giyuu arrived and was about to finish Nezuko off, but to his surprise she and Tanjiro started to protect each other. Seeing this oddity and Tanjiro's promising fighting skills, Giyuu decides to send them to his old mentor to be trained. So begins Tanjiro's life as a demon hunter, bound on a quest to cure his sister and find the one who murdered his entire family. MangaPlus: <https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100009>

Genres: Sci-Fi, Romance, Adventure, Girls' Love, Adaptation
Title: Twinstar Cyclone Runaway
Description: Six thousand years in the future, humanity has established a civilization in the atmosphere of a gas giant named Fat Beach Ball. There, inhabitants of the resource-starved planet catch Besshu, fish-like creatures that "swim" through the skies. Fishers (exclusively male-female pairs customarily seen as a married couple) use malleable aircraft to bring in their catch. The story follows Terra Intercontinental Endeavor, a woman looking for a partner, and Diode, a mysterious girl with terrific piloting skills, as they work to establish their same-sex partnership and bring home a successful catch. Manga adaptation of the cosmic yuri SF novel series written by Ogawa Issui. Ogawa's original "Twinstar Cyclone Runaway" short story was nominated for the Seiun Award in 2020.

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation
Title: Adachi to Shimamura
Description: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.

Genres: Monsters, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Spice & Wolf: Spring Log
Description: It has been more than ten years since Holo and Lawrence, who became a happily married couple after completing their long journey to send the wise wolf back home, opened the bathhouse Spice and Wolf bathouse in the hot spring resort of Nyohhira. This is a story of continued happiness spun in the bathhouse, which is said to bring happiness and laughter. --- **Note:** This series starts from light novel volume 18. Heavy spoilers ahead!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Yancha Gal no Anjou-san
Description: Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company. But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act? **Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)

Genres: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Adventure, Military, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Shoukoku no Altair
Description: For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins… --- **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10291/episode/324757) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/altair-a-record-of-battles/) **Notes:** - Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.

Genres: Thriller, Survival, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Captain Tsubasa - Road to 2002
Description: After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world. In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

Genres: Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Kaii to Otome to Kamikakushi
Description: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.

Genres: Comedy, Survival, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy
Title: Senki Survival Saga: Isekai no Unmei o Kaketa Mujintou Fujun Iseikouyuu
Description: Anastasia, an elf renowned as a once-in-a-millennium magical talent, faces the final battle of a three-way war in another world. In the midst of battle with her arch enemies, the demon race, Anastasia is enveloped in an intense light and, when she awakens, finds herself on an uninhabited island. As Anastasia strolls around the island, a mysterious human appears before her, but she can no longer use magic...!? A survival comedy featuring the most powerful and beautiful girls from another world and an older man washed ashore on an uninhabited island! (Source: Kadokawa)

Genres: Historical, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Katabami to Ougon
Description: Ireland, 1849. After losing everything in the Great Famine, Amelia and Connor immigrated towards the USA in order to find happiness and become rich in California during the Gold Rush period.

Genres: Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Tsui no Taimashi ―Ender Geisterー
Description: Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
Title: Senyuu.
Description: Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world. 1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion. This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross. [Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu) [Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2) [Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3) [Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4) [Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus) [Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)

Genres: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires
Title: Hana Himeru Kimi no Meteor
Description: "On that night, I became the cursed monster's bride—" Stella, the eldest daughter of the Viscount Quinwitch, though she was adopted, lived happily with her kind family. However, one day, Stella's younger sister Lilinette was chosen as the "Monster's Bride". Once a century, a cursed monster confined to a castle requires a sacrifice, so Stella resolves to go there in place of Lilinette. And there, she meets the monster - a bloodstained vampire named Ravi.

Genres: Romance, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Dance Dance Danseur
Description: Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art. But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: One Piece: Ace’s Story—The Manga
Description: Washed up on the shores of a deserted island at the edge of the East Blue Sea, two men from different backgrounds unite in their shared thirst for adventure. One of them, Portgaz D. Ace, will follow in his infamous father’s footsteps as the fearless captain of a pirate crew. The other, Masked Deuce, becomes the reluctant first member of Ace’s Spade Pirates. Survival is not enough for these seafaring buccaneers, as together they seek treasure, excitement, and a route to the New World. --- **Note**: Includes two oneshots part of the **One Piece Cover Comic Project** in which other manga authors recreate Eiichiro Oda's original One Piece chapters in their own style. [One more oneshot](https://mangadex.org/title/7bd37661-c0b1-4166-87c1-7e633adb55ac) was drawn for this project by Komi Naoshi.

Genres: Traditional Games, Demons, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Debby the Corsifa wa Makezugirai
Description: *"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"* The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Police
Title: Isshiki-san wa Koi wo shiritai.
Description: A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple! Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around… So, she makes a choice…?

Genres: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Uesugi-kun wa Onnanoko wo Yametai
Description: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...

Genres: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Mane Mane Nichi Nichi
Description: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: May I Ask for One Final Thing?
Description: The engagement between Scarlet, a noblewoman from a ducal family, and Second Prince Kyle was suddenly annulled during a ball. She had been falsely accused of harassing a girl called Terenezza, daughter to a baron, whom the Prince doted on heavily. Condemned by everyone around her and forced to burden all manner of crimes, she finally decided enough was enough. “Before I leave here, may I please ask you just one last thing?” As the crowd threw their boos and jeers, and that good looking guy flung his insults── her palm spun like a drill and the ballroom floor was stained with blood. From her fists, their reckoning!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru
Title: Ponkotsu Fuukiiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi
Description: Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.

Genres: Ghosts, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural
Title: Ushiro no Shoumen Kamui-san
Description: Shizuka is a normal high school girl with the ability to see ghosts. Due to her peculiar tendency to attract ghosts, she works as an assistant to Kamui, a famous psychic. Kamui takes pride in his top-notch psychic abilities, but the way he exorcises ghosts is rather unusual!

Genres: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Mystery
Title: Kimi ga Bokura wo Akuma to Yonda Koro
Description: Yusuke Saito is a normal high school kid...well, normal enough, though there's six months missing out of his memory. But when he starts to get confronted by people who insist they're from his past, who allege that he did horrible things to them...suddenly Yusuke realizes that those missing six months may be crucial to remember. Otherwise, the skeletons in his closet may just make him a skeleton, too...

Genres: Historical, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic
Title: Captain Kid
Description: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Romance, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Bokura no Kiseki
Description: From a young age, Minami Harusumi has had recurring dreams of Veronica, a princess whose kingdom is on the verge of destruction. He believes them to be recollections of his past life, and that he is her reincarnation. Because of this, he is ridiculed by his classmates. One day, when the mockery escalates into bullying, he rediscovers magic—something Veronica had studied and used. Reassured his past life is not merely a fantasy, Minami tries to learn more about his past memories and the reason behind them…

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Delinquents, Web Comic
Title: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi dewa Irarenai
Description: A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into. **Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

Genres: Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Mofumofu Cafe
Description: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

Genres: Magical Girls, Adventure, Fantasy
Title: World End Solte
Description: Though magic has been forbidden for many long years, the effects of spells woven in bygone wars still remain in pockets of corruption blighting the world today. To uncover the secrets in the hidden reaches of this world and become the wise-woman of her dreams, "Lucky" Solte sets out for adventure!

Genres: Traditional Games, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Chihayafuru plus Kimigatame
Description: Rintsu Nagara is a new first-year member of the Mizusawa High School karuta club. For some reason, Rintsuki is aiming to win the national championship, but after Chihaya and her friends graduate, the Mizusawa Karuta Club has only one A-class player, and she has a difficult time ahead of her.

Genres: Oneshot, Sci-Fi
Title: PAINU BLUE
Description: [Winner of the 2024 Summer Afternoon Kishi Prize] The story of Jui, the son of a soldier, and Maaya, a teenager from Painu Island. Different backgrounds have torn apart their friendship, but an attack by a demon named Moon that lurks on the island brings them together again!?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Momose Akira no Hatsukoi Hatan-chuu.
