Genres: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Kanan-sama wa Akumade Choroi
Description: Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: MAIDes - Maid Attacks In Destiny
Description: "……W-what should I do? I’m being transported to the battlefield of hell!" In the midst of the war against the demonic beasts, where humanity faces the threat of extinction, the maid girl Orsela accidentally finds herself transferred to a forest on the front lines of the battlefield. She has no weapons or combat experience; all she possesses is her seemingly useless inherent magic, which can only summon things that people no longer need. When she encounters a large magical beast—a dragon—and finds herself in a desperate, life-threatening situation, she gambles everything and summons a magical weapon: a revolver, and a battle-crazed girl of heroic class!? The magic that was thought to be useless turns out to be more suited for battle than any other magic... Before she knows it, she becomes the last bastion protecting humanity! The weakest class maid carves out a future for mankind! A survival fantasy of rising to the top in a world on the brink of collapse begins!

Genres: Romance, Comedy
Title: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends
Description: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Aliens
Title: The POOL
Description: A squad of soldiers receive a distress signal from an abandoned mining facility where they soon have to face dangerous creatures in a battle of survival.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Misumi-san Can't See Through
Description: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Police, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Dr. Kumahige
Description: (from ebookjapan): Saburo, a new doctor, met a man in downtown Susukino, Sapporo. Saburo sees the life of a fierce doctor in Tetsuro Kokubu, who has suddenly disappeared after having shown great promise for the future due to his competence at a university hospital. The gekiga contains nine heart-wrenching arcs including "The End of Snow," which depicts the past of Kokubu, who established a small clinic in a backstreet of Shinjuku and is called "Dr. Kumahige" by the residents of the town.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Romance, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: Hatsukoi Losstime
Description: Koji Aiba, who had been living a school life unrelated to girls, suddenly encounters a mysterious phenomenon called "Lost Time" where time stops for one hour a day. Takashi, who is trying to regain his youth in such a static world, meets Tokine Shinomiya, a girl with amber eyes who can also move in the stopped time. In a world where only the two of them can move, they gradually grow closer and closer, and eventually his feelings for Tokine turn into his first love. However, she seems to be harboring a big secret that blocks her feelings.

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kokoro no Program
Description: An elementary schooler, Usami Kyuu encounters Ichiko, a female robot trying to learn about [heart]. What awaits the two that start to live together... Boy X Robot Girl, Begin!

Genres: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Sora wo Matotte
Description: Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!

Genres: Historical, Action, Animals, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Crossdressing, Military, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: RED: Living On the Edge
Description: Set in nineteenth-century America, Red is the last living survivor of a Native American tribe that was slaughtered by white men. On a long journey in search of revenge, he travels with Iero Ito, a samurai who ran away to America after being defeated in the Seinan civil war, and Angie, a mysterious prostitute. The bonds of friendship between the three are touching. Although it is all fiction, the story seems very real as it is based on actual battles between US troops, Apaches and other tribes. --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Level Comics (2005)

Genres: Action, Drama
Title: Tokkyuu!!
Description: Hyogo Kanbayashi, a coastal lifeguard, works to enter Tokkyuu, an elite lifeguard team. --- - Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Tokkyu!**

Genres: Romance, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Clannad
Description: Clannad is set in a high-school located in a Japanese town. Tomoya Okazaki is a third-year student who doesn't take his studies seriously. Always late for class, he's seen as a delinquent by the rest of his classmates who are busy preparing for their entrance examinations. Needless to say, he doesn't have too many close friends either. Tomoya seems not to mind too–until he meets a few other girls from his school. Though he doesn't care much about them at first, he soon opens his heart to them as they get to know each other better. Clannad is a romantic youth drama that's likely to be more down-to-earth than Key's other works. But like Kanon and Air, Clannad's story is expected to be another touching and heart-breaking weeper. Based off the game of the same name by Key.

Genres: Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Pizzicato no Nemuru Mori
Description: Emilie has lived a sheltered life. Longing for a life like the protagonist in her beloved novel who shares the same name, Emilie leaves home on her own and travels to the villa inherited from her great-great-grandfather on Hazama Hill. There, she finds a sleeping backpacker named Shura and many mysterious creatures!

Genres: Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Endou-kun no Jikken Note
Description: Tsuda and Endou have come to realize they can't stay the way they are forever. If asked about their relationship, they don't know how to answer. What do they need to stay together? It's not enough. They want more. They can't stop their feelings…

Genres: Animals, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi
Description: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?' And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest. This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

Genres: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy, Gyaru
Title: Sousei no Onmyouji
Description: Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world. --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Please Give Me Your Blood, I Will Serve You in Gratitude
Description: A young man rescues a young vampire girl who has fallen ill; she tries to give her all to repay him for his blood, but she's too clumsy to do so. A vampire rom-com that depicts a warm life among different species where no one is left behind or abandoned! A long-awaited new series by the author of "Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!"

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Sister Home Alone
Description: The Kaede arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga! Another day of house-sitting for Azusagawa Kaede. As long as her beloved onii-chan is by her side, she was fine with staying home all day, but a desire to change has started growing in her mind... Experience the adolescence story, with Kaede as the main character, in a way only possible through manga. *From ComicWalker, translated*

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
Title: Fantasy Bishoujo Juniku Ojisan to
Description: Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!! However... will they be able to keep their hands off each other!? "An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome older man"! Let the madness-filled another world journey rom-com begin!!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: You Like Me, Not My Daughter?!
Description: “I will take in and raise this child.” I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it. Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like “Please give me your daughter.”? No way, I'm getting ahead of myself. “Ayako-mama…… I've always loved you. Please go out with me.” “……You like me (mama), not my daughter!?” A super pure-love romcom where long-held feelings explode! ___ **Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc) **Alt Official Raw:** [Young Animal Web](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi
Description: Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him… 1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018) --- +++ Difference to volumes Pixiv/Twitter (Web) to volume mapping: | Web Ch. | Volume Ch. | Change | Difference | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | | 64 | v.4 64 | | 0 | | 65 | v.4 64.5 | - | 1 | | 66 | v.4 65 | | 1 | | 79 | v.4 77.5 | - | 2 | | 146.5 | v. 5. 145 | + | 1 | | 149.5 | v. 8 149 | + | 0 | | 150.5 | v. 8 151 | + | 1 | | 153.5 | v. 8 155 | + | 2 | | 154.5 | v. 8 157 | + | 3 | +++

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Superhero, Military, Police, Slice of Life
Title: Wahhaman
Description: Wahhaman is a special robot soldier built ten thousand years ago by the Atlanteans. Found and dug up in present-day Tokyo, he doesn't remember anything due to a nasty knock to the head he received at some point.

Genres: Romance, Slice of Life
Title: Marriage Gray
Description: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Ouji-sama no Tomodachi
Description: I'm always at the mercy of the prince!? A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
Title: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!
Description: When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?! --- **Links:** - Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting) - [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)

Genres: Action, Mystery
Title: No\Name
Description: In a world where peoples' names grant them superhuman powers... Two agents from the Nordic Naming Bureau (NNB), an agency specialized in investigating crimes committed by "Namers", handle the case of a man and his missing wife and son. Things take a turn, however, when the duo come face to face with the man, who wishes to give his son the same name as himself...

Genres: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Yowamushi Pedal
Description: Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join. Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road. Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he? --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!** --- - **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Blue Exorcist
Description: Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness. Raised by Father Fujimoto, a famous exorcist, Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truth—the blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rin’s veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan, but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Kippo
Description: An irreplaceable "spot…" and the greatest friends in the world! Just when it seems like peaceful everyday life will continue forever, disaster strikes, and that's when these men move to protect what matters most to them! A compilation of stories about the legendary boys of Hiroshima!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Samurai, Supernatural
Title: Nito no Joreishi
Description: Gotsuji and Uruka, two exorcists, spend their days hunting down and banishing "evil spirits." Their mission is to track down and slay a specific malevolent spirit. At the heart of this quest lies Gotsuji's deep, unresolved grief and vengeance for a woman who died long ago. While Gotsuji is consumed by a thirst for revenge, Uruka, who struggles to understand this obsession, faithfully stays by his side. Together, these two exorcists are bound on a journey, but where will it lead?

Genres: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Aliens
Title: Birdy the Mighty Evolution
Description: After two years of being dormant inside Tsutomu Senkawa, an accidental encounter with their old nemesis violently wakes Birdy up. With Birdy kicking evil's ass once again, the dark secrets of the experiments conducted by the "Agni" corporation are slowly revealed. They seem to be dabbling with human body enhancement, creating what they call "beast men," to combat the alien invasions related to Birdy.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Danjohi 1:5 no Sekai demo Futsu ni Ikirareru to Omotta? ~ Geki Juu Kanjou na Kanojotachi ga Mujikaku Danshi ni Honrousaretara
Description: Before he knew it, Masato had been transported to a world where there were just a few more women than in his original world. However, aside from the fact that women were a little more assertive, the world wasn’t much different from the one he came from... or so he thought. Little did he know, the kindness he spread, based on the standards of his old world, was saving those around him more than he could imagine. He was unaware that this kindness was causing the women around him to develop intense feelings for him. This is the story of a protagonist who believes he can live an ordinary life, unknowingly making the heroines fall in love with him, and eventually realizing just how heavy their feelings are — until they make him understand it for himself...!

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Office Workers
Title: Himokuzu Hana-kun wa Shinitagari
Description: "I'll die with you, I promise." Yoshino is a second-year working adult who is exhausted from her daily life and work. One of the worst days of her life, Yoshino gets drunk and wakes up the next morning to find a mysterious boy named Hana-kun sleeping next to her. Yoshino ends up living with Hana-kun for a limited time, and surprisingly begins to feel comfortable living with Hana-kun. Meanwhile, due to a certain incident, Hana-kun becomes obsessed with her for some reason... When a scummy man whose love is too heavy meets a deeply compassionate female office worker, a love resembling a potent drug begins!?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Tonari no Seki no Yankee Shimizu-san ga Kami o Kuroku Sometekita
Description: "I dyed my hair black for you... so notice me." Shimizu-san, the delinquent highschool girl who sits next to Hondo with her newly-dyed hair, gradually lowered her voice, slightly blushed, and laid her face down on the desk. After that, when Daiki Hondo talked with his friend about how he wanted be with a girl who can cook, the next day Hondo ended up partnered with Shimizu-san in cooking class, even though she used to always skip class. When Hondo mentioned that he wished he could try a girl's hand-made cooking, for some reason she brought two bentos to lunch the next day and shared one with Hondo… This is a coming-of-age romantic comedy with Shimizu-san, a delinquent highschool girl who is clumsy in love. --- - [Official Twitter (LN)](https://x.com/yanmizusan)

Genres: Reincarnation, Historical, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo
Description: Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School! ---

Genres: Oneshot, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Web Comic
Title: High School Runway
Description: Although Haruka admires fashion, she is nicknamed “Ghost Haruka-san” because of her tall stature. She starts practicing makeup with Haru-chan, whom she met online, but it seems like Haru-chan has some kind of secret…!!?

Genres: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~
Description: An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]! "To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!" Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words... "Would you like some guidance?" She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action
Title: Hero Organization
Description: In a near-future where humanity stands on the edge of extinction, we turn our gaze to the stars. But in the depths of space, a new menace looms—the 'Star Beasts.' To combat these creatures, warriors donning mechanical armor emerge as humanity's last hope. Prepare yourself for a groundbreaking mecha action saga, where breathtaking visuals meet an expansive universe. The battle for survival starts now!

Genres: Romance, Comedy
Title: Kekkon shiyou. Rikon zentei de.
Description: After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house. That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce! A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage. He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl. A pair unsuited for marriage. What will they discover after 100 days together?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Boku no Ikezu na Konyakusha
Description: Miyuki-san is a young lady born in Kyoto. My relationship with her cannot be described as good. Because... "You’re very good at flattery." Are those words sincere? Or just for show?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Ao Haru Ride
Description: Yoshioka Futaba has a few reasons why she wants to ‘reset’ her image and life as a new high-school student. Because she's cute, she was ostracized by her female friends in junior high, and because of a misunderstanding, she couldn't get her feeling across to the one boy she has always liked, Tanaka-kun. Now in high school, she is determined to be as unladylike as possible so that her friends won't be jealous of her. While living her life this way contentedly, she meets Tanaka-kun again, but he now goes under the name of Mabuchi Kou. He tells her that he felt the same way as she did when they were younger, but now things can never be the same again. Will Futaba be able to continue her love that never even started from three years ago?

Genres: Historical, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo
Description: When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle. Based on the light novel of the same name.

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: A Friend Who I Went to the Same Middle School With but Have Never Talked To
Description: Kimura Hajime and Hanasaki Aya went to the same middle school but have never talked to each other. They ended up going to the same high school but will their relationship remain the same? ___ Published in Shounen Sunday 2020 Issue 21.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Crime
Title: Zai x 10
Description: When ten criminal acts collide, what's going to happen!? From the creator of Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou.

Genres: Reincarnation, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Isekai No Ochibi-chan wa Kyou mo Nanika wo Tsukuri Dasu
Description: One day, Ochibi (5 years old) who lives in the slums suddenly remembers that she has been reincarnated from another world. Ochibi has the "Imagination Creation" skill, which allows her to create anything she imagines. She decides to start a business with the Japanese items she obtains with her "Imagination Creation" skill! A heartwarming story with a boy named "Onii" and a girl named "Nene" who aim to escape the slums!!

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Akuyaku Reijoutachi wa Yuruganai
Description: It has been half a year since Aini Mikkola, the saintess in training who hails from a barony in the countryside, arrived at the Royal Academy. The school is in turmoil. The boys, the sons of aristocrats, are at the mercy of Aini's innocent, natural cuteness, while the girls are angry at her disregard for the manners of the aristocracy. In the midst of all this, there were three daughters who were dubbed “the villainesses,” in reference to a popular story. Seraphina, the crown prince's fiancée and the daughter of an upright marquise. Sandra, the noble daughter of a viscount who made their wealth from commerce. Bernardetta, the brilliant daughter of the current Prime Minister's who is a marquise. When a sense of disquiet begins to grow in the school, these women finally stand up! To correct Aini's mistakes and to follow their own hearts. This is a record of the battle between the three “villainesses” and the saintly apprentices, a battle for the way of life of women.

Genres: Thriller, Time Travel, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Meguru Mirai
Description: Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife. Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!

Genres: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: 2 Saisa no Osananajimi
Description: Feelings that have remain unchanged from back then... Please be aware of me soon! When did he become so cool……! No, no, there's no way! I thought he was just a normal cute "little brother"-like childhood friend, but 6 years later he……

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Uzaki-chan wa Asobitai!
Description: Annoying! Cute! But Annoying! Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone, but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school. Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge." ___ **Additional Links:** - Alt Official Raws: [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_004657_S?episodeType=first), [KADOKAWA](https://promo.kadokawa.co.jp/uzakichan/) - [Official X](https://x.com/uzakichan_asobi)

Genres: Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Shachiku Kensei, Haishinsha ni naru - Black Guild Kaishain, Ukkari Kaishayou Kaisen de S-kyuu Monster wo Aite ni Musou suru Tokoro wo Zenkoku Haishin shite shimau
Description: “Getting a job is the grave of life…” sighs Tanaka Makoto, an office worker belonging to a black guild, as he takes on a dungeon for work again today. One day, he makes a mistake in the broadcast settings for recording work, and broadcasts his dungeon capture to the whole country. A single blow from the Tyrant Dragon?! Tanaka, a sword master in the modern age, shows off his extraordinary skills, and the broadcast turns into a festival! "100 million concurrent viewers…?!" Tanaka, who unexpectedly becomes an incredibly popular broadcaster, quits his black workplace and becomes an independent broadcaster. Now it’s time for work. The former corporate slave’s life of dungeon broadcasting begins!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Mikakunin de Shinkoukei
Description: This is a four-panel comedy manga about Kobeni Yonomori, who on her 16th birthday suddenly has a young man with little presence named Hakuya Mitsumine and his little sister Mashiro appear in front of her. It turns out that Hakuya is her fiancé, and Mashiro is her future sister-in-law. The three (and Kobeni's overprotective big sister Benio) start living together under the same roof, and hilarious happenings occur.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Mizuki-senpai’s Love Fortune-Telling
Description: A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him… A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

Genres: Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken
Description: Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming. Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself. This is not the tale of just a streamer... but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Kokage-kun Bewitched
Description: Yumeko dreams of being a pampered princess, but reality has her living in a shitty old apartment building. With a forest on the roof. And a witch in the forest. Tadaa! Maybe she can get this witch (who is a guy, weird) to magically grant all her wishes, up to and including making her destined prince (high school crush) fall in love with her.

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Kamitachi ni Hirowareta Otoko
Description: Upon his sudden death, middle-aged otaku businessman Ryoma Takebayashi finds himself in a curious situation. Three gods request his cooperation in their divine plot, which requires him to reincarnate in another world as a young boy! Equipped with magic, young Ryoma undertakes a carefree existence in the forest, leisurely learning more about his new abilities and surroundings. And when he encounters slimes like those in video games from his former life, Ryoma uses his newfound magical powers to get creative with his research! Will the gods get more than they bargained for in Ryoma?! [MangaUp!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/273)

Genres: Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Sayonara Diamond
Description: Three women around their thirties who spent their youth in the softball club at an all-girls school gather under one roof! And what they started is a detective agency!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Even a Replica Falls in Love
Description: On days when she is sick, on days when she has a tedious day job, on days when she has regular tests. On days when she is too lazy to go to school, I am called upon. I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sonao Aikawa, and that is me. I may look exactly the same, but my personality is a little different. I can't go out freely, I can't even make plans for tomorrow, I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original. I was supposed to be a replica, but I fell in love. A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.
Description: The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me." "Why did that happen?!" Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day. "Yuya-kun. Let's take a bath together." "Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow." "That's enough, Hitotsuba-san!"

Genres: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Tragedy
Title: Mobile Suit Gundam Aggressor
Description: Set during the Universal Century’s One Year War, this story followers exiled soldiers from Zeon join the Earth Federation Space Force (E.F.S.F.) and form a unit called "Aggressor."

Genres: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Fantasy
Title: Maryoku Zetsumu no Ryuuken Tsukai: Maryoku Zero no Ryuuou no Musuko, Bocchi Yueni, Tomodachi wo Tsukuru Tameni Madou Gakuen de Musou Suru
Description:
Raised as the son of the Dragon King, Ao is given a challenge to become a full-fledged individual: he must make 100 human friends. With zero magical power and no common sense, Ao enrolls in a magic academy full of aristocrats, and chaos ensues!
Can Ao, despite his challenges, make 100 friends and pass the test? Prepare for a whirlwind of wild adventures in this heartwarming and humorous tale!

Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Moonlight Act
Description: Gekko Iwasaki, a high-school student, is selected as executor of "Moonlight Ordinance" and fights against the residents. In this fairy tale, there is a world which is strangely affected by blue moonlight once in dozens of years. "Moonlight Ordinance" is a rule to restore the world to its former condition. **Links:** - [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ufujitakazuhiro?lang=ja)

Genres: Drama, Horror, Mystery
Title: Bishu no Daichi Fukushu ~Fukushuu no tame ni Kao wo Suteta Onna~
Description: A woman who was robbed of her family by bullying is reborn as another person, and she devotes herself to revenge from hell! , Because of her ugly appearance, she was badly bullied at a girls' school. The leader of bullying is Ayako Takashimazu, the daughter of a large company. Hana, who was accused of theft by her, was forced to leave school...!? (from mangaupdates)

Genres: Romance, Drama, Mystery
Title: Nanashi wa Ittai Dare Deshou?
Description: "There are three things that worry me in this moment. First, before I noticed, I was here. Second, I have no memory. Third, there is a girl with a knife in front of me. Who on earth am I?"

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Mystery
Title: Toppuu to Beat
Description: Nike, a mysterious high school girl living in a small town by the sea in Hokkaido, begins a mysterious journey to find her forgotten self when she meets Nemoto, a boy who rarely shows up for class.

Genres: Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Gyges no Futari
Description: Todo, a manga artist, and Hinata, an assistant, have a common problem - a bad deal with the editor in charge. When such two people return home from the interview, they awaken to each other's abilities…

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Music
Title: Studio Cabana
Description: Yukari Maki, a diligent high school girl. One day, she spots her classmate, Yusuke Kusaka, who was rumored to be a delinquent, singing a love song. Never having imagined such a sweet, yet sad, singing voice could come from him, Yukari was instantly captivated—without knowing that it would soon be the beginning of a sad, unrequited love.

Genres: Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Adekan
Description: Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro, and hot-blooded officer Kojiro, who stands against all things undisciplined, become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!

Genres: Oneshot, Adventure, Fantasy
Title: Layla to Mayonaka 3-ji no Daibouken
Description: Lyra is a girl who attends a magical school and has a huge amount of magic but can't use it. One day, she finds a picture book at the Great Magic Library.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: Kyou no Ashura Meshi
Description: A bottom-feeder JK and a yankee boy. Bento connects these two opposites in this coming-of-age love story! One day, Omori Sizuka, a high school girl who loves to eat and is bullied by bullies, discovers the secret that Akira Kurose, aka "Ashura-kun," the only tough yankee at school, enjoys cooking. The next day at lunchtime, Akira summons Sizuka to the rooftop and asks her to eat his homemade lunch box to keep her mouth shut. "A delinquent guy likes a chubby girl for who she is but he’s worried about her health cause she’s eating nothing but unhealthy food. So he starts making lunches for her so her diet gets better and then romance begins"

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Gyaru to Kyouryuu
Description: A story of a gyaru who picks up a dinosaur. --- **Links:** - [Official Site](http://galkyo.com/) - Alternative Official English - [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/my-roomie-is-a-dino/)

Genres: Award Winning, Action, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Truth Weavers
Description: In the country of Lavarta, mages are oppressed and seen as filthy beings. Leon is a talented but rather weak mage. Zechs is an orphan boy with great innate magical talent. Their meeting will change their lives as well as the world around them. Note: "Lineage of sorcery" is the literal translation of the Japanese title, but it's not the official translation.

Genres: School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Ojousama's Forbidden Culinary Detours
Description: Yuuki Saji is the daughter of one of Japan's leading zaibatsu families. Aoi Hashisugi, a former delinquent who was thrown into a rich school by his parents, finds classmate Yuuki in trouble on a street corner and decides to buy her a beef bowl, opening her eyes to a commoner's delicacy for the first time. A young lady with a deep window meets a commoner's delicacy.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Senpai, Chotto ii Desu ka?
Description: A super-sheltered girl, Shiranui Rei, has a lot of things she doesn’t know! She asks her questions to her senior, who is also a library committee member. But sometimes, her questions are hard to answer…!?

Genres: Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Fujii on the Roadside
Description: Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"? In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors. Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii... This elusive emotion that's hard to put into words is vividly captured by the author of "Reborn no Kishi" in this bewitching life drama!

Genres: Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama
Title: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kinden - Kamigami no Apocalypse
Description: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another. Thus begins the "Revelation" of the untold side of *Record of Ragnarok!*

Genres: Psychological, Drama
Title: Kiichi!!
Description: Left to himself at an early age in the slummiest parts of today’s Japan, Kiichi learns how to survive on his own. As a teenager, how can he adapt to a society whose rules he rejects? Unless he creates his own rules… Kiichi, a raw icon of strength and integrity, stands alone against the world’s injustice and becomes an unforgettable character.

Genres: Award Winning, Monsters, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Kaijuu-kun
Description: Musashino Art University, Department of Visual Communication Design, 2021 graduation project. When he was in elementary school, a boy who had been trying to save his childhood friend from being bullied by a bully turned violent. Now, as a junior high school student, his classmates nickname him "Kaiju-kun" and distance themselves from him. One day, a girl who is "half Kaiju" joins his class. She seems to have come to school to make friends with many people...... A heartwarming monster coming-of-age story about the pain of school life and friendship!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
Title: Death Preparation Hero
Description: Several decades have passed since the Hero defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the world, and the Hero has grown old enough to only vaguely remember his magic spells. When the remnants of the Demon King's army attack the Hero, he decides to set out on a journey again. This time, it's not a journey to save the world, but a "death preparation journey" to look back on his life. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69537)

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: A Splendid Revenge Story of a Super-Dreadnought Cheat Villainess
Description: Lunaria il von Solfege. The protagonist, who was reincarnated as the villainess of her favourite game, was flooded with tragic memories of Lunaria. She was condemned, left alone and uncared for, and tried to commit suicide by stabbing herself with a dagger. "Leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I'm Lunaria, I won't show them any mercy."

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life
Title: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai
Description: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life
Title: Kawaibara-senpai wa Kawaii (Saotome-kun) ga Suki!
Description: Saotome-kun is short and terrible at sports. He thought that studying was his only good point, but in his new high school, his grades are a far cry from stellar. As he was feeling down and thinking he had nothing, the academically brilliant, sporty, elegant, and beautiful "Perfect Student Council President" Kawaibara-senpai approached him. Having maintained her position at the top of the grade since she enrolled, she offers to tutor Saotome on one condition: he must wear a sailor uniform while studying with her. Their secret study sessions after school begin...

Genres: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy
Title: King of the Labyrinth
Description: Within the tenth-floor boss room of the Sazardon Labyrinth, the mighty minotaur awakens once more. Unlike its predecessors, slain at the hands of treasure-seeking adventurers, this monster’s primal urges push it further than ever before. Kill. Consume. Grow stronger. The more powerful its opponent, the more powerful it becomes. Even the very rules of the labyrinth seem to bend to its indomitable will. Can none triumph against this bovine behemoth? Will the minotaur ever meet its match…? --- Notes: - Was on hiatus since June 2022 till February 2024 - Official english translation of [light novel](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08F45DG62)

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Nietzsche-sensei - Konbini ni, Satori Sedai no Shinjin ga Maiorita
Description: The comedy manga follows a male part-time late-night convenience store worker named Matsukoma, and the new part-time worker he trains named Tomoharu Nii, nicknamed Nietzsche-sensei. Tomoharu is a university student in the school's Buddhism department. When an angry customer screams at Tomoharu, "Customers are gods!," he replies, "God is dead." The manga follows the part-time worker life of Matsukoma and Tomoharu, the latter of whom continuously baffles his customers and co-workers at the convenience store with his odd ways.

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Koi Yori Aoku (Oneshot)
Description: Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: A Flirty and Devoted Kouhai
Description: A story about a flirty kouhai seducing her senpai.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation
Title: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai
Description: Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of! --- **Links:** - [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Mystery
Title: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses
Description: Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here! ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Witch Craft Works
Description: Takamiya Honoka, a regular student, sits next to Kagari Ayaka, the idol of the school, and a perfect girl in every way. Her fans are hostile to the extent of harassing anyone who gets close to their princess, so Takamiya-kun is always in trouble. One day Takamiya is suddenly attacked by an unknown force, but he is rescued by a powerful sorceress of fire, who happens to be… Kagari Ayaka herself!

Genres: Reincarnation, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Outo no Hazure no Renkinjutsushi ~Hazure Shokugyou Datta node, Nonbiri Omise Keiei Shimasu~
Description: Daisy von Preslaria, born in a viscount family that produces excellent magicians, was the only one in the family that was granted the failure job, Alchemist. Since this has happened, she's going to try studying hard and becoming independent as a worthy alchemist! The five-year-old girl so resolved and began to make potions by trial and error. Thanks to the Appraisal skill that she secretly possessed, let alone failures, her finished products were of such high quality never seen anywhere! She cultivated medicinal herbs, indulged herself in research, went harvesting, and opened a store.

Genres: Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Uma Musumeshi
Description: "In their daily lives, as well as their special moments, Uma Musume enjoy eating "tasty dishes"♪"?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Gyaru
Title: Renge to Naruto!
Description: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there... This is a story about a Chinatown restaurant where gals are hospitable.

Genres: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Belle puppée no Supadari Kon'yaku
Description: 【“If I’m going to be abandoned anyway, I’ll allow myself to act freely one last time” – A ‘reverse-overindulgence’ love story presented by Selen!】 Leticia, the duke’s daughter nicknamed “the Beautiful Doll (ベル・プペー),” possesses a delicate appearance. However, her true nature combines courage and compassion, making her an exceptional person. She is arranged to be engaged to the second prince, Gilbert, who is rumored to have a difficult and improper character. A flawless and perfect duke’s daughter and a lonely, clumsy prince cursed with red eyes. A destined pair who support and love each other in a unique “reverse-overindulgence” love story. ※ This product is a serialized version, dividing the chapters of the original work *The Spudari Engagement of Belle poupée: The Doll Princess Who Was Told ‘I Don’t Like You,’ Stopped Enduring, and Made the Prince Head Over Heels. Truly Adorable!* into individual parts.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: A Yandere-Like Girl
Description: A girl who only at first glance resembles yandere.

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Wakeari Senpai no Kanojo ni Narimashita
Description: "Ah, I want to die." Sagami, who works part time at a convenience store, is a target of bullying - one of the reasons is her grades being not the best. Meanwhile, Onizuka, an ex-studious turned delinquent, gets tangled with her. With their fates now intertwined, how will they grow out of their pasts?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta
Description: High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who's his worst enemy in school. "If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I'll kill you." "I don't want them to know either. There’s no point in that." Their newlywed life wasn't going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside...

Genres: Comedy, Magical Girls, Crossdressing, Fantasy
Title: Bokura wa Mahou Shounen
Description: Kaito Odagiri is a normal fifth grade boy who can hold his own in a fight and loves to show off. This attracts the attention of Makoto Kaibara, a boy at Kaito's school who reveals to him that he can use magic, but he needs Kaito's help to protect the peace of their town. Kaito jumps at the chance of being a magic-wielding superhero, but his excitement turns to horror when he realizes that he'll be protecting the town dressed as a typical magical girl under the name Thrilling Pink. Although initially reluctant, Kaito soon discovers that there’s more to being a magical boy than simply looking cute in a skirt.

Genres: Romance, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: On to Off
Description: Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics! --- A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

Genres: Psychological, Crime, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: N
Description: My vision and my heart were completely taken over by "N." The case of five missing junior high school boys. The massacre of an entire elementary school class. A car crash resulting in the deaths of two people. The letter "N" was left at each of these crime scenes. An urban legend circulates, suggesting the main culprit is "N," a religious group thought to have collapsed 2,000 years ago. What exactly is "N"?

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Senshun Kansoku
Description: Wakamatsu Haruka (3rd year of middle school) finds the new student Hachiya Shuuto (1st year of middle school) sleeping on the train station and Haruka can't help wanting to take care of the small Shuuto. This is the story of a member of the baseball club and the leader of the school band.

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Orange
Description: The spring she turns sixteen, Takamiya Naho receives a strange, but detailed letter from herself, ten years in the future. At first she thinks the letter is a prank, but then the things written in the letter actually happen, including the arrival of the new transfer student who sits next to her in class, Naruse Kakeru. The letter reads just like her diary entries, down to the same characters. It is not until two weeks later, when Kakeru shows back up at school, that Naho finishes the letter. In the letter, her twenty-seven year old self tells her sixteen-year old self that her biggest regret is that Kakeru is no longer with them in the future, and asks her to watch him closely.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru
Description: I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!? Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!? Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...? ──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Koushoku Musou Roku ~Isekai Tensei no Chie to Chikara o, Tada Hitasura ✕✕✕✕ Suru Tame ni Tsukau~
Description: A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here! The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, School Life, Monster Girls
Title: Kaijin Mira no Dai 2 Keitai ga Kawaisugiru
Description: Cuteness is unbeatable! Monster Mira is on another rampage, aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications, Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute! A romantic comedy where justice and evil refuse to back down!

Genres: Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
Title: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~
Description: Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe). The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

Genres: Office Workers, Drama, Delinquents
Title: Eren the Southpaw
Description: A mediocrity and a genius. Although distressed by the limits of his own abilities, Asakura Koichi still dreams of "making it big" in the near future. Meanwhile, Yamagishi Eren is dealing with the agony and solitude of being called a genius due to her overwhelming artistic talent. After their fateful encounter during senior high school, Koichi becomes a designer for a major ad company while Eren is working as an artist in New York. It's their individual setbacks in life that leads them to discover their true self. [Original Web Comic](https://cakes.mu/posts/12577) [Live Action Drama Series](https://www.mbs.jp/eren_drama/)

Genres: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life
Title: Hinomaru Sumo
Description: It is a divine ritual, a martial art, a combat sport—it's sumo!! A "small" new student, Ushio Hinomaru, appears before the weak little sumo club of Oodachi High School! The words "big" and "heavy" are the rules to this sport, which does not fit this newbie any inch, but this guy goes and does what…!? Ushio and the small sumo club climbs its way to the top! The goal is Hinoshita Kaisan (a title for the highest rank in professional sumo, equivalent of Yokozuna)! A fired up high school sumo tale—no retakes allowed!!

Genres: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Hanayamata
Description: Normal appearance, normal intelligence, normal in arts and sports… just normal. This is the entirely normal 14-year-old, Naru Sekiya. While she admires "Heroines" she continues to live a normal life until one moonlit night she meets a fairy. This foreign girl then guides her into the extraordinary world of the yosakoi dance. --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: TS Eiseihei-san no Senjou Nikki
Description: An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?! After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front." The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates! On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: The New Gate
Description: The New Gate — an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players. Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game’s final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world! Thrown from a simple game gone wrong into a strange new land, one young swordsman of unrivalled strength is about to embark on a legendary journey!

Genres: Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Danzai sareta Akuyaku Reijou wa, Gyakkou shite Kanpeki na Akujo wo Mezasu
Description: An exhilarating romantic fantasy about a duke's daughter, a former prostitute, controlling the poison within evil! The duke's daughter, Claudia, was supposed to be the fiancée of the crown prince, however her half-sister, Fermina's, schemes had her sold off to a brothel. She didn't want to end it like this, so she climbed to the top at the brothel, but ended up dying from an illness. Except, when she opened her eyes, the face of when she was a child looked back at her. Realizing she had gone back in time, Claudia wins over more and more supporters using the tactics she learnt during her days as a prostitute to prepare for her nearing conflict with Fermina. "If Fermina is considered a villainess, I shall aim to become the ultimate villain!"

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi na Doryoku de Saikyou to Nari Fuguu na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~
Description: The mom characters that appear in the game are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why… Why does such a cute mom have to die?!“ Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of MamaFan on a certain day. …However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who’s got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who’s crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin! --- **Additional Links:** - Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: 2.5 Jigen no Ririsa
Description: From Seven Seas: “I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds. English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Tsuma, Shougakusei ni Naru.
Description: The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife, who perished a decade before.

Genres: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Police, Supernatural
Title: Gilded Seven
Description: Historical Action about a police officer hunting down the "La Llorona" mexican crime cartel. After catching a bunch of high-ranking members, suddenly a Yellowstone volcano errupts & the cop time-leaps to the 19th wild west a few days after Lincoln got assassinated. He steps into a gruesome scene of native americans getting slaughtered. But suddenly the supposedly dead Abrahalm Lincoln appears and kills the attackers.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire
Description: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

Genres: Historical, Action, Gore, Tragedy
Title: Kaina ~ Duel Before the Lord of Suruga ~
Description: This manga features violent stories of passion and swordsmanship, set in the Kan'ei era (1624-1643). It opens with a match between two damaged swordsmen. Irako is blind, and his opponent, Fujiki, is missing an arm. It has been decreed that their match will be fought with metal swords, instead of wooden, so one of these men will die. The story that led them to this final match, and gave them their handicaps, involves ambition, the selection of the heir for a dojo, and the passion of two women– one the dojo master's daughter and the other his lover. (From MangaHelpers)

Genres: Action, Demons, Mecha, Military, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Sakura Taisen Part 2
Description: With the Hive of Darkness and High Priest Tenkai defeated, peace has returned to the capital thanks to the Imperial Combat Troupe. But a new enemy has risen and threatens to disturb this new year of peace! The curtain is rising, the bells are ringing and a new battle is about to begin, for the Kouma have been resurrected by their new King: AOI SATAN

Genres: Animals, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy
Title: Tsumugu Kon
Description: ――From today onwards, this guy is my bride. The third son of the prestigious nine-tailed fox family, MItsu × The fox caretaker, Tsumugi One day, due to Mitsu's selfishness, the two, who were once master and servant are now husband and wife…!?

Genres: Romance, Comedy
Title: Fashion Fade
Description: After growing up in Africa, Fade moves to France to live with her uncle, but her headstrong personality means they cannot get along. However, she soon becomes involved in the fashion industry, making various friends and enemies along the way to success!

Genres: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Koi Toka Yume Toka Tententen
Description: Kai-chan is a 29-year-old part-time worker who moved to Tokyo 10 years ago with dreams in mind. She is busy making a living, and time just passes by. She even gave up drawing, something she loved, because it was painful when she didn't get any "likes" from anyone when she posted her pictures on social media. Meanwhile, Kai-chan falls in love and moves from Tokyo to Osaka! A story of love and dreams that keeps rolling in for Kai-chan, whose first unrequited love of her life is unstoppable. 2nd placer of the women's edition of "Kono Manga ga Sugoi! 2025", just behind the winner "Tamaki & Amane".

Genres: Drama
Title: Kakuu no Sono
Description: After his mom's death, our protagonist strives for every bit of physical affection that his dad would show. Even as a toddler, his dad never held his hand or stroked his head. Also contains stories: - Flower of the Sky - Dark Eyes About a young woman and the man who appears in her life during dangerous times.

Genres: Historical, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Mononoke: Nopperabo
Description: "Who is it that you truly killed?" Ochou, a woman imprisoned and sentenced to death for the crime of the massacre of the Sasaki family, including her own husband and mother-in-law. The medicine seller suspects the presence of a Mononoke behind the incident. At that moment, a mysterious man wearing a Noh mask appears, trying to take Ochou out of the prison...!? The sorrowful fairy tale of a Mononoke who fell in love and the criminal Ochou, now begins—.

Genres: Oneshot, Monsters, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Bake Kitsune no Shuushin
Description: Mythical kitsune Yuugo Izumo is obsessed with scaring the unscarable Kamogawa using his transformation magic! But what lessons about deception and hiding one's true self will both of them learn when faced with their school's most manipulative bullies...?!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
Title: Gal ni Yasashii Otaku-kun
Description: Otakura is a high school boy who's clearly an otaku, and Narumi is a high school gal. Normally, these two polar opposites would never cross paths, even at school. But by a strange coincidence, it turns out Otakura is able to use his inherently handy nature to help out Narumi with her own hobby-related requests, one after another?

Genres: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Drama, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: My Hero Academia: Vigilantes
Description: In the world of Kouhei Horikoshi's Boku no Hero Academia, nearly everyone in the world has powers known as "Quirks". Normally, the law enforces the rule that citizens cannot use their Quirks out in the open, and that privilege is reserved only for registered superheroes. However, a select few have chosen to reject this rule. They are known as vigilantes - people with the hearts of heroes, but the reputation of villains. This is their story.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: No Gyaru in This Class
Description: Mirei, a diligent honor student, longs for the flashy, fashionable ‘gyaru’ lifestyle she admires in manga. With newfound courage, she decides to give herself a makeover and reinvent her image upon entering high school. There, she meets Yushin, a rough-around-the-edges boy, and… they hit it off?! Shigure Tokita, the author of *Don’t Blush, Sekime-san*, presents a classroom comedy that unfolds around this fateful encounter!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Chigau Miyahara Omae janai!
Description: The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780)) ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)

Genres: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama
Title: Nengara Nenbyaku Ansatsu Renka
Description: The Haiboshi family's line of work is assassination. Takatori, their princess, picks up a boy named Raika who swore to dedicate everything.

Genres: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Yama, Kaimashita ~Isekai Gurashi mo Warukunai~
Description: When I bought a mountain, I never expected it to be from another world! And while I was leisurely enjoying a countryside life suited to this strange realm, I unknowingly began making the mountain more powerful!? (Source: Amazon JP, edited)

Genres: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Music
Title: Goze Hotaru
Description: After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze”, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling…!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy
Title: 7-Nin no Nemuri Hime
Description: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Crossdressing, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Saikyou Yuusha Party wa Ai ga Shiritai
Description: The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!! The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha
Description: Never having known the warmth of family, he was reborn in another world. Named Yuri, he is doted on by his parents and lives a new life in peace – as it should be. However, the country where Yuri and the others live is threatened by the “other humans” who dominate the vast expanse of the continent and is in danger of dying. Yuri and his family can’t stay out of it and are caught in the middle of the war… The Knights' House, the sword of the kingdom that wields a lance and kakedori birds. The death of his uncle, who was the leader of the Hovu family, brings Yuri’s father back to the world of knights, who had left the house to hate killing each other. Yuri is forced to attend the Knights’ Academy, where knights are trained, and the encounter there will drastically change the fate of Yuri and the kingdom. This is the story of a man who fights for the people he loves and later became known throughout the world as the “Demon King.” --- As a self-professed no-lifer, Yuri idles his days away in front of a computer. This all changes the moment his life in Japan comes to an abrupt end and he finds himself reborn in the strange new world of the Shiyalta Kingdom. His new life includes everything he once lacked: loving parents, a comfortable home, and a promising future breeding and raising birds on his dad’s ranch. For centuries, the kingdom he now calls home has enjoyed peace and prosperity, shielded by friendly nations that, like Shiyalta itself, were established with the collapse of a once-great empire. War is a distant problem, relevant only to Shiyalta’s ruling families whose warriors periodically set out to join the fighting upon massive birds trained by Yuri’s dad and others. But this peaceful existence can’t last forever. Something rotten lies at the heart of the kingdom, and it doesn’t take someone with Yuri’s exceptional intelligence to realize that those distant battles will only remain irrelevant for so long.

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Utsuranain desu
Description: A high school boy who sees things that shouldn't be there encounters an enthusiastic girl from the occult research club. (Manga Mogura)

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun o Tanoshinde Iru
Description: Nora, who had been sealed for 800 years for threatening to destroy the world, was very bored. One day, she heard the voice of a girl—Cecily—wishing to die, and was awakened. By that time, she'd grown feeble, and her body had shriveled. Thus, Nora proposed to Cecily. "If that's the case, would you lend me your body? In exchange, I promise that in a year, you'll have a friend, a lover, a warm family, and promising future prospect for your perfect restart!" The "Incorrigible Villainess," Nora, was resurrected in the body of the "Withered Grass Lady," Cecily.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Monster Stein
Description: A few decades back, humanity went to war against strange beings such as werewolves and witches, and was on the verge of defeat. The solution to breaking this deadlock was the human weapon created by Dr. Frankenstein. Time passes, and Vic, a mysterious girl, is traveling with Stein, a large man covered in scars. All in order to destroy the distorted principles of this world.

Genres: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Mao
Description: The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate." (from ebookjapan): Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era! The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins! --- Official Release: - English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao) - Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison
Description: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Class no Bocchi Gal wo Omochikaeri Shite Seisokei Bijin ni Shite Yatta Hanashi
Description: On a rainy night, Akira Akamori, a high school student about to transfer to a new school, saw his blonde classmate, Aoi Soutome, standing in the park drenched from the rain. "...I don't have a home anymore." Though Aoi was a complete stranger to him, Akira couldn't leave a girl alone, so he took her home. "Thanks for the help." "I-It's fine..." When Akira heard about Aoi's complicated situation, he decided to help her and let her live with him until he transferred to a new school. While confused by their new cohabitation arrangement, the two slowly grew close to each other. It is a love story of two people who repeatedly come together and drift apart, like a spinning record.
