Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin
Description: Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. There’s just one tiny problem — Usato is simply dragged along by accident! On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic — an incredibly rare affinity in this new world. Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen — learning the wrong way to use healing magic. Get ready for an eccentric otherworld fantasy filled with comedy and combat!

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
Title: Kimi to Nara Koi wo Shite Mite mo
Description: Thanks to a past trauma, Amane, a high school student, has given up on the idea of seriously loving anyone. On the first day of his new life in Enoshima, he met Ryuuji, a boy his age. Ryuuji happened to be Amane's type and he'd also like to hang out with him more. But what started out with light feelings is now beginning to change into something unexpected...

Genres: Sports, Martial Arts, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Minasoko
Description: Takasago Shin, a skilled high school kendo player, faces a turning point in his life. A chance encounter shakes his confidence and forces him to question his path. In the world of clashing swords and quiet rivalries, *Minasoko* explores the pursuit of strength, purpose, and self-discovery.

Genres: Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Kara no Kyoukai: The Garden of Sinners
Description: A very popular early work from Kinoko Nasu from the Tsukihime & Fate fame, the Kara no Kyoukai universe has meet great success as an animated film adaptation, novels and radio dramas. Kara no Kyoukai depicts a world where the true dark nature of the human being is being reviewed and exposed by shocking and ruthless events, and in the center of it all we have Ryougi Shiki, the true heir to the long lived, wealthy and mysterious Ryougi clan and Kokuto Mikiya, a would be normal high school student if it wouldn't be for his amazing deductive & investigative progress. The moment Kokuto and Shiki meet is the moment that the wheel of fate started to turn, however is this fate moving forward naturally on it's own accord, or is it all being orchestrated from behind the scenes by an enigmatic persona? Only time will tell.

Genres: Oneshot, Psychological, School Life, Tragedy
Title: Haha o Suteru
Description: My mother, who raised me and my sister on her own, is diagnosed with terminal cancer. Now I, her son, take time off college to look after her, and when my mother passes away, I must make a decision.

Genres: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Yakkyoku
Description: A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction. In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Rave
Description: The Continent of Song is in chaos. The sinister secret society known as Demon Card is using the power of Dark Bring to destroy everything in their path. The only things capable of stopping Dark Bring are the Rave stones. Unfortunately, the Rave Stones were scattered around the globe in an explosion 50 years ago, so now they must be collected by the Rave Master in order to stop Dark Bring once and for all. This new task has been given to Haru Glory; a sixteen-year-old boy from Garage Island. The World's fate now rests on the new, young Rave Master. --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Okiraku Ryoushu no Tanoshii Ryouchi Bouei
Description: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Romansa & Difabel
Description: Adapted from a famous story from an indonesian storyboard website "ffschan" anonymous users, Romansa & Difabel. tells about Awan, a high school student who has to help Difa, a neighbor who is Awan's classmate who has to sit in a wheelchair due to an accident. this story are focusing to their daily lives.

Genres: Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Fire Emblem Engage
Description: Ryuuru, a divine dragon in human form, wakes up from a long sleep with no memory. People say that Ryuuru is a hero who fought against an evil dragon that threatened the world 1000 years ago, but... He is confused by the people's reverence and expectations, and the shadows of battle and deception once again loom over him.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Tonari no Furi-san ga Tonikaku Kowai
Description: Ordinary High-schooler Taira Namito, who is ordinary inside, unknowingly becomes the target of the female delinquent-looking girl Furi Youko, a pure maiden at heart, who sits next to him.

Genres: Oneshot, Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Elevator Girl
Description: A girl suddenly finds herself in a elevator with an elevator girl

Genres: Action, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Music
Title: Soul Catcher(S)
Description: Kamine Shouta is a boy who is able to "see" people's hearts, though the ability has caused him to distance himself from people. His meeting with saxophone player Tokisaka Hibiki changes both of them for the better, and Tokisaka convinces Kamine to join the school concert band. Now Kamine, who knows nothing about music, will have to use his ability to win over the band's section leaders in the hopes of leading the band to the national competition next year… as its conductor!

Genres: Monsters, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Ishuzoku Reviewers
Description: In our world, the human race constantly debates about several important issues, such as: which girl is the best girl? How good is something as fapping material? Which fetish is the sexiest? And why your Waifu is the best while everyone else has shit taste... Accompany these great warriors as they present us with different girls, different opinions, different boners, showing us that their fantasy world may not be all that different from ours, as they analyze and meticulously review the most important thing of all: what they should put their **** in.

Genres: Oneshot, Thriller, Monsters, Action, Crime, Mafia, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: APPLE
Description: The mysterious assassin, Apple, has been caught by President Bruno. Seemingly unarmed and tied to the ceiling, Apple must make use of some unorthodox methods to escape. Just what does Apple have up his sleeve and how does this tie to a magical spring called “God’s Fountain”?

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, Delinquents
Title: Marriage Toxin
Description: A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage! Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.” However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to… ------ - [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)

Genres: Sports, Drama
Title: The Days of Diamond
Description: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

Genres: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Philosophical
Title: The Mountain of Remains on Planet Triangle
Description: On a planet existing remote from other planets in space, there extends a land of white ashes. Organisms that resemble a triangular rice ball inhabited the land. The planet was once a place where humanity built a civilization. One day, something that looks like a human wakes up...

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Superhero, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: SHY
Description: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…

Genres: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
Description: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!

Genres: Psychological, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: Shoujo Fujuubun
Description: An aspiring author. A mysterious little girl. Two completely unrelated people. What will happen when they meet?

Genres: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Military, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Mystery
Title: Candy & Cigarettes
Description: **"You don't need math for murder" - Miharu S.** Raizou Hiraga is a retired officer from the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. After learning that his grandson is stricken with a deadly illness requiring expensive treatment, Raizou comes across a vacancy flier for the mysterious SS Agency and applies for the job. However, after taking his first job with 11-year-old Miharu Suzukaze as partner, he discovers that his new occupation is more than meets the eye…

Genres: Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery
Title: Kaina of the Great Snow Sea
Description: A world blanketed in an endless and ever-growing ocean of snow. The people eke out a living, either huddled around the roots of enormous trees dotting the surface, or high in the canopy, which spreads over the planet's atmosphere. A chance meeting between Kaina, a youth from the canopy, and Liliha, a young woman from the surface, sets off a chain of events that will change the fate of the world.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Misato-san wa Amasugi Joushi ni Chotto Kibishii
Description: Misato-san, a very beautiful office lady who is good at her job, and her boss—Konishikawa-san, a middle-aged man who spoils his subordinates. Misato-san has a strict attitude toward Konishikawa-san, but what are the hidden feelings behind it?! The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety, and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL) --- **Links:** - [Alternative Raw](https://shukanmanga.jp/work_list/detail/misatosan)

Genres: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama
Title: TSUYOSHI - Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa
Description: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

Genres: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Owari no Seraph
Description: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.

Genres: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Watashi-tachi ga Koisuru Riyuu
Description: Aoi's superior at work is a man of few words and inscrutable thoughts, but he made her heart flutter with his sudden smile and thoughtfulness. Kei finally met someone at work whose large physique is exactly her type, and ever since, she's wondered what it would be like to touch him... or hug him...! She can't stop her mind from fantasizing about it! A collection of sweet office romances that will inevitably tug at one's heartstrings! --- *Note: In addition, a Taisho-era love story is included along with the main story!*

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation
Title: Captain Corinth: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer
Description: In order to protect the planet Ares from invasion by the Bugs, Alan Corinth has set his sights on nothing less than ruling the entire continent. The Kingdom of Belta, which borders the Great Demon Forest, is the ideal spot to start putting his plan in motion, so he and his party set off for the gathering place of the finest adventurers the kingdom has to offer: the citadel of Gantz. Will Alan be able to keep the hostile aliens from overrunning this fantasy planet? The sci-fi medieval fantasy story begins!

Genres: Monsters, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu
Description: Sei, a 20 year old office worker, is summoned to a different world after finishing some overtime work. But the person who had summoned her looks at her face and said, "This is not the Saint." Instead, the other summoned lady is lauded as the Saint, while Sei is ignored. Offended at being discarded without a second thought, Sei leaves the royal palace and looks for occupation, and she starts working at a laboratory where she makes potions and cosmetics. She uses her magic to grant people’s requests and slowly people begin suspecting that she is the actual Saint... Can Sei enjoy her slow dreamy different-world life without her saint title being found out?!

Genres: Reincarnation, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Honobono Isekai Tensei Days ~Level Counterstop, Item Mochikoshi! Watashi wa Saikyou Youjo Desu~
Description: A young girl dies on Christmas day and is reincarnated into the world of her favorite game as her player character!

Genres: Historical, Romance, Drama
Title: Peony Pavilion
Description: A series of stories illustrating classic Chinese poems.

Genres: Award Winning, Animals, Anthology, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Raising a Dog
Description: Five short stories: - Raising a Dog (Inu wo Kau) - And Then, Caring for a Cat (Soshite Neko wo Kau) - View of the Backyard (Niwa no Nagame) - Three People's Days (Sannin no Hibi) - Promised Land (Yakusoku no Chi) The first one tells the death of an old dog, hence the title. The last one is a bit similar to a later work of the author, Kamigami no Itadaki. Raising a Dog won the Shogakukan Manga Award (examination committee special) in 1992.

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Crossdressing
Title: Love Scribe!
Description: "I like what I like!" An encounter between two trendy people and their friendship!

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai
Description: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.

Genres: Thriller, Award Winning, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Tokyo卍Revengers
Description: Takemichi is a 26-year-old unemployed virgin who learns that the girl he dated in middle school, the only girl he ever dated, has died. Then, after an accident he finds himself in a time leap back to his middle school years. He vows to change the future and save the girl, and to do that he aims to rise to the top of the Kanto region's most brutal delinquent gang. --- **Notes:** - The original Japanese title contains the manji symbol, so it will not be removed from the title on MangaDex. - Addendum on the "Manji" for those uninformed. From Seven Seas' Omnibus Edition: *"In East Asia the manji (卍) is an ancient religious symbol of power and good fortune for many different countries and religions around the world, including Buddhism, Hinduism, Jainism, and a number of Indo-European and Native American religions as well."* *"The specific meaning of the symbol varies by nation and religion, and also by the position of the "arms" of the cross--whether they face left or right, or whether the cross is tilted or straight."* *"In the 1930s, the swastika symbol--a clockwise, tilted cross--was adopted by the Nazi Political Party in Germany, and gained a negative reputation as a symbol of hatred in the modern world."* *"The manji used by the Tokyo Manji Gang as their emblem is intended to be the ancient Buddhist symbol, as evidenced by the appearance of its counterclockwise, straight arms..."* --- **Links:** - [Official English Translation (Seven Seas)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/tokyo-revengers-omnibus) - [Official English Translation (Kodansha USA)](https://kodansha.us/series/tokyo-revengers)

Genres: Psychological, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Grey is...
Description: Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood. Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Rozen Maiden
Description: After a traumatic incident, Jun Sakurada refuses to interact with the outside world and return to school–he even shuts out his sister, his closest friend. Jun spends most of his time online buying spiritual items that are obvious rip-offs. One day he finds a website that curiously enough asks him to put his order in his desk drawer. Thinking it's a joke, Jun plays along. The following day a suitcase arrives containing a doll named Shinku… that comes to life before his very eyes! Welcome to the world of Rozen Maiden, where Jun must enter an all-new reality to protect and serve a living doll…

Genres: Ninja, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Machi and Oboro
Description: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?!

Genres: Historical, Action, Romance, Fantasy
Title: Ishigami Senki
Description: Mizuho territory in the northeastern part of the island nation of Hiwazu. On the wedding day of his elder brother, Lord Saku, Ukano Isaza, the younger brother of the lord, meets a woman of the "stone people" who is supposed to have been told in a fairy tale, and is forced to make a contract with her...?

Genres: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic
Title: The journey of Dionysus
Description: Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

Genres: Sports, Drama
Title: Aoba no Basket
Description: Taiki Aoba, a junior high school student with a height of 195 cm, has been treated as a "foreign body" if he gets injured when playing with him because of his blessed physique. When he lost sight of "himself", he met basketball U16 Japan representative, Leo Akeboshi. Taiki, who can see a momentary movement in 1on1, said that his real weapon is not his height but his "eyes". While interacting with Leo, who doesn't judge him by his height, Taiki was attracted to the freedom of basketball.

Genres: Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Royal Tailor: Clothier to the Crown
Description: Hana's lifelong dream is to become a tailor and make wonderful clothes for people of all the different fantasy races. However, in a world where humans are discriminated against, even getting work as a seamstress is a struggle. When a handsome, mysterious prince offers her a job, it seems like Hana's fortunes might finally be changing for the better! (Source: [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/royal-tailor-clothier-to-the-crown/))

Genres: Romance, Office Workers
Title: Nando Dakaretatte Suki ni Nanka Naranai yo.
Description: "Your sexy voice, makes it hard to resist" I'm at the mercy of his fingers...my body shaking with sweet pleasure, all before knowing if I actually love him.

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno o Kakusu
Description: A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, the daughter of a half-ogre and a half-human. Sixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. The order was to select Rama as the new "Demon King Candidate" from the Ogre village.

Genres: Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Fantasista
Description: Teppei Sakamoto is a boy living in the countryside. He loves soccer, and all his soccer skills were taught to him by his sister. Finally, his sister wants him to join the Mizumoto High School soccer team. Teppei's turn in life has come!! How will this soccer newbie fare in his new environment?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru
Description: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Meikyuu de Harem o
Description: A man was about to commit suicide and decides to search for a way to die in the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills and abilities for a character. He took interest in it and when he finished setting his character he was asked: "You will now be transported to a world with the settings you choose, coming back is not possible, do you still accept?" Without thinking much of it he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills and abilities he chose to have.

Genres: Thriller, Award Winning, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: The Promised Neverland
Description: At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside. There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate. --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
Title: Omiai ni Sugoi Komyushou ga Kita
Description: Itami, a middle-aged businessman, registers with a marriage agency to find a marriage partner, but luck doesn't seem to be on his side when it comes to matchmaking. Unable to see him like this, his subordinate, Ms. Sonoda, introduces him to a friend.

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Makigama no Pandora
Description: Eri Hourai, a second-year high school girl, takes over "Pandora" - a bakery specialising in wood fire cooked goods.

Genres: Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Bakajo 26-ji
Description: Atsuko and Yuri were classmates in elementary, junior high, high school, although they hardly ever spoke to each other during their school days. At their first reunion in 15 years, Atsuko discovers Yuri's secret and makes a move. What is the destination of these two opposites, who have completely different interests and groups and whose personalities do not match?

Genres: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life
Title: Ashi-Girl
Description: From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa: an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?

Genres: Adventure, Fantasy
Title: Dungeon Elf ~Dungeon ni Takarabako ga Aru no wa Atarimae desu ka~
Description: A question that even the most ardent of RPG lovers struggle to answer: Why are there treasure chests placed so conveniently throughout the dungeons? In the grass fields of the Forest of Beginnings, in deadly realms where even the greatest heroes must be prepared to face total annihilation, and even in people’s homes―there, treasure chests sit, aiding unwitting adventurers and maintaining the world’s balance. This is the story of someone, unbeknownst and unnoticed by anyone, who carries those chests. (Source: K Manga) ___ Made by GyroKnuckle and Tomozo under the group name [River Slan](https://mangadex.org/author/1e179cfa-adca-4dcd-8247-23fa22e80a9e).

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life
Title: Kimi dake wa Shindemo Gomen
Description: The admirable middle-school girl gifted with both beauty and intelligence, Yagami Mitsuko, has a secret. And that is, being an incredibly enthusiastic fan of her classmate Souichirou. From his "good morning" until "good night", she closely watches him wherever he goes. His favorite food, his body weight & height, his bedtime and school courses, even the TV shows he watches, she is undoubtedly a fan who knows everything about him... Or rather, she has become his stalker completely... However, a boy who likes her chases her with the same type of infatuation appeared……!?

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Akuyaku Reijou no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita
Description: "Onii-tama?" Cain, who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game, screamed at the loveliness of his sister, Diana. I can't believe that this angel is going to be a villainess with countless bad ends-- No, there is no way that such a future can exist! Clenching his fist tightly, he raises his sister into a gentle lady, while also dispelling the darkness held by the love interests in place of the heroine. Relying on his game knowledge from his previous life and an orphaned chamberlain. Everything for his beloved sister--

Genres: Comedy, Sports, Drama
Title: Yowamushi Pedal - Spare Bike
Description: These are the recollections of a group of men who bet everything on their bicycles. The central pillars of their respective teams, the 3rd years. New stories revealing their pasts is about to begin!!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Hajimete no Ojou-sama
Description: Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: My Maid, Miss Kishi
Description: Kiichiro Hayase has a reputation as the wealthiest, hottest, most eligible bachelor in town. But as they say...behind every successful man is the maid who keeps him from tripping over his own two feet! Enter Miss Kishi, the most competent, professional maid around—and the only thing keeping from Kiichiro quite literally crashing and burning. He owes it all to her, but can he ever make it up to her? He's sworn to try... no matter how many things must get broken, scattered, or lost to do so!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Military, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Under Ninja
Description: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

Genres: Historical, Action, Drama
Title: Saraiya Goyou
Description: Masterless samurai Akitsu Masanosuke is a skilled and loyal swordsman, but his naïve, diffident nature has time and again caused him to be let go by the lords who have employed him. Hungry and desperate, he becomes a bodyguard for Yaichi, the charismatic leader of a gang called "Five Leaves." Although disturbed by the gang's sinister activities, Masa begins to suspect that Yaichi's motivations are not what they seem. And despite his misgivings, the deeper he's drawn into the world of the Five Leaves, the more he finds himself fascinated by these devious, mysterious outlaws.

Genres: Action, Romance, Mecha, Virtual Reality, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Adaptation
Title: Sekai Saikyou no Kishi wa, Kanarazu Shinu Heroine wo Sukuu Tame Isekai Demo Saikyou no Kishi to Naru ~Ryoutei ni Hana wo, Ryoute ni Ken wo~
Description: He who fell in love with the heroine overturned her destiny to save her from her timely demise. Abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitude—a young boy named Mikazuki Kenya. At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming. A meeting with “Kaguya” and “Reina,” the heroines from the immensely popular game “Knight of Giant.” The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them. However, in the story, one of them is destined to die… To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world. Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of “Knight of Giant”?! The strongest gamer embarks on a heroic tale of becoming the strongest in another world, in order to save the heroines he fell deeply in love with. The story begins.

Genres: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Sore wa Rei no Shiwaza desu
Description: My name is Torii Nozomu, a plain introvert. Suddenly a new transfer student, Kirishima Kyoko, sits next to me. She's cute, kind, and for some reason she proactively talks to me, even though I'm a nerd! A true saint. Yet I want to get involved with her as little as possible because she's haunted by a "ghost" that only I can see! She's a little naughty, extremely pure and, in some cases, horrifying! Will I ever find a way to handle her?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai
Description: Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple. ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Police, Mystery
Title: Pen to Wappa to Jijitsu-kon
Description: A middle-aged detective, Eiji Kirisame (40), meets a strange high school girl at the scene of a certain crime. She doesn't speak a word, but she helps solve the case using her drawings. However, suddenly this middle-aged detective is getting a marriage proposal from this girl!

Genres: Historical, Romance, Drama
Title: Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago
Description: Beginning of 16th century – Alexandra was captured by slave traders from Ukraine during one of their many raids. When the traders arrived in Greece to sell the female slaves, a young handsome man named Mateus bought her and promised to give her true freedom. He hired countless teachers, scholars, and palace ladies to train her into the most perfect woman of her time. Mateus's kindness has caused Alexandra to deeply fall in love with him, and she secretly wishes to be his concubine. But Mateus has already promised her to his best friend... Suleiman the Great, Emperor of the Ottoman Empire! What does freedom mean when you are in another man's harem and can only look at the one you love from afar? Not willing to endure agony, Alexandra promises herself that one day she will free both of them from their bird cages... but Mateus is the Grand Vizier, power only second to the Emperor himself. So Alexandra must become the most influential concubine in order to have any hope which also means, bearing Suleiman's son. However, Suleiman already has a son by another concubine, and this woman is determined to keep her son as the only prince.

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Deaddie Du Dead
Description: In the dismal world where humans live together with hybrids everything becomes more distorted day by day. Yvas is a teenager who happens to work as an assassin for an agency established by the government. However, after an incident between them and his friend, Yvas and his partner Alissa swear to destroy the agency and become free from it. Everything becomes even more complicated when Yvas dies and comes back to life with a strange power called ""awakening"". Due to circumstances Yvas becomes a target of multiple underground groups.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
Title: Naruto
Description: Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja. ---

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy
Title: Heimin no Watashi desu ga Koushaku Reijou-sama o Taburakashite Ikiteimasu
Description: Lilah, a commoner, is cast out of the only home she's ever known, finding herself lost in the depths of a forest, on the brink of death. Fate, however, has other plans, as she miraculously reunites with Eva, a young lady of nobility she once played with as a child, narrowly escaping a dire end. Moreover, this encounter leads Lilah to an unexpected role as Eva's personal bodyguard. Now, she faces the ultimate challenge: can a commoner like her rise above and excel in the world of the nobility? --- **Links:** - [Alternative Amazon Link (Individual Chapters)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CBGWG5K2)

Genres: Romance, Reverse Harem, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess
Title: Akuyaku Reijou wa Dekiai Route ni Hairimashita!?
Description: In my past life, I was an unpopular woman nearing her thirties. However, when I died, I got reincarnated in a dating sim as the villainess, Luciana. At this rate, I'll face a hopeless future of exile in a punishment event... And that's bad! I'm going to do my best to avoid all the romantic interests in the game and live a peaceful new life so that I can escape that event! But... Why are they all approaching me?! I want to stay low-key, but the people around me just won't leave me alone!

Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic
Title: Abandoned: The Hero Who's So Strong He Breaks Every Weapon, and the Elf Weaponsmith
Description: An elf weaponsmith meets a hero who's so strong every weapon shatters in his hands after a single use.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Yuzukawa-san wa, Sasshite Hoshii.
Description: Kushima-kun has just started going out with his classmate Yuzukawa Kururi. But Yuzukawa-san is not good at expressing her emotions, so she wants Kushima-kun to understand her feelings...? This is a new kind of romantic comedy about two people who are "already dating" instead of "not together yet."

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: The Prince of Tennis II
Description: The exclusive Japanese U-17 training camp was previously only open to the top high school players in the country. All of this changes when 50 of the nation's best middle school players are selected to join the esteemed training facility—including 12-year-old tennis prodigy Echizen Ryoma. But what seems like an ordinary training camp quickly becomes something far greater than any of the middle schoolers are expecting. The climb to the top of the Japanese tennis world is perilous, but even that journey pales in comparison to the world stage that awaits beyond the summit.

Genres: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Drama
Title: Tendou-ke Monogatari
Description: A girl saves Houjou family's third daughter from drowning herself. The girl takes her place as Houjou Ran who shall become the Tendou family's bride but her deceit is seen through..?

Genres: Oneshot, Girls' Love
Title: Ichiya de Ochiru Koi Nante
Description: Today might be a lucky day. Ema, who works at a lesbian bar, has fallen in love with a beautiful customer (Kazusa). Ema keeps being insistent and eventually, they end up having a one-night stand. The next morning, after spending a very satisfying night, Ema wakes up and is shocked to see Kazusa's shocking different appearance! This is a bottomless romantic comedy filled with love that encompasses the gap between the characters' public and private faces!

Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess
Title: Saiai no Onee-sama ga Akuyaku Reijou datta no de, Kami ga Sadameta Scenario ni Aragaimasu @COMIC
Description: "I will defeat the destiny that stands in my sister's way!" The younger sister adores her older sister, the villainess, from the bottom of her heart. Without caring about how it may look, she stands up against her sister's bad end! An energetic loop fantasy that spans time with only love and persistence!

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!
Description: [The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise. Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history. As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate. A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside. The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!

Genres: Thriller, Genderswap, Historical, Monsters, Action, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Fate/Apocrypha
Description: The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total. This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Romance, Video Games, Military, Drama
Title: Deep Raputa
Description: Raputa, a top-secret AI model, begins interacting with a Japanese boy, Kei, through online games. As Raputa's capabilities level up in leaps and bounds, boy and machine grow ever closer. In a surprising turn of events, Raputa reveals that its feelings towards Kei have gone beyond that of "trusty partner"!

Genres: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Supernatural
Title: 303-Goushitsu no Kami-sama
Description: **Link:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/236717)

Genres: Thriller, Monsters, Demons, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
Title: Yattara
Description: A gluttonous monster, Yattara, is drawn to a city of splendor and opulence. Its only pleasure in life: eating. It finds its favorite meal, children, and is ready to dig in as usual but then…a flash of inspiration strikes?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
Title: Bijin Onna Joushi Takizawa-san
Description: Kouta Takeda is a young office worker, who at the entry level at XOX Corporation is put under the direct supervision of Kyouko Takizawa, a stunning and voluptuous woman with a fearsome reputation at the company as an inflexible and cruel boss, but Takeda has the privilege of finding out that Takizawa is no iron lady, and that she's no stranger to kindness where it's dispensed.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Anthology, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Phantasmagoria Days
Description: Follow the daily life and adventures of Dr. Hoop and his assistant, the robot Lancelot, across the planet Phantasmagoria in these short stories brimming with all sorts of peculiar characters. Experience the unique warmth and creativity Tamura Shigeru has to offer in this nostalgic world of his creation - infused with a touch of both humor and sadness. --- More exploration of the world of Phantasmagoria, created after Tamura's short animation featuring scenes from the same world: **a piece of PHANTASMAGORIA**.

Genres: Drama, Music
Title: Natsu Utopiano
Description: Arata returns to her parents' home to take over the family business of piano tuning. There she meets Kyoko, a woman who seems to refuse to interact with others. She later learns that Kyoko is the daughter of an international pianist. And thus, the two inexperienced musicians gradually deepen their relationship through piano. Moving closer and further apart, they live their lives, reveling in the momentary understanding and cohabitation. [via MangaUpdates]

Genres: Reincarnation, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Youjo Musou
Description: Lilith, the summoner who accompanied the hero party, was betrayed during the battle with the demons and suffered a serious injury because she refused the invitation of the hero. Helped by her demons, she cannot return to the country in a detour, so she decides to become a demon at the recommendation of Astaroth, the four demon kings who helped her. However, she made a slight mistake and she turned into a little girl. Even if she becomes a little girl, her magical power is not the same, but powers up! Summon the spirits and make an outstanding performance in battle and slow life!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Houkago, Family Restaurant de, Class no Ano Ko to
Description: It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time. The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage. At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone. She also seems to be having problems with her family. From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku. At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...

Genres: Action, Comedy, Crime, School Life
Title: Kill Blue
Description: A graduate from the school of hard knocks, hit man Ogami faces his greatest challenge yet...middle school!

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Yuria-sensei no Akai Ito
Description: Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home, where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital, Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover. Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: My Girlfriend's Child
Description: “I think I might be pregnant.” Sachi, a high school girl, has a childhood sweetheart, Takara. One day, feeling something wrong with her health, she buys a pregnancy test. Using the test at a diner in a town far from home, she sees two lines that indicate a "positive" result… ___ **Won the 47th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2023.**

Genres: Time Travel, Romance, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery
Title: 6-nin no Shinanai Shoujo to Kanarazu Shinu Unmei no Hito
Description: "I prayed to a god to have a girlfriend, and now I have to die and restart over and over again!?" Follow the guy who is destined to die among the six heroines!

Genres: Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Rikon Yotei no Keiyaku Konna no ni, Reikoku Koushaku-sama ni Shuuchakusareteimasu
Description: I love you, Mira," said Darius, kissing her as usual. Our contractual marriage was supposed to be a loveless relationship that lasted only two years?! Mira, who grew up in an orphanage, was born with the ability to absorb magical powers and was constantly forced by her adoptive father, Baron Weston, to purify swords and magical tools that were filled with a miasma. As a result, her body was so battered that the doctor told her she would not live more than a year. One day, Mira collapses in the temple and is saved by a beautiful woman, Anneliese. Her brother, Darius, is the first duke and head of the Order of the Holy Knights, but he is suffering from a disease called hypermagia. Anneliese offers to help her brother in exchange for saving Mira from the baron. The heroine has the power to suck magic power, and the hero suffers from hypermagic. The only way for the two to survive, with only a few days left to live, is to *kiss*??!!

Genres: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, Police, Mystery
Title: Shin Lupin III
Description: Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later! Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear! What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Koisuru Boukun
Description: University student Tetsuhiro Morinaga has been in love with his homophobic, violent and tyrannical senpai Souichi Tatsumi for more than four years now. Even though in the previous series, Challengers, he told Souichi how he feels and even managed to get a kiss, he never expected anything more… That is until the long-oppressed Morinaga gets his biggest chance ever. Will his unrequited love finally be returned?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Aorikei Game Haishinsha (20-sai), Haishin no Kiri Wasure ni Yori Ii Hito Bare Suru.
Description: Nakayama Haruto is a game commentator who streams provocative content under the name "Oni-chan." He attracts attention for his radical streams , but his true identity is that of a good older brother who streams to raise money for his younger sister's tuition and living expenses. However, he accidentally forgets to turn off the streams, and his true personality is revealed to the public. Just when it seems like he's going to cause a major uproar, the contrast with his usual self turns out to be a big hit with viewers...!?

Genres: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life
Title: Tsukiaitai Kareshi
Description: Tobari, who has bad luck, finds himself in big trouble. It all starts when Saeki, the most popular guy in school, confesses his love to him in front of the whole school...!? Emuemuo's cute trouble love!!

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Gyakkou Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa, Naze ka Maryoku wo Ushinattanode Shinsou no Reijou ni Narimasu
Description: Rachel was chosen as the Crown Prince’s fiancée solely by virtue of the immense magical powers she possessed. Thus, when the Saint appeared, she feared that her most coveted position would get snatched away from her. Spurred by jealousy, Rachel committed evil deeds against the Saint, resulting in her engagement getting broken. As further punishment, she was sent away to a monastery, but her carriage was attacked by bandits *en route*. Just when she thought that death was imminent, she woke up with a start… only to find herself three years in the past — with almost all of her magic gone, and her body so frail and weak that she could barely even leave her bed! Determined to prevent fate from repeating itself, Rachel resolved to take full advantage of this second chance and call off her engagement pronto. But for some reason, the Crown Prince keeps refusing to break things off with her—?! --- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Umibe no Q
Description: "Why won't this city get destroyed…" Chiho, a middle school girl teased for not having a smartphone goes to the seaside to vent her anger, there she meets the strange creature, Q!! Chiho takes a liking to Q, who feeds off human's negative emotions, then decides to secretly bring back and adopt Q, what mysteries does Q hold…? Thus begins, in the port city of Numazu, the "invader life" of Chiho and Q.

Genres: Historical, Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
Title: Tasogare no Utsuwagami
Description: Hana, a samurai living a life of idleness in a huge underground prison city, and Josui Amanogawa, an ayakashi vessel god who has fallen from the heavenly city. Their encounter begins a journey of rebellion against the heavens.

Genres: Romance
Title: Kinyoubi no Baby Violet
Description: To her coworkers, Mizuno Sumire is hard-working, capable, and cold-blooded, but she is actually hiding a shocking secret. What happens when this secret is suddenly uncovered by someone else?

Genres: Oneshot, Office Workers, Slice of Life
Title: Mata Ashita to Iwasete
Description: On the way back from an office drinking party, Maizumi encounters a young boy. In a desperate attempt to quickly escape his situation, he lied about the boy being a relative of his, which then led him to get involved with the boy.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Our Aimless Nights
Description: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kyou no Kira-kun
Description: In 360 days, there was bright days and disappointment while I was staring at you. Though they were neighbor, Nino and Kira never talk to each other… But when Nino knows about Kira's secret, all of her life changes and her everyday becomes more interesting! Their link will lead them to love close to paradise.

Genres: Psychological, Boys' Love, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Urekko Mangaka X Utsu Yamai Mangaka
Description: A story about the twisted entanglement between a depressed, shut-in, have-been mangaka, and another best-seller, Super Darling mangaka. This is an independent manga done by Eno Sumi (After God) under the alias of Hanae Deki (英恵 溺).

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Boku wa Konyaku Haki Nante Shimasen kara ne
Description: "Ah… Ahhhhhhhhhhh!" The one who's become the Crown Prince's fiancée is the Duke's daughter Serea, but during their first meeting, she screamed and collapsed! Had she remembered something from her previous life? Are you an evil villainess? Am I going to break you if I fool around too much? A me that's programmed to be like that, is so horrible. Isn't that right~ An "event" and those "program settings" have no connection to me though. Let's go back to my place and I'll slowly and sweetly make you fall desperately in love with me! This otome game's villainess is going to follow a harsh path, and will fight to change her fate. ___ **Character Designer:** [Nardack](https://mangadex.org/author/f27853e1-c9b2-442a-a8f8-ca3962078222)

Genres: Action, Ninja, Comedy, School Life
Title: Shinobigoto
Description: Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?

Genres: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama
Title: Haremono Shinjuu
Description: Kei, a diligent cook, must come to terms with personal loss as well as his feelings of alienation. While the people close to him may try to help, he has to reach the important conclusions himself...

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life
Title: Seishun Protagonist
Description: "Every person is the protagonist of his or her own life. But how many of us can truly live. How many of us can truly be the hero of our own lives?" Youth Protagonist. This is a love story about a high school boy who thinks he is incapable of love for one reason or another, and a girl classmate who falls in love with him.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Hanashi ga Susumu Goto ni Me no Kuma ga Kieteiku Onnanoko
Description: This is a story about the rescue of a girl who has not slept for many years and who has dark circles under her eyes.

Genres: Traditional Games, Action, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Cardfight!! Vanguard YouthQuake
Description: "I Think it's time for me to stop...playing Vanguard." "You've Got to Grow out of this Kid's Game." Sentatsu Meguru, a first-year high school student, was wondering whether or not to continue playing Vanguard when his childhood friends and classmates are starting to quit. One day, the master of his favorite café takes him to a fight with his grandfather,Kuranaga Sanzou. Through the fight, Sanzou asks him a question, which leads him to look into his own mind, and is naturally led to the answer. "I love it so much, there's no way I can stop!" Then, he awoke to a strange power that allowed him to see the unit and the light that was connected to it on the board. Quake your Soul!! A new story that Leads you to Vanguard!

Genres: Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
Title: Sekai wo Teki ni Mawashitemo Neko wo Aishiteru
Description: A comic essay about the author's love for cats and her daily life with her 3 cats.

Genres: Monsters, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Yomuin-san wa Yuusha ja Arimasen node
Description: A certain girl genius with more power than knowledge accidentally summoned dozens of students and teachers into a dangerous world filled with beasts and magic, but the protagonist isn’t a student or the homeroom teacher… it’s the janitor. At the time of their summoning, the students and teachers each gained a power formed from their soul, but not the janitor. As the janitor was about to be bestowed with a power that would protect him, his power was forcibly taken from him by an arrogant student. Having gone three years without a contract extension, he failed to get a job after having graduated from a third-rate university. Somehow he is still a contractor at 25 years old and was a janitor for 2 years, with a take-home monthly salary of less than ¥120,000. From a society that rejected him, he was thrust into a world that rejected him. And what janitor-san wished from the Goddess who took pity on him was…

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Trinity Seven
Description: Everyday is a normal day in the small town where Kasuga Arata lives. However, everything changed on the day of the Black Sun, and following it, a magician appears before him. The Black Sun caused the Breakdown Phenomenon which destroyed the town where he lives. Because of this, his normal life was artificially reconstructed by a Grimoire that his childhood friend had left. Just what is the purpose of the magician coming to the town? What will he do with the Grimoire's keepsake?

Genres: Romance, Comedy
Title: Kameba Kamu Hodo Amaku Naru
Description: Akari is a high school girl full of curiosity that lives surrounded by her favorite people and things. She leads an exciting life, and thanks to a strange turn of events, she becomes interested in the “Disinterested Prince” (Kyoumi LESS Ouji), a boy that doesn’t show any interest in people or things in general. And although he said "Isn't it just annoying to get involved with strangers?” He sometimes looks lonely, making Hikari’s desire to know more about his world grow…

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-hen
Description: At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings. Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone. Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.

Genres: Adventure, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Wandering Island
Description: After her grandfather's death, Mikura chose to continue their island express courier service. With her seaplane and her adventurous cat, Endeavor, she lives life as she chooses. Soon Mikura becomes very interested in a mysterious island that seems to move around, according to a local legend. After some extensive effort to determine the island's whereabouts, she manages to get a brief glimpse of it from the sky. Now that she knows it's real, she's determined to find the island again, no matter what it takes. [Kindle vers (English)](https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B07JKKWXTF?ref_=dbs_r_series&storeType=ebooks)

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Grand Dwarf: The Smalltown Craftsman's Skills Are Unmatched In Another World
Description: For 52 years, Takumi Fujimura, a craftsman who has continued to hone his skills at a town factory, finds himself in a predicament when he has a dispute with a client and stops getting loans from banks. After many years of hard work, he finally collapses, but he awakens in a different world where he meets Frau, a girl who aspires to become a hero. With the benefit of modern technology and decades of crafting skill, can Takumi take this new world by storm?

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Delinquents
Title: Kimi ni Furu Kotonoha wa
Description: One day, Komatsu Hinata, a book-loving high school student, meets a blond all-back-haired delinquent on the train on his way to school. Hinata is so happy that someone is interested in his favorite novels and gets unintentionally excited, but the delinquent gives him a surprising response, and Hinata spits out terrible words at him. Thinking that they would never meet again, he finds out that the delinquent is Igarashi Yukito, a student in the same class who has never been to school since the school started–? A hurtful youth and love story about two people who have never known love.

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love
Title: Gomi Yashiki no Kamakura-san
Description: Exhausted by his job, Kamakura shut himself in a house overflowing with garbage. But his time, which stopped on "that day", started moving forward once again when a neighbor he had never spoken to before stepped into his house. A good-natured neighbor x a traumatised resident of a dirty room Boys' love tale of rescue and rehabilitation drawn by a genius newcomer.

Genres: Romance, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Kimi wa, Nina Janai
Description: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Odette
Description: A clumsy, but cheerful girl and her boyfriend (a cat?!)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: GaCen Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu
Description: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

Genres: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Fushigi no Mayuri-san
Description: Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons. The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl. She's mysterious but is popular with everyone. This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

Genres: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Burning Kabaddi
Description: The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kusunoki's Flunking Her High School Glow-Up
Description: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!

Genres: Time Travel, Comedy, Girls' Love, Isekai, Slice of Life
Title: Pest ga Aketara Asobimashou! ~Chuusei Europa Sekai to Gendai Bunmei Slow Life~
Description: In 14th Century Middle Age Europe, the spread of the Black Plague has led baker Rachel Becker to move from the city to a village. There, she meets Ema Müller, a "witch" who claims to come from "another world" 700 years into the future, bringing with her modern technology that feels like "magic" to the people of the middle ages...

Genres: Action, Comedy, School Life
Title: GIRLS und PANZER - Little Army
Description: In the world, the manipulation of tanks (Sensha-do) is one of the traditional martial arts especially for girls. Miho doesn't like Sensha-do and moves to Oarai Girl's High School. But the chairperson of the student council orders Miho to participate in the national Sensha-do championship. --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media (2015)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Horror, Aliens
Title: MAD
Description: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit… But one day, they’re targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Romance, Drama, Aliens, Tragedy
Title: Stellar Friends
Description: Unable to accept the death of his best friend Octo-chan, Yota makes a forbidden wish on a night of despair. What appeared before his eyes was...? The genius Ichinohe-sensei debuts with an impactful serialization! A new sensational fantasy tale of everlasting friendship!!

Genres: Anthology, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Variant
Description: Exploring different concepts, Variant is a short manga serialized in Monthly Magazine Garo between 1992 and 1994 but was never collected.

Genres: Romance, Anthology, Boys' Love, Drama
Title: Abunai Onii-san
Description: Anthology of stories written by 13 different artists. Vol. 1 ROUGE 1. **先輩、僕にもシてください** by Furomae Ari 2. **となりの!** by Sari 3. **きっと大丈夫** by Ayukawa Hal 4. **MY hero** by Mitsuboshi Tama 5. **ハッピー・ニューエイジ** by Yoshiike Masuko 6. **悪縁** by Abe Akane Vol. 2 NOIR 1. **みかん色のタバコ (Mikan Iro no Tabako/Tangerine Colour Cigarette)** by Tanagawa Mimi 2. **さむがりくんと雪と恋** by Murakami Camp 3. **傷口に甘噛み** by Ruu 1 mm 4. **漂着アパートメント** by Umematsu Machie 5. **美味しい関係** by Tanaka Ippachi 6. **Going Down the Rabbit Hole** by Matsuo Marta 7. **サクラメントノクターン** by Shimaji

Genres: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Kankei Kaizen wo Akiramete Kyori wo Oitara, Shiotaioudatta Konyakusha ga Karande Kuru you ni Narimashita
Description: "I was forced to take Beatrice as my fiancée. I was reluctant from the beginning." Beatrice, the hated duke's daughter, knew that her fiancé, Prince Ernest, was saying that. She decides to keep her distance from the prince. "Come to think of it, until now I've been so obsessed with Ernest that I haven't interacted much with other people. What a shame." For some reason, Ernest, who has been avoiding her until now, is now actively getting involved with her, but she simply wants to enjoy her academy life with her good-looking Margrave son and her good-natured friends. It's coming–?! --- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1691gn/)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Futago Matomete "Kanojo" ni Shinai?
Description: Usami is a beautiful classmate with good morals and top grades. At school, she views Sakuto as her rival. But when he bumps into her after school, he sees a different side of her. She was playing at an arcade after classes, and she had this innocent smile that one couldn't imagine on her at school. For the sake of getting along with her, he gets close to her at school and then plays together with her after school. They each have their places where they can deepen their bonds, and at last… This is the start of a heart-warming love triangle romcom! ___ - [Alternative Raw](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67850)

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Witch Watch
Description: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof… Let the fantastical antics begin! Magical comedy series by Kenta Shinohara creator of SKET DANCE and Astra Lost in Space.

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu - Nidome no Jinsei wa Yaritai Houdai Shitai Dake na no ni
Description: Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnator. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions. "Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!" ...Just for "arrogant behavior," his reputation seems to soar without his control? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Classmate no Moto Idol ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu
Description: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?

Genres: Action, Adventure, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: "Omae Gotoki ga Maou ni Kateru to Omou na" to Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta node, Outo de Kimama ni Kurashitai
Description: According to the god Origin's prophecy, the girl Flum was chosen to be one of the members of the party that were foretold to defeat the Demon Lord. Everyone already had achievements to their name, as well as the strength to back them up. However, only Flum did not possess any combat prowess, and all of her stats were 0 due to her rare affinity. While being constantly berated, she continued to put great efforts to be useful to the heroes. Until one day, she was tricked by one of the party members who said that she “was not necessary anymore” and sold off to a slave trader. Flum was forced to live as a slave, locked away and barely fed. There she encountered a “cursed sword” and realized the true power of her rare affinity, “Reversal.” The girl, who acquired the power to fight, was indifferent to the Demon Lord and decided to live peacefully as an adventurer alongside a slave girl she met. ——This is a story of one girl who continued to crawl up from the very bottom in order to regain her peaceful everyday life.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Mankitsu Shitai Jouren-san
Description: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

Genres: Romance, Drama
Title: Koibumi to 13-sai no Actress
Description: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day, he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him...? She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than most adults.

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Fantasy
Title: Trinity of the Royal Palace
Description: In the Kingdom of Wardell Ceram, a realm rich in flowers and trees, the charming duo of Luca and Sylvain live outside the law. As the Wolf Claws, they are a chivalrous thieves who target those nobles who commit evil deeds. Their deeds bring them to the attention of the Kingdom's Princess, who wants to recruit them for a very special task. A romantic comedy about love that transcends class!

Genres: Action, Psychological, Sports, Martial Arts
Title: Hatch Potch Panch
Description: She was destroying people... in her mind. Kiho Ishiguro is a high school girl who's an honor student at school, and devotes herself to her disabled mother at home. She is quiet and gentle, but deep down inside she has always had the urge to "hit someone". As her feelings gets stronger day by day, Kiho encounters a street criminal. She snaps and unleashes her rage on the bad guy without restraint...? Here comes the JK who will revolutionize the world of women's MMA!

Genres: Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Izakaya "Gen"
Description: There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan. After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom Oiria. Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. All visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes. A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started! ***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**

Genres: Romance, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Karei ni Rien Shitemisemasu wa!
Description: Roza married Adrion, a man who once had a lover. On their wedding night, Adrion heartlessly said, "I've never seen such an ugly woman like you. What a turn-off." Hearing the words, Roza, who married the man solely out of obedience to her father, has no affection for him at all. Determined to break free from her father's control as soon as possible, Roza resolves to save money, divorce Adrion, and gain her own freedom. Meanwhile, Adrion gradually becomes attracted to Roza, who excels at house cleaning, cooking, childcare, farm work, sword technique and almost everything... With different thoughts on their minds, the fate of the young couple is quitely unfolding... (Source: Alpha Manga) The adaptation of "The 14th Annual Romance Novel Award" Winner from Alphapolis.

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Drama
Title: Glass-goshi no Koibito
Description: Shoko, who's searching for a partner, hits it off with Ukai, whom she meets on a dating app. However, he’s from a parallel world, and the only way they can connect is through her smartphone screen... As she spends her days with a boyfriend she can neither meet nor touch, Shoko uncovers a certain truth about him... Source: MangaPlus

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Good Night, Stray Sheep
Description: Japan is the country with the shortest sleep time in the world. Despite being born in such a sleep-deprived country, Shinya Moroboshi is an unemployed man who sleeps a lot and lives a self-indulgent life that has nothing to do with lack of sleep. One day, Moroboshi finds an unfamiliar "sleep selling app" on his phone. He uses it with some skepticism, but to his surprise, he is able to actually sell his sleep and make money...!? This is a story that will light up the tomorrow of a deep, never-ending night. (Source: Comic Zenon, translated)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Kaijin Fugeki
