Description: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
Title: Class no Inkya Ojousama no Shitsuji ni Narimashita
Description: My family abandoned me in the night leaving me behind, so I became the butler of the gloomy young lady in my class... --- Support the author by buying the manga in [Booth.pm](https://booth.pm/ja/items/4380401).

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Nichiasa Suki no Otaku ga Akuyaku Seito ni Tenseishita Kekka, Hametsu Flag ga Houkaishiteiku Ken ni Tsuite
Description: Yugo Kurei is a high school student that loves tokusatsu hero shows. One day, he loses his life protecting a child from a street slasher, but he is reincarnated in another world as Yugo Clay, a character from a certain game. However, Yugo is the most disliked person in the school and is destined to die tragically... He was reincarnated as a villain, but with the new power of magic in his hands, he aims to become a hero! "In this world, I can become the strongest hero!" A hero story of a tokusatsu otaku who rises from the bottom while crushing his doom flags!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Crime, Aliens
Title: Drama Queen
Description: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…

Genres: Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Houkago, Boku wa Kimi ni Naru
Description: Akiba, a high school boy who has become addicted to cross-dressing cosplay, devotes himself to emulating his "oshi." Then one day, while he was dressed up as his favorite character, all alone in the club room, he is found out by Shibuya, a gorgeous gal that he has a crush on...? This is the start of a secret relationship between these two polar opposites! They will apply their youthful enthusiasm to a life of "oshi promotion"!

Genres: Reincarnation, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Mizu Mahou Gurai Shika Torie ga Nai Kedo Gendai Chishiki ga Areba Juubun da yo ne?
Description: Frim, a 5-year-old orphan living in the streets of the slums district, was a Japanese person in her past life. Her everyday life was filled with violence and injustice, and she had no one she could count on for help. What she had is "Magic That Can Produce Water" and "Modern Knowledge", that was it. Even hoping for a roof to sleep under was a luxury under such circumstances. But the world was lacking in ideas about improving working conditions, and by coming up with new ways to use Water Magic aside from producing drinking water, Frim gradually makes a name for herself! (Source: Comic-Walker)

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy
Title: Kinsou no Vermeil ~Gakeppuchi Majutshi wa Saikyou no Yakusai to Mahou Sekai wo Tsukisusumu~
Description: A student at the magic school, Alto, who was on the verge of repeating the school year, accidentally found a book that activated a magic circle, and as a result, summoned the sealed devil Vermeil! Vermeil is a very unhealthy older sister with a power devastating enough to be called a disaster! ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/91)

Genres: Historical, Philosophical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: The Jeweler's Maid
Description: The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where “a maid sells jewels”. Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine. A tale spun by jewels and people. With dainty illustrations, a jewel-bestowing short story series.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Kyouryuu-chan to Kaseki-kun
Description: Rinko Shinobu may seem like a normal high school girl, but she is actually a hybrid between human and dinosaur. Although she usually stays in human form, sometimes her T-rex bits will pop out when she's distracted. The only person who knows her secret is the dinosaur nerd Kazuya Kobake, who tries his hardest to help hide her dinosaur form. But his distracting antics are drawing strange stares from their classmates and stressing him out… (Source: Natalie.mu, translated)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w
Description: After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!? I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me! This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead! (Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Legendary Me!
Description: Ozma, a former court magician, is executed for saving a girl, Felia. However, he is reincarnated in a world 300 years later. There, his previous life, in which he was supposed to have been executed, has left his mark on history with a series of feats of which he has no memory, and he has been praised as a god. Like a legendary hero! Adapted to Novel.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Puniru is a Cute Slime
Description: The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta [Jugushi] ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga, Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~
Description: Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment! Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Zombies, Adventure, Fantasy
Title: DEAD ROCK
Description: The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!! DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world. Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!

Genres: Psychological, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?
Description: This world has been invaded by bugs. With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs. One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company. Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs. "Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!" With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!

Genres: Romance, Reverse Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Kami-sama ga Koi wo shiro to Itte iru!
Description: Chiyoko, in her second year of high school, transfers to a co-ed school due to her dad's job transfer. Since she's only attended an all-girls school since junior high, she excitedly plans to fall in love in her new school. Out of the blue, she begins to see the love meters of 5 hotties and an options window as if she were in an otome game?! She encounters various types such as a glasses boy, a playboy underclassman, and a mysterious senior. Meet-cutes with boys come one after another. This is the beginning of a real otome game school life!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Yowa Yowa Sensei
Description: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy
Title: Orc no Shuhai ni Shukufuku wo
Description: Half-Orc Elpis and Margit, the daughter of a corrupt nobleman, go on an adventure in search of WHISKEY, left behind by the teleporter Tanaka!

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation
Title: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi
Description: A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing. Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono. This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed. (Source: Young Ace Up)

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Adaptation
Title: Dame Ningen no Itoshikata
Description: "No talent, no money, no education. A worthless person, bottom of the barrel." "But... just seeing you like that makes me feel so happy." Shinba, an unemployed young man, is what someone could call a useless person. For some reason, such a man is dating a cool and beautiful woman named Hizumi. For the sake of Hizumi, whom he loves very much, Shinba tries to graduate from being a useless person, but his efforts are always in vain. She ridicule, sneers and deny him. She whisper words of love to him and stays by his side.

Genres: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Tragedy
Title: Handyman Saitou in Another World
Description: Handyman Saitou has never been anyone special. All his life, he’s had average grades, ordinary athletic skill, a commonplace job… But his unremarkable path takes a turn when he wakes up in another world. Here, warriors, wizards, and elves accompany him on quests delving deep into dungeons, and Saitou realizes for the first time what it’s like to be needed. After all, who other than the handyman could be trusted to open locked treasure chests or repair his allies’ equipment? Beginning with a simple “thank you,” this is the story of an ordinary person’s fulfilling life.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
Title: ef - a fairy tale of the two.
Description: Hirono Hiro is a high school student, and secretly a shoujo mangaka, to all but his childhood friend and kouhai, Kei Shindo. One cold Christmas after meeting a mysterious woman in church, a strange girl steals his bike. Running after her, he finds her collapsed on the street. Learning her name is Miyamura Miyako and that her bag was stolen by a man on a motorbike, Hirono finds himself spending time with Miyako, much to the dismay of Kei…

Genres: Oneshot, Adventure, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Kyuuryuu Tsuugakuro
Description: A silent manga of a high school girl in Kowloon running on her way to school. A girl overslept, and is now in a hurry. Will she be able to come to school on time? (Source: BOOTH) --- * Alternative Official Raw - [BOOTH](https://ibsukionsen.booth.pm/items/5285886)

Genres: Demons, Romance, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: I Became the Demon King's Right Hand so I'm Corrupting the Story
Description: Office Lady falls from a building is reincarnated into another world and ends up at the Devil Kings castle. Can she save him from the bad ending?

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Mystery
Title: Smiley
Description: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Animals, Crime, Philosophical, Gore, Drama
Title: Taika no Risei
Description: As birth rates decline, in an effort to increase the total population of Japan, the country has implemented... a pet-humanism policy...? As more and more owners "humanize" their pets--having them become members of society--Japan begins to experience a hike in economic growth, as well as in increase in crimes committed by these "dogmen" and "catmen"... In the midst of such social unrest, what could possibly be of bigger concern to one cynical high school girl named Ao...?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
Title: Houkago Play
Description: In the Houkago Play Series: V.1: 4-koma about a high-school gamer and his bossy but tsundere girlfriend. V.2: About a gamer and his mangaka girlfriend. V.3: About a boy and a girl who are both gamers, though they play with different styles. V.4: R V.5: High Heels V.6: Maniax V.7: High Heels 2 V.8: High Heels 3

Genres: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Tada no Murabito no Boku ga, Sanbyakunen Mae no Boukun Ouji ni Tensei shite shimaimashita
Description: Prince Rudolf gained knowledge of the future 300 years from now during a near-death experience. He uses his wits to change the future in which he will be assassinated as a tyrant prince! Meanwhile, discrepancies between the story passed down to posterity and reality gradually emerge…

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Superhero, Martial Arts, Samurai, Military, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
Title: Sword Gai
Description: A woman dies a suspicious death in the forest. Her tragic child, Gai, is adopted by Amon, a master swordsmith. More than ten years later, Gai becomes Amon's apprentice, but loses his right arm in an accident while making a sword. Amon crushes the magical sword "Death Dragon" and rebuilds it as an artificial arm for Gai, but...? A young boy accepts a cruel fate in a whirlwind of battles. Is it darkness that lies ahead for him, or...?

Genres: Animals, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Pillow Fish
Description: I thought I could keep moving forward, but in an unexpected instant, I’ve lost myself in the gaps of this vast universe. Where have I seen this, this landscape that doesn’t exist? Right over there, in a time that will never come to pass. Welcome to the world of panpanya. The 22 chapters of Makura Uo, which include stories like Ame no Hi (Rainy Day) and Gomi no Sakebigoe (The Cries of Trash), were either serialized in the special web edition of Hakusensha’s Rakuen Le Paradis magazine or published as doujinshi. Included are entries from panpanya’s diary as well as annotations from the author herself. (Source: AniList)

Genres: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Machigatta Ko wo Mahou Shoujo ni Shite Shimatta
Description: While searching for a brave candidate to become a magical girl and defend the world from evil, a mythical creature finds Kayo Majiba, a cute young lady who seems like the perfect fit. But when this newly turned magical girl proves to be a crude delinquent who goes berserk in a conflict, it becomes clear that this may have been a terrible mistake. Now evil—and any innocent bystanders—will face the rage of a magical girl gone wrong!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Kuroko's Basketball
Description: Kuroko is a member from the legendary middle school basketball team known as -The Generation of Miracles-, and while nobody seems to know about him, the main 5 players of the team all admit that he is a better player. When he joins the high school basketball team, everyone is surprised to find out that he is small, weak, and easy to miss. What is the secret that makes him so strong, and how will he help his high school team? Official Release: - Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Kuroko's Basketball** (2013)

Genres: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life
Title: Komada-san wo Komarasetai
Description: Komada is a short high school girl who is constantly troubled with something. Her junior, Kagai, who is big in various ways, is always playing with her and annoying Komada! However, there is a reason why Kagai annoys her, and that is simply because... The more you love someone, the more you want to annoy them!

Genres: Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Tonari no Hyakkai Kenbunroku
Description: Something happens to Katagiri Jinpachi late one night when he unwittingly wanders into the youkai market. The only one who knows what it was seems to be one Harada Oriza, a famed painter of youkai portraits. But he is not talking, and Jinpachi only grows more frustrated and confused as he tries to return to the market and find out what he lost... or gained there.

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Hokenshitsu wa Futarikiri
Description: A collection of interconnected yuri stories in the nurse's office.

Genres: Oneshot, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Slice of Life
Title: Good Morning Ladies
Description: "Good Morning Humans!" It has been exactly 20 years since the earth was 'almost' destroyed by the abnormal evolution of wild animals. This is a story of three women who live poignantly today. *Collected in Gusty Gritty Girl, an anthology of one-shots by the mangaka*

Genres: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: 3-Gumi no Osananajimi
Description: Depicts the journey of three sets of childhood friends - 'childhood friends with a physical difference,' 'childhood friends who are conscious of height differences,' and 'childhood friends with an age gap' - until they start dating.

Genres: Romance, Mafia, Drama, School Life
Title: Ojou to Banken-kun
Description: Senagaki Isaku will be a first year high school student starting in spring. Her grandfather is the third head of the Senagaki group, a yakuza organization, so she is feared by those around her. However, starting from spring, she hopes to make normal friends and normally fall in love. She is admitted into a high school further from her hometown, however, the overprotective young head of the Senagaki group, Utou Keiya, (26 years old) falsifies his age and enters the school with her through a backdoor admission…?! Keiya proclaims that love is too early for her although Isaku is perfectly ready. In truth, she has held an unrequited love for Keiya for quite some time.

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Mahou Gyoushounin Roma
Description: Roma is a mysterious girl that is on a mission to collect “human greed” through the use of various magical objects that have unique powers. When humans use these magical items to satisfy their own personal emotions, such as love, their greed level increases and Roma is able to steal their excess greed. The people that use Roma’s objects seem to always let their greed destroy themselves, putting themselves in a worse situation than before.

Genres: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Yuusha Party ni Kawaii Ko ga Ita no de, Kokuhaku Shite Mita
Description: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight...

Genres: Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Seeds of Anxiety*
Description: Continuing in the same vein as previous installm*e*nts, a new collection of "everyday horror" vignettes, organized around them#$@*es.

Genres: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita
Description: Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru. ___ [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)

Genres: Award Winning, Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama
Title: Gates of Carnage
Description: The story follows a young Karate practitioner named Tsukumo Mutsu, 40th master of the deadly Mutsu Enmei Ryu style. --- - **Won the 14th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1990** - [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BF%AE%E7%BE%85%E3%81%AE%E9%96%80)

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai
Description: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.

Genres: Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Osoto Gohan wo Goisshoni
Description: Fuuka, a college student who enjoys cooking but is confined by her apartment's small kitchen, meets Yomogi, a wild outdoor girl who isn't particularly good at cooking. Their outdoorsy meal that started by chance is somehow very delicious and heartwarming.... This is the start of a gourmet outdoor manga about two women helping each other out!

Genres: Romance, Comedy
Title: Idol Yamerukedo Kekkon Shitekuremasu Ka!?
Description: Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion! Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...! "Marry me..." What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?

Genres: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life
Title: Boys Over Flowers
Description: Eitoku Academy is a school that caters to children and from rich, high-society families. Hence, Makino, who comes from a poor family, is considered by others as the "weed" of the school. The school is ruled by the "Flower Four" group, more commonly known as the F4. The F4 leader, and son of the wealthiest, most powerful family in Japan, Domyouji Tsukasa, takes an interest in Tsukushi because she is the only girl at Eitoku who does not fawn over him. However, his hot-headed nature and bullying ways are originally a major turn-off for Tsukushi, who has her sights set on Rui Hanazawa. Volume 37 is comprised of three short stories that happen after the ending

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Tsumi to Batsu no Spica
Description: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.

Genres: Reincarnation, Demons, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic
Title: Tsuihou Sareta Maou wa Chikyuu wo Mezasu!
Description: Exiled by her own kind and sealed by a hero, the demon lord is finally revived after an eternity. She awakens in a wasteland, with a dark sky full of twinkling stars. The air feels thinner, and her body strangely light… After gathering herself and trying to sense the hero’s presence, it seems the hero is on a distant blue planet in the sky...? She doesn’t know exactly where she is, but one thing is certain: the demon lord will fight to defeat the hero!

Genres: Comedy, Survival, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: The Prince of Tennis
Description: Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team. Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Tragedy
Title: Tsugihagi Darake no Saikyou Yuusha
Description: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.

Genres: Oneshot, Psychological, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: In the Shadow of Skyscrapers
Description: "Mr. HPL! Have you decided?" --- Published in Fantasy Literature Journal Vol. 2 special issue: Cthulhu Club (1987).

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Shinigami no Hanayome: Yomei 7-nichi kara no Koufuku
Description: The reaper loves seeing the cries of humans before swinging down his scythe to reap their souls. He lives for the hunt of humans souls before their passing. Yet one night, he encounters a dying girl with flowers blooming in her room looking back at him with a smile. ___ **Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/bride-of-the-death-god)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural
Title: Sentaku no Toki
Description: During summer break, a junior high school student Mitsuharu collides with an unusual creature while speeding on his bicycle. That unusual creature was a genderless alien called Toki who came to Earth for a "purpose". An unpredictable story about a lonely human and an alien starts!

Genres: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Medical
Title: Mikazuki no Carte
Description: Touka Myoujouboshi is a girl who has been hospitalized her entire life due to a rare allergy to sunlight, and thus has not been able to experience love. To prevent Touka from ending it all, Doctor Yuki Tsukisu provides her with the ultimate prescription by acting as her girlfriend.

Genres: Action, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Silent Sinner in Blue.
Description: 東方儚月抄 (romanized Touhou Bougetsushou, meaning Eastern Ephemeral Moon Vignette) is a loosely interconnected storyline about the Lunarians that includes Silent Sinner in Blue, Cage in Lunatic Runagate, and Inaba of the Moon and Inaba of the Earth. --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Minami-ke
Description: *Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner. **Source:** MangaUpdates

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: My Girlfriend's Not Here Today
Description: It's a secret that I'm dating the love of my life at school. There's no way I can tell anyone, especially when we're both girls. But I can't help my feelings from slipping out in the background. It's not the ideal way to be a couple, but I can put up with it because I really love her... But such loneliness has also nurtured dark thoughts in my head.

Genres: Time Travel, Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Akujo Kyosei Keikaku
Description: "Hey, Seraphina. Even when you grow up, don’t end up killing me, okay?" The wizard Arvel meets his end at the hands of his former fiancée, Seraphina, who later became the emperor’s mistress and a notorious villainess. However, when he comes to, he finds himself face-to-face with a young Seraphina! Astonishingly, he has returned to being his 13-year-old self. Seeing Seraphina before she became a villainess, Arvel makes a resolution: he will raise her to become a proper person and save his own life. To start, he begins searching for a way to prevent the death of his brother, Sho, who was once engaged to Seraphina. However, the situation is far from simple, as he must contend with Seraphina’s neglectful family, men vying for the beautiful Seraphina’s attention, and a web of conflicting intentions. In this journey through time, can Arvel alter Seraphina’s fate and save her from becoming a villainess…!?

Genres: Romance, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Mahou Sekai no Uketsukejou ni Naritai desu!
Description: I'm aiming to be like Haare's number one receptionist onee-san! In a world filled with magic, from a young age, Nanari has always wanted to be a receptionist at Haare, just like that onee-san. Her parents told her she couldn't become one unless she enrolled in the kingdom's magic academy and became a top-class magic user. However, when she gets there she's surrounded by royalty and nobility. Nanari is determined to be the best amongst all the commoners! But the prince who sits beside her is always getting in her way! After graduating, Nanari successfully became a receptionist at Haare, but each day is far more hectic than what she originally thought would be! On top of all this, that annoying prince who continuously bothered her has found a job and…? --- [Official English Light Novel Translation](https://j-novel.club/s/the-sorcerer-s-receptionist) [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2056dv/)

Genres: Comedy, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: High Score Girl DASH
Description: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Duality of a Loving Heart
Description: A Romcon With a Girl With a Dual Personality

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Police
Title: Sirens Won't Sing For You
Description: Kanoha Takanashi is a descendent of Sirens and is infatuated with her classmate, Kei Shibuya. Torn between her feelings and the Siren's unique nature of yearning to eat the one they love, Kanoha musters up the courage to confess to him—only to get completely rejected on the spot! But what happens when she finds out Shibuya-kun's secret…? (MANGA Plus)

Genres: Monsters, Romance, Reverse Harem, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
Title: Captive Hearts of Oz
Description: Dorothy, along with her beloved dog Toto, finds herself whisked away by a cyclone to the mysterious land of Oz. Something about the strange place feels oddly familiar, but Dorothy just wants to go home. Following the advice of a kindly Witch, Dorothy must travel to the Emerald City and seek out the Wizard of Oz, who alone has the power to send her back to her world. Captive Hearts of Oz reimagines L. Frank Baum’s original Oz stories in a modern, shoujo style. Each volume in this ongoing series will be released in oversized editions, featuring impressive artwork and several full-color illustrations.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Adventure, Drama, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
Title: Nightmare Busters
Description: The stage of "Nightmare Busters" is Tokyo in 2034. In the streets, a strange disease of unknown cause, which made me wake up while sleeping, was rampant. One day, Ichijo, a salaryman who spends his days working hard, has a mysterious dream. In a dream, Ichijo meets a coma patient … This is the latest work presented by Akase of "Southern and Comet Girl" as a full analog drawing and all-color work. --- **Links**: - [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/akaseyuriko)

Genres: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Delinquents
Title: You, Aquarist
Description: A delinquent boy was out at a festival when he finds a discarded goldfish. Recalling his childhood experience of buying a goldfish from a festival stall and bringing it home only to have it die, he tries to make up for it by releasing the goldfish into the river. However, a mysterious girl stops him and tells him that it is not allowed to let out goldfish into the wild, and he learns how to keep goldfish at home and becomes a proper "aquarist."

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Adaptation
Title: Koori no Reijou no Tokashi kata
Description: Kagami Asahi: a blunt yet overly caring high schooler and Himuro Fuyuka: a classmate who never lets anyone near her, earning her the nickname "Ice Queen." These two never had any chances to meet, but from Asahi's meddling, the closed off soul of Fuyuka might just be showing change?

Genres: Romance, Drama
Title: Sekai no Hate wa Shinai
Description: Fuyuka is a female college student attending an art college in Tokyo, despite her parents' opposition. She feels guilty about leaving her younger brother, who has been supporting her in their strict family home, and running away from home by herself. One day, she is at her wit's end because she can't pay the rent, when her grown-up younger brother, Ameon, appears in front of her...! She is now living together with her brother, whose love is too heavy for her to bear!

Genres: Thriller, Self-Published, Horror, Mystery
Title: Fubar
Description: A totally normal countryside story involving a minor, an autistic asian mom, an eldritch horror, and the unspeakable - A Fr*nchman

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
Title: Encirclement Love
Description: Ryou had a sleepover and saw his friends - Issei and Tadahiro - kissing while they thought he was asleep. He asks them about it and feels betrayed as a childhood friend when they pretend nothing happened. Determined to catch them red-handed, Ryou ends up inside a closet with Issei's little brother, Yuusei, who has an unexpected reaction to the situation.

Genres: Romance, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.
Description: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life, Music
Title: Bremen
Description: Reiji and Kasuga head out to Tokyo to become the "Gods of Rock," but they seem to always attract trouble. On their way, Hayama Ryo and Fujii Ran join them in their quest. Despite its rockstar type look, this manga really is about action.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Yoriko from Hannari Girori
Description: The manga follows Shindou Yoriko, a 29-year-old Kyoto cigarette shop owner who has a sharp look in her eyes but is actually a kind-hearted person. It may not come across, but she truly loves the city of Kyoto, and is willing to give up some of her time to share that love with tourists and other visitors (as long as they don't get on her nerves).

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Witch Hunter
Description: Witches suddenly declare war against humans, causing two-thirds of the world to fall apart. They summon monsters called "Supporters" and devastate human residences… but why? Survivors gather people with the power to combat the witches and called them Witch Hunters! Tasha Godspell is one of the strongest nicknamed "The Marksman" along with his "Jack-O-Lantern" looking Supporter. He fights the witches but cannot really bring himself to hate them… --- **Note:** *There are no missing chapters between 93 and 119. There is a difference in chapter numbering between the volume and magazine chapters which caused the gap.*

Genres: Psychological, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Tragedy
Title: The Day of Salvation
Description: Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style. A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there…

Genres: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy
Title: Giant Ojou-sama
Description: I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge! Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion. When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact? *[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*

Genres: Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Seijo wa Tokku ni Shoukansareteiru. Nihon ni.
Description: She was supposed to have been summoned as a saintess, but instead got thrown into a country called Japan. Alexandra Ollier, a.k.a. "Rei Natsukawa", hides her magical powers and works as an office worker for a small company in modern Japan. "As long as I can live peacefully and uneventfully, this is fine." says Rei, who faces many small troubles standing in the way of her lifestyle. Follow Rei Natsukawa, a mage possessing high level magical powers, and her seemingly ordinary yet not-so-ordinary story... (Source: Young Champion)

Genres: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: The Homeless Saint in the Abandoned Park
Description: Alm, who worked at the temple as a saint, was physically and mentally worn out from the power harassment from the priest Johannes. However, one day, the thin thread she had been holding onto snapped, and she declared her resignation as a saint. Alm, who had run away from the temple, bought an abandoned park and decided to live a leisurely life there. On the other hand, the temple - which had lost their saint and was no longer able to function - was in a frenzy!

Genres: Traditional Games, Romance, Drama, School Life
Title: Hoshizora no Karasu
Description: Waka is a 13 year-old Go-lover! Learning from her grandfather, a pro go player, she comes to enjoy connecting with the people around her, regardless of age or gender. One day, she meets the young genius go player, Sagisaka Souji, in a match that tore at both body and soul, and so she decides to become a pro go player herself!

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: The Exiled Heavy Knight Knows How to Game the System
Description: "You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class?!" During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have. But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.

Genres: Demons, Comedy, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Black Channel
Description: A dark comedy for the modern era, from CoroCoro Comic! Enter Black, the "Demonic Yo-Tuber"! With his sidekick Camera-chan, and the aspiring 5th grade Yo-Tuber Satoshi, he makes all kinds of crazy videos using his demonic powers. Filming the "true natures" of anyone from top honor students, to class idols, to supernatural monsters, he makes crazy videos with his demonic powers! What will Black film next...?

Genres: Genderswap, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Kare to Kanojo no Sentaku
Description: A new relationship begins after a seven year reunion! After being separated for seven years between Hokkaido and Tokyo, a young man waits at the airport to reunite with his best friend. However, what arrives instead is a message from his best friend saying he will be late, and a mysterious beauty! The ever-spirited mangaka, Hiroki Ohara, makes his debut on Comic Newtype!

Genres: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
Title: King of the Ants
Description: A talented nobody feels as if there's no challenge to him in this life. He feels as if life is too easy. But little does he know, his background actually holds more than he ever wished for. Can he face his destiny and accept what has been laid before him?

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Itsudemo Jitaku Ni Kaereru Ore Wa, Isekai De Gyoushounin O Hajimemashita
Description: "Won't I be able to get filthy rich if I use this skill?" Continually exploited at work, Amata Shirou quits his job and moves to his grandma's house. When he finds out that it's connected to another world, he comes up with a plan to set up a business selling Japanese goods. The story of a man getting rich using his skill that converts the currency of the other world to Japanese yen and so forth.

Genres: School Life, Slice of Life, Music
Title: Nadeshiko Doremisora
Description: Miya Nekoma made a bold high school debut in an attempt to change from her once "infamously" boring self. As a part of the change, she decided to join the school's Light Music Club, but on her way to sign up she is intercepted by the energetic shakuhachi flute player Hiyo Takemi who introduces her to the world of Wagakki, or traditional Japanese instruments. After the two attend a concert from one of Japan's leading traditional/modern fusion bands, Miya becomes enamored with the Tsugaru-shamisen, a three stringed lute. With Hiyo by her side, Miya delves into the world of traditional Japanese music as new acquaintances and friends help to make her dream of sharing the sound she loves a reality.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Hanitora! Shoukan Yuusha wo Hameru Honey Trap Hoi Mou
Description: After defeating the evil god with his companions, Yuuri's adventure had come to a term. All that remained was for him to go back to the world he came from... or so he thought, but it seemed like he would have to stay here?! Now that he has to live in this world, Yuuri isn't sure what to do next and fears remaining a NEET. In the meantime, the princess Lunaria, who knows Yuuri has little interest in power or luxury, sets up a honey trap as part of her plan to make the hero never leave her country.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
Title: Nagisa no Shark Maid
Description: Wataru is a lonely boy who lost his parents in an accident. For some reason, there is one maid—her name is Kosame, and she has been by his side since he was little. Yes, she never changed... Set in a unique coastal fishing village with rows of houses called "boathouses," a love story of eternal love begins! (MTL) --- **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM05203826010000_68) and [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62407)

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Lv2 kara Cheat datta Moto Yuusha Kouho no Mattari Isekai Life
Description: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Cryroad as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenris of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Fulio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.

Genres: Demons, Romance, Ninja, Comedy
Title: Oshinobi Dousei
Description: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!

Genres: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Outaishi-sama, Watashi Kondo Koso Anata ni Korosaretakunain desu!
Description: The poverty-stricken noblewoman, Liesel, was murdered by her lover, the crown prince, in an elaborate ruse set up by the evil saintess. However, she receives a second chance to live as she suddenly wakes up as her childhood self. She takes this event as a chance to change her life, and live without ties to both the crown prince and the saintess, but by a strange twist of fate, she becomes entangled with the saintess's childhood friend! A woman with a strong will to live who has been ensnared by fateーLiesel's success story begins here!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
Title: Miniamaru Kareshi
Description: Iroha Aoyagi is a normal 16 year old girl, except, she's never fallen in love. She suspects there might be something wrong with her; until she meets her classmate Kusakabe-kun who seems well-versed and cynical about matters of love. Will Iroha be able to handle someone like Kusakabe-kun?

Genres: Oneshot, Girls' Love, School Life
Title: Mannatsu no Spica
Description: Manatsu and Hoshiko are childhood friends. Despite her shy nature, Hoshiko has become an idol. Manatsu doesn't accept the change in behavior of Hoshiko and those around her. Manatsu has come to be harsher with her friend. Some things change, and others don't. A story of conflict and change told by the young girls.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation
Title: Tobioriru Chokuzen no Doukyuusei ni "Sekkusu Shiyou!" to Teianshite Mita.
Description: My first love, Koga Kurumi. Her beauty and personality, which are beyond what you'd expect from a high school student, invite jealousy, isolate her, and - she was on the verge of jumping off the roof due to bullying. So, what can I do...? "Let's have sex!" I'll scream out my love to the death and make a place for you in this world!

Genres: Action, Ninja, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Etrian Odyssey III: The Deep Sea War Princess
Description: An original story adaptation based on the third installment in the Etrian Odyssey franchise. Former Princess Celia Zoe Granvania and her Ninja retainer Fuuka hitch a ride on a merchant ship sailing to the magnificent Sea City of Armoroad, where an enormous World Tree of Yggdrasil looms over. Wanting to explore the vast labyrinth that it houses underneath, Celia hopes to uncover the reason why everything she once held dear is gone...

Genres: Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Drama, Mystery
Title: Migawari Otome no Koufuku-na Yomeiri - Meiko to Musubi no Akashi
Description: A story of two people who had a sad fate until they found a new happiness. The time is the Taisho era. The orphan Meiko, who suffers from weak eyesight, lives a modest but peaceful life at a temple orphanage. One day, a suspicious person visits the temple and suddenly attacks Meiko. When she wakes up, she finds that time had rewound several months back. To avoid death, Meiko follows a guide. There she meets her long-lost twin sister, Kanako, the daughter of a marquis... After her parents tell her the story of her birth, Meiko is to marry Matsuwaka Akashi, a military man feared as the "Demon Akashi," as Kanako's substitute-

Genres: Monsters, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Tonari no Jii-san
Description: Yuki, a girl living in a rural town, studies art with the goal of becoming a painter in the city. One day, her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off, but during the journey, she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Haruka Reset
Description: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public baths, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even if she can't take a big vacation or travel too far, she's determined to still enjoy any little "vacation" she can by getting creative!

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Tragedy
Title: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~Isekai o Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai o Musou Suru~
Description: The "former" savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appearing from "gates" rampage, and those called hunters fight using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but...

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents
Title: Mujina into the Deep
Description: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Gojuu, Rokujuu, Yorokonde
Description: Aki-san (50), a divorced woman, has been getting along well with Rokujo-san (60). People around them are worried about their pure relationship, but there is no need to worry. At a summer festival, the two quickly grow closer, and their feelings for each other continue to grow. They envision a future together, and finally.... "I want to spend the rest of my life with the person I love."

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party o Kumimashita!
Description: As a member of the hero's party Ceres, has set out to defeat the demon king. But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party. All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Shizuko, the hero's mother, being sold as a slave?!

Genres: Drama, Mystery
Title: Tasogare no Hito
Description: One summer day, a boy named Tatsuomi Shiba arrives in the town where Riko, an eighth grader, lives. His family, who are related to the chairman of a major corporation, are welcomed by the townspeople, but Tatsuomi keeps his distance from everyone around him. Riko, who cannot leave him alone, makes memories of their summer together, and on his birthday, she promises Tatsuomi a gift and a promise. However, their happy days come to an end with the end of summer. Who is the person I fell in love with for the first time?

Genres: Fantasy
Title: The Brilliant Healer's New Life in the Shadows
Description: Born a poor man in the slums, Zenos never had opportunities in life, so he decides to forge his own opportunities by teaching himself the curative arts after a chance encounter with a healer. When an adventuring party led by a man named Aston extends him an invitation, Zenos is elated—only to then be treated like dirt by his teammates. Despite Zenos’s diligent efforts to hone his skills to nothing short of perfection, the party deems him useless and kicks him out. Bereft of money and options, Zenos starts an illegal clinic and becomes a shadow healer. Word of his healing genius spreads quickly throughout the city’s underbelly, and as his reputation grows among the dregs of society, knowledge of Zenos's esteem reaches the wrong ears...

Genres: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Gray Summer Taxi
Description: Note: Won an honorable mention for Shonen Magazine's 113th upcoming mangaka awards.

Genres: Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy
Title: Oversleeping Takahashi
Description: From the one-shot of the same name that amassed over 1,580,000 views! A classmate who is always nonchalantly late to school, but his true identity is...?! The new serialized story of battles and oversleeping begins!!

Genres: Action, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Hone Hime Rosalie: Shisha no Saigo o Tsuitai-ken Shi, Chikara o Hikitsugu
Description: Rosalie, a girl capable of communicating with the dead, is ostracized by society due to her unique ability. She lives in isolation, working as an investigator who gleans critical information from the deceased unearthed in ancient ruins. Her life takes a dramatic turn when she encounters the remains of Hugo, a once-legendary death knight. Through their connection, she inherits his extraordinary powers. This marks the beginning of her journey as "Bone Princess," a figure destined to influence the world. The story blends supernatural mystery with epic fantasy, focusing on themes of acceptance, legacy, and the power of understanding the past.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: B Gata H Kei
Description: B Gata H Kei revolves around fifteen-year old high school student Yamada, whose lascivious nature causes her to aspire to one day achieve sexual relations with one hundred different partners. However, her insecurities as a virgin lead her to reject every guy who attempts to make a move on her. In order to overcome this mental barrier, Yamada goes on a search for her “golden cherry”, an inexperienced boy upon whom she will bestow the right to be her first. One day while perusing a bookstore for the replacement of a dictionary she had defiled by highlighting all the sexual terms, Yamada has a fateful encounter with classmate Kosuda Takashi. Believing that Kosuda is the boy she is looking for, Yamada goes to great lengths to try and seduce him. All the while, she discovers the difficulties in making that first important step towards reaching her goals, not to mention, finding out her true feelings for Kosuda Takashi. Link: [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=11199) (anime)

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Ryuu to Ayumu Nariagari Boukensha-dou ~Youzumi toshite S-Rank Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Kaifuku Majutsushi, Suterareta Saki de Saikyou no Shinryuu o Fukkatsu Sasete Shimau~
Description: **“Understand for yourself that you are worthless. You are already obsolete.”** Dion, the recovery wizard who was told so, was seriously injured by the hands of party members and left behind in the interior of the highest difficulty dungeon. On the verge of running out of his life, he happens to encounter a dying dragon. Dion realized that he couldn't help him anymore, and he treated the dragon to live as a recovery wizard until the end. Then the dragon thanked him and even shared the power of the dragon. In addition, this dragon seems to have been a legendary god dragon-class. Dion escapes from the dungeon with his new companion, the dragon, and restarts as an adventurer. He captures the difficult dungeons that stand in his way, and his abilities are recognized and he has all the strong men on his side. This is a story about a recovery magician who leaves behind even the party he was in from a difficult situation and becomes the strongest adventurer in the world. ___ **Character Designer:** [Sisoe](https://mangadex.org/author/9a1a04cb-1d27-4601-809d-665b4f4918c4) **Additional Links:** - Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55539) - [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6844gh) - [Official Raw Light Novel](https://www.bunkasha.co.jp/author/a236341.html)

Genres: Survival, Drama, Tragedy
Title: Metro・Survive
Description: Mishima is your average spineless pushover, working as a repairman for the Exopolis Tower, Tokyo's largest and hottest highrise business and entertainment building. He promised to come home in time to celebrate his son's birthday, but when he lets his pushy boss saddle him with overtime, the task takes him all night. On the morning subway train heading home, a massive earthquake strikes and collapses both Exopolis and its underground train lines. Now Mishima is trapped deep underground with the other passengers of the train, some of whom are less than cooperative. Will he be able to take the initiative for once and lead them all to freedom, or will they starve in their underground prison?

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Student Council for Two
Description: What do you do when your student council doesn't have enough members to fill all the positions? Well, take most of them on your own, of course! Seishirou Watari is a middle school student and has the roles of student council president / secretary / treasurer / general affairs officer, and he's accompanied by Ryouko Mizutani, his vice president. Together they, well… make do with whatever little they have. What do you want? It's only the two of them, okay!?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Hanamaru Kindergarten
Description: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.

Genres: Sports, Drama
Title: Major 2nd
Description: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Kyou mo Kitansu ka, Yoda-senpai.
Description: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!

Genres: Comedy, Sports, Tragedy
Title: Kanojo no Carrera
Description: The main character’s father passes away. The will states that each of the three siblings receive a portion of the father’s wealth. The main character receives a Porsche Carrera. She doesn’t know what a Porsche Carrera looks like, didn’t know the car company Porsche, can’t drive a manual and had absolutely no interest in cars, at the time.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Majo wa Mangetsu ni Saku
Description: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!

Genres: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love
Title: Bunkei no Kimi, Rikei no Anata
Description: Winner of the 30rd Comic Awards Jade Prize. Published in Yurihime June 2024, pages 575-595.

Genres: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Military, Fantasy
Title: Kuni o Owareta Ryuushi-san, Hirowareta Ringoku de Ukkari Musou Shite Shimau. ~Jakushou Kokka ga Tairiku Saikyou no Ryuu no Rakuen ni Naru made~
Description: Breed, an old dragon master, is not only fired from his job but also exiled from his country… but the dragons love him and follow him!? ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550912964695382195)

Genres: Award Winning, Historical, Monsters, Ghosts, Fantasy, Mystery
Title: Guardienne
Description: Taiwan during the Qing dynasty was deeply patriarchal. Women were disregarded from birth, their only purpose was to find a good marriage. But once married, the pressure was on to provide sons. This gave rise to various folk practices which claimed to ensure male offspring. Chieh-Niang watches as her sister-in-law, obsessed with giving birth to a son, gives in to these superstitions. And she herself is under pressure to marry – can she ever break free? Walking by the river one day, she comes across the body of a woman. A priestess is summoned to ensure the woman's spirit passes peacefully and does not haunt the town. The priestess, with her mysterious ways, does seem able to communicate with the spirit world, and Chieh-Niang, seeing a glimmer of hope, enrolls as her apprentice. But soon after, small handprints start appearing on her legs as she sleeps, while more women go missing or are found dead. What will Chieh-Niang do, and will she find the life she wants? Tan-Tsiu-Niu was selected as a recommended book by the former Minister of Culture and was recommended as a must-read book for the 2020 World Book Day by the National Museum of Taiwan Literature.

Genres: Romance, Office Workers, Drama
Title: Anata no Koisuru Kirai na Watashi
Description: A confession from the boss with a secret longing. The passionate gaze and tender, loving caresses. It's like a dream... but maybe it's not me whom he loves. Saki was once bullied because of her appearance, but she has improved her makeup skills and is now a glamorous beauty. The men in her offices make advances, and although some of her co-workers gossip about her being fliratious, she is still able to do her best everyday because of her boss, Director Banshou, who approves of her work ethics. One night, when she was out without makeup because she was close to her home, her boss approaches her and confesses his feelings for her! He didn't seem to realize that it was his subordinate, Saki. What does it mean? Is he mistaking me for someone else? This is a supreme melodrama between two adults who cross paths.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Hell Mode ~Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru~
Description: Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market. Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential. Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds. All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.

Genres: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Alkaloid no Hanayome
Description: Romelia, a lonely girl, and Kutli, a young high-ranking soldier, are solemnly married in the presence of God. What they share, however, is not "conjugal love," but the "unbearable fate" they have mutually borne.

Genres: Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: Witch's Fantasy Cosmetics
Description: Welcome to the “Fantasy Cosmetics” shop where witches create a world full of dreams and magic. Following a scent trail of flowers lies the “Charme Dresser” cosmetic shop. It is said that it grants wishes of those who visit with the use of “Fantasy Cosmetic” magic… Drawn by the big hit illustrator meeco, these charming and fantastical cosmetics will make your heart flutter just by looking at them! A full-colour comic and illustration collection featuring short and unique stories of those who visit this store. Strawberry quartz, Princess Grape extract and love fortune flower buds… adding these last touches to your own “fantasy”, it’s time to prepare your Fantasy Cosmetics.

Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Ookami to Revolver
Description: The protagonist is Oto, a young police woman. Around the village of Blume, where she lives, werewolves have started to appear, blending in with the village people. One day, Oto follows some village children into the forest, and unluckily, she encounters a werewolf. Just as the werewolf attacks her, another werewolf suddenly appears and saves her life. That werewolf apparently knows her somehow... (Source: Natalie.mu, translated)

Genres: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls
Title: Lilia Pregnant The World End
Description: "The world will be destroyed if you have sex with the Demon King's daughter." After defeating the Demon King and saving the other world, the hero Takahiro returns to the real world. One day, Lilia, the daughter of the Demon King, suddenly arrives at Takahiro's place, where he leads a peaceful life. Takahiro braces himself for revenge, but her goal is to bear the strong Takahiro's child...!?

Genres: Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Battle Studies
Description: You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!! Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination! From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Anata-tachi Soredemo Sensei Desu ka!
Description: One day, school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro, a high school boy, decides to take care of the inn and his future!?

Genres: Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Witch of Thistle Castle
Description: An experienced witch is ordered to teach magic to a gifted lonely boy captured by the church in modern-day Edinburgh, Scotland. - Social Media: [@witch\_of\_tc](https://twitter.com/witch_of_tc)

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Kago nashi Reijou no Chiisa na Mura ~Saa, Ryouchi Un'ei wo Hajimemashou!~
Description: I reincarnated as the villainess in a game world— I'm not afraid of banishment, I'll manage my territory and live as I like! I reincarnated as Celistina, the villainess of an otome game. As the fiancée of the crown prince, in this world where everyone is gifted with blessings by the gods and spirits, I'm the "young lady without a blessing." As a result of being a fan of the game, I know that the crown prince will be with the heroine sooner or later, and he will break our engagement. Alternatively, if they don’t end up together, I will be executed...

Genres: Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kirakira Shitemo, Shinakutemo
Description: Sparkling love is not the only kind there is. Keita is a high school student who likes his friend Masato. However, his love could not be more different from the sort of sparkling love often seen in BL… This is a delicate, bittersweet story of adolescence.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Animals, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kimi to Koete Koi ni Naru
Description: Mari is a high school student living in a town where beastmen and humans coexist. When she is late for school, she meets Tsunagu, a beastman who has come to the school as a "special student" for the Beastman Education Program, at the front gate. Mari is bewildered by her first contact with a beastman, but as she gets to know him, she is drawn to his kind and pure side. However, some of her classmates don't seem to take kindly to beastmen, and suddenly the two of them are locked in a warehouse. Suddenly, they are locked in a warehouse and Tsunagu hugs her! He says, "You smell sweet..." His breathing becomes ragged. A human and a beastman. What will happen to the love between two people who transcend race? Pure and exciting interspecies youth love.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Happy Happia!
Description: Yuki Iwatsuki is a transfer student, today is her first day at her new school. There seems to be some kind of trauma, her classmates "Koneko," a high-tension girl, and "Akizora Hako," a box-head girl, are very interested in Yuki! Will she get along with everyone?

Genres: Crime, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Seijo ni Uso wa Tsuujinai
Description: Chloe, who works as an apprentice priestess in a remote church, is a money-loving girl who makes a lot of money at night by gambling at cards, using her insight and memory as weapons. When Erald, a rich holy knight, visits her, he asks her to infiltrate the church as a candidate for sainthood and find the murderer who committed a murder two years ago…?

Genres: Romance, Sports, Drama
Title: Lost Man
Description: There lives a man who has lost his memory and can’t remember where he’s from, and who he is, including his name. He just goes by the name Matsumoto and the one and only thing he remembers is how to play soccer. However, the one thing he does remember, he does exceptionally well, even better than the professionals. He sells his ridiculous soccer skills to teams and guarantees them goals and, even more important, wins. As he travels from city to city, country to country playing for money, he hopes that he regains his memory.

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Siscon Idol
Description: Sakuta had been waiting excitedly for a chance to spend time with Mai again, but instead he's greeted by a stranger who looks just like her. Apparently, Adolescence Syndrome has forced her to swap bodies with Nodoka Toyohama, a flashy up-and-coming idol...who also happens to be Mai's sister from a different mother! Now, forced to pretend to be the other, the sisters go about their respective lives as best they can but it seems like Nodoka is preoccupied with something besides walking in Mai's shoes...

Genres: Action, Psychological, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Supernatural
Title: Bakidou
Description: After more than 2,000 years, Nomi no Sukune's successor is born. This time, Baki will challenge the god of sumo.

Genres: Action, Crime, Mafia, Supernatural
Title: Negai no Astro
Description: The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers! As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!

Genres: Action, Superhero
Title: Denki Soukou Raijin
Description: A young man called Kanou Ryoto was once saved as a child by a mysterious hero named "Raijin". Ten years later, Ryoto works in his sister's dog cafe. While walking the dogs one day, he happens to save a strange dog from drowning. Soon after a monster attacks his sister and suddenly the dog he had saved earlier starts to talk to him. Not only that, he also teaches him how to transform into a battle hero and protect his loved ones. This is the fateful moment Ryoto changes into Raijin Model One!

Genres: Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: E, Shanai System Subete Wan'ope shiteiru Watashi wo Kaiko desu ka?
Description: Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons.

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Watashi ga Shinde Manzoku desu ka?
Description: Countess Rorona Ryus died in an accident. The news came the day after her fiancé, Bellveut, called off their engagement. Rorona was accused of mistreating her sister, a crime she had no right to be accused of, but she accepted the blame without hesitation. She was found dead in an overturned carriage on a suburban street, her face smashed in. When Rorona's sister learned of her death, she was delighted. "Bellveut is now mine," she said. Bellveut laughed. "I wish she had died sooner." But they did not know that Rorona's death would bring them more than just good fortune....

Genres: Oneshot, Thriller, Psychological, Animals, Drama, Monster Girls, Web Comic
Title: DOG MATIC
Description: Do you have any "fangs"――?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Hiiragi-san Is a Little Careless
Description: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

Genres: Historical, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Shore Song
Description: There are many perils in this desert world. Countries war and enslave, goblins prey on humans, monsters and magic run amok, and — most critically — wells run dry. Those desperate for water may undertake an ancient water prayer ritual, a grueling journey to beg the aid of Kahaku, the god of water. These are the various stories of people from all walks of life, each driven by their need to survive in that world and save the ones they love. Sometimes, these desperate souls cross paths with a pair of travelers, En and Jinghua, who help them on their journey. A series of interconnected oneshots, each volume with a different title. Volume 1: Kishibe no Uta Volume 2: Kumo o Koroshita Otoko Volume 3: Touzoku no Mizusashi Volume 4: Akumujou no Aruji Volume 5: Tabibito no Ki Volume 6: Kageboushi-tachi no Shima Volume 7: Kita no Ouji to Minami no Sakana Volume 8: Kareno no Hanayome Volume 9: Tsukikage no Choujou Volume 10: Suna no Shita no Shirabe

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life
Title: The Knight in the Area
Description: Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition. Link: [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life
Title: Zatsu Tabi: That's Journey
Description: Chika Suzugamori, a rookie manga artist, has been getting rejected every time she submits a new draft. On the verge of giving up, she suddenly gets the idea of going on a journey- A journey that heals precisely because it's rough - the ultimate travel comic!

Genres: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Crime, Military, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Heimin Shusshin no Teikoku Shoukan, Munou na Kizoku Joukan wo Juurin shite Nariagaru
Description: Hazen Heim, a newly appointed imperial general, is demoted to the front line because he is a commoner.
