There were a lot of incompetent people, such as "a trash superior who takes advantage of his position to steal the achievements of his subordinates", "an evil subordinate who keeps bullying people below him", and "a top who is too opportunistic to do anything''. However, Hazen has the experience and overwhelming ability as the strongest magician that he cultivated in his previous life. He slaughters his malevolent subordinates in accordance with military law, and completely refutes his superiors who complain. He achieved extraordinary results, such as making peace with a hostile tribe by teaming up with a genius girl, and defeated all the annoying bosses!

Genres: Slice of Life
Title: Nonohana Katarazu
Description: A story of a girl named Nonoko and the flowers that bloom in the fields. When she was young, she showed no interest in wild plants, but recently she has been looking intently at encyclopedias. Looking for a certain flower, when Nonoko goes out to the garden with a pictorial book... (Source: Natalie, translated) *Note: Switched from Futabasha's Web Action to Kobunsha's Comic Nettai in December 2024.*

Genres: Reincarnation, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou wo Suru no wa Chotto Taihen
Description: In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst, a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa, the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However, not long after reincarnating, she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life, Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.

Genres: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Be-bop High School
Description: The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru, who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga, Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama, think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club. --- - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988, which it shared with Bonobono**

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Ponkotsu-chan Kenshouchuu
Description: Mito is a boy with a big heart and the frightening face of a thug. He wants people to rely on him, but he scares people off at first sight. That is, until his schoolmate Yumesaki asks him to help her. Yumesaki has a problem. Every day she is given a new, random supernatural ability by an mysterious being called God, as she has to test them in order to stop a giant meteorite that will destroy the planet in a year. Sure, the goal is to save the planet, but when a boy and a girl spend time together, there are more tender things to discover too!

Genres: Ghosts, Romance, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: Yuurei to Tsukareta Kaishain
Description: No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you. A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki. "Nobody even looks at me..." Nozaki was consumed with loneliness. The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life. Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day. Until one day, he encountered someone new. The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.

Genres: Historical, Action, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Centaurs
Description: A centaur race, known as Jimba, have lived in Japan since ancient times. However, humans regard them as tools of war and snatch away their dignity. During the Sengoku period, a samurai Jimba named Matsukaze, known as the redheaded rock tiger, is caught while protecting his son. He is traded to a feudal lord, and taken to a feudal lord. There he meets another centaur, named Kohibari, whose village was burnt down as a child. He is a tame centaur, and had his arms amputated when he was captured. With his help, Matsukaze escapes with Kohibari. ___ **Official English Volumes:** [ABLAZE](https://www.ablaze.net/products?c=83)

Genres: Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Kaji Ryuusuke's Agenda
Description: Kaji Ryusuke is a second son of a great politician. However, his father and brother both pass away from a car accident. Now, those who supported Ryusuke's father want Ryusuke to carry on the family business as a politician. At first, Ryusuke tries to get out of the responsibility, but he eventually enters an election to become a politician. The manga chronicles Ryusuke's rise in the world of Japanese politics.

Genres: Animals, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Kamakura Bakeneko Club
Description: There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club", located somewhere in Kamakura, you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today, people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club", where Maya and Gakuto work, relying on this rumor.

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Kishi Danchou no Musuko wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Dekiai suru
Description: When Princess Alice abruptly ends their engagement, Ex, the Knight Commander's son, has a sudden recollection of his past life. Transported from an otome game, he recognizes the unfolding events. Refusing to accept the wrongful blame placed on the innocent villainess, he resolves to protect and claim her. Reincarnated with a mission, Ex cherishes the villainess as his chosen path in this heartwarming tale of love and reincarnation.

Genres: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama
Title: Doku o Haku
Description: Meet Masamichi Watanabe.

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: S Rank Boukensha de Aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con de Shita
Description: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Crime, Drama
Title: Madara Moyou no Yoi
Description: Yoi, a girl who has nowhere to go because she looks different from the people around her. Who reached out to her...?

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Doukutsu Ou kara Hajimeru Rakuen Life ~Bannou no Saikutsu Skill de Saikyou ni!?~
Description: Hiel was ridiculed for having a useless crest and was exiled to a remote island. When he grabbed an pickaxe to reclaim the island, the true effect of his crest was revealed. With his production cheat he will reclaim this uninhabited island and start his life in paradise.

Genres: Reincarnation, Martial Arts, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Fuun Kara no Saikyou Otoko
Description: After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life. He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation. Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.

Genres: Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Asura’s Verdict
Description: "Only do good deeds."—Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied, he goes on with a smile, firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment. Until one day, an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama, Horror, Mystery
Title: Yuureitou
Description: In the 1950s, an old woman was brutally murdered on the face of a clock tower by her adopted daughter. Two years later, the clock tower is known as the 'ghost tower' and it is supposedly haunted. Through an unusual series of events, a young NEET man named Amano Taichi is attacked by someone or something in the same clock tower, and finds himself bound to the clock face to be killed in the same way as the old woman. Luckily for Amano, he doesn't meet the same fate. He's rescued by a mysterious person who claims his name is Tetsuo. Tetsuo is searching for a treasure that is connected with the ghost tower, and he wants Taichi to be his partner. Taichi, whose life has mostly consisted of poverty, loneliness, and pornography, is enticed by the idea of gaining extreme wealth. He's further convinced when a house fire leaves him without a home and depends on Tetsuo's charity. The adventure is going to be very dangerous, since the same 'enemies' who attacked Taichi before seem certain to try something again! Not to mention, Taichi really knows very little about his new partner, especially while regarding his true identity!

Genres: Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Net Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari Series
Description: Featuring eerie urban legends that became popular on the internet, faithfully adapted into comics by skilled authors. A true horror anthology for urban legends!

Genres: Thriller, Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Kamikakushi no Eden
Description: The protagonist, Hinata Kuroto, is searching for his sister, who is supposed to have "once existed" but is now forgotten by everyone around him. He receives a letter from the beautiful transfer student, Shirai Shimotsuki, stating, "If you want to know about the whereabouts of your sister, come to the library after school." When Kuroto goes to the library, he finds Shirai inexplicably half-naked and waiting for him. This is a sex and meta-fantasy manga created by Gensei Sahara, the artist behind 'Sex & Dungeon!! (Source: niconico Manga, translated) ___ [Alt Official Raw (niconico Manga)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/65209)

Genres: Romance, Fantasy
Title: Tsukareta Ouji-sama to Kyouikugakari no Goreijou no Hanashi
Description: Steven, the first prince of the Kingdom of Fierte, used to be called the perfect prince, but now he just spends his days drinking alone in his remote palace from noon onwards in a lethargic mood. One day, a woman of his age named Ada, the daughter of the Duchess of Raffine, suddenly arrives at his doorstep. At first, Steven was not pleased with her, but gradually he begins to open up to her. In the midst of his life, Stephen begins to remember memories of his childhood with Ada...?

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
Title: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to
Description: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Sanda
Description: In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society. Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.

Genres: Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Dead Account
Description: Souji Enishiro, 15 years old (high school dropout), is a controversial streamer, "Aoringo," who makes a ton of money through his violent and outrageous video content. Although he is seen as a troublemaker, in reality, he is a kind older brother who loves his younger sister and sweets. Even his controversial videos are just a means to cover the huge medical expenses for his sickly younger sister. No matter if everyone in the world hates him, he is happy as long as his sister is doing well. That is until something happens to his beloved sister...

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
Title: Torano Tantei Jimusho e Youkoso
Description: Due to a string of bad luck, Yano Kaisei is without a home, a job, or money. He happens to stumble upon a job posting for a live-in position at a detective agency, but the employer is Torano Jiu, a mighty tiger beastman! After Yano Kaisei starts working at the detective agency, his day-to-day includes juggling work duties and taking care of Torano’s niece, Yui… A romantic comedy between a Beastman x Human!

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World
Description: Kenichi, a single man in his 40s, is transported into another world for no apparent reason. As he tries to escape a dangerous forest teaming with monsters, he realizes he has the power to access to a huge online store. By using this power to exchange goods he found in this new world for cash, and then buying modern ones off the internet, he was able to quickly create a very popular business. However, his goal is to have a slow and leisurely life. Instead of growing his business even more, he decides to settle down and live off of the power of Jeff Bezos. ___ [web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2945eg/) (jp)

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Shachuuhaku Monogatari - Outrunner PHEV
Description: One young salaryman, who adores his plug-in, hybrid car that uses both electricity and gasoline, had been using camping in it as an escape plan from everyday life. Suddenly, he finds himself transported to another world with his car! He'll start his life anew in this different world!

Genres: Traditional Games, Sports, Drama
Title: The God Before Me
Description: Lately, Odachi has been struggling with a lack of confidence in his play. Since his debut match, where he faced off against the “God” of shogi, something has changed within him. Will the day come when he can surpass the God of his generation? A tale of a self-proclaimed average shogi player, his friends, peers, and rivals, and the God before him.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Henjo ~Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko~
Description: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn, masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko, partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest, but little did he know, she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"…

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~
Description: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

Genres: Psychological, Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Nekojiru Udon
Description: Short stories about two anthropomorphic white cats who have no respect and are just plain cruel. Dark humor warning.

Genres: Police, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Change the World
Description: Saitō Yu'ichi, a boy without prospects, decides to kill himself at the turn of the year. However, a fateful meeting with a stranger, Mitsumune Sakutarō, who is his complete opposite, changes Yu'ichi's future in a way he could never have imagined.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: The Ramparts of Ice
Description: Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?! The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!

Genres: Drama
Title: STRAND
Description: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Fuku wo Kiru nara Konna Fuu ni
Description: Yuusuke, an average office worker meets with his friend at a reunion, only to find out that the fashion world has left him behind. Now, with the help of his sister Tamaki, Yuusuke must take his step into the world of trends and charisma.

Genres: Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Only Sense Online
Description: Utilizing a system called "Sense," each player aims to create their unique character in the VRMMORPG "Only Sense Online." Joining this realm is Yun, an absolute beginner in the world of gaming, equipped with some of the worst customized "Sense" ever. While his two sisters, both veterans in this world, criticize his choices of equipment, he continues to delve into the skill sets he has acquired. Along his way, he meets the art of "production" and people that have mastered this art. Watch as a total novice creates a revolution in the gaming world and create the "ultimate" support class.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
Title: Omiai Shitakunakatta node, Murinandai na Jouken wo Tsuketara Doukyuusei ga Kita Ken ni Tsuite
Description: One day, Yuzuru Takasegawa — a first-year high school student — is urged by his grandfather to go on an arranged marriage meeting, insisting that he wants to see his great-grandson before he dies. However, not wanting to bear the weight of a fiancee at the tender age of a freshman in high school, Yuzuru tries to avoid the arranged marriage meeting by imposing an irrational condition that, “If she is Blonde Haired, Blue Eyed, Fair Skinned with big boobs, only then I will think about the marriage”. But somehow, he finds the girl who meets the conditions that Yuzuru has put out, and he reluctantly ends up going to matchmaking only once. And on the day of matchmaking, it was Arisa Yukishiro, a beautiful girl with reputation at school, shows up on the scene. [adapted from Novel Updates]

Genres: Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Sharty to Renkinjutsu no Machi
Description: Coo Hem, a town where alchemists gather. Sharty, a new apprentice of Garo, a first-rate but stubborn alchemist, is training energetically today! However, she is overflowing with motivation and energy, and Garo is always angry with her. This is a fantasy in which one girl struggles to become a full-fledged alchemist!

Genres: Psychological, Ghosts, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
Title: Katarika
Description: The story of "Katarika: The Curse of Ghostly Tales" follows a group of girls trapped by a mysterious "curse" linked to Ghostly tales. It combines thrilling suspense and emotional depth, focusing on their friendships as they navigate this eerie phenomenon. The manga blends supernatural horror with the characters' personal struggles, unraveling a chilling tale of how stories can shape and destroy their world.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Adaptation
Title: Kanojo ni Uwaki Sareteita Ore ga, Koakuma na Kouhai ni Natsukareteimasu
Description: Christmas season. Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?

Genres: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Uchi no Musuko wa Tabun Gay
Description: A sweet, open-minded mother starts suspecting one of her sons might be gay.

Genres: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Reincarnation no Kaben
Description: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Description: This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career! There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: [Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)

Genres: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: The Story of My Village
Description: A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.

Genres: Historical, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
Title: Song of the Sky Pacers
Description: (In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers. Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies? --- **Note:** This is the **page style** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/7226ef70-592f-42b5-a3ff-8b91af15d97f)

Genres: Sports, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: The Money Kid
Description: A little-known classic, brought to you by the mangaka of Dokaben and Abu-san and the creator of Apache Baseball Team, Zenikko is a gritty look at money and capitalism, and one kid’s attempts to game the system in his favour.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation
Description: Are you a victim of unwanted spirit possession? Is there a ghost you need sent up and away…or down to burn for all eternity? If the answer is yes, then you need Muhyo and Roji, experts in magic law. Serving justice to evil spirits is their specialty.

Genres: Romance, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Shokuba no Onnanoko ni Toushisuru Hanashi
Description: Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "BOOK FOREST", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games. Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things. When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?" As the two navigate a cycle of investment and returns, the distance between their hearts begins to shrink. A unique and charming investment-themed romantic comedy! (Source: Melonbooks, edited)

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Tensei Oujo wa Ai yori Ryouchi ga Hoshii no de Seiryaku Kekkon wo Kibou shimasu!
Description: Princess Fairis, reincarnated into the world of strategy simulation games, uses her knowledge of the games she played in her previous life and is called the Warrior Princess. However, as soon as the war ends, she is ordered by the king to marry. In addition, she competes with her sister in arranged marriages and, depending on her partner, cannot get involved in national politics. ...I want to build my country, not get married! As she struggles to arrange a political marriage that will give her more territory, Orpheed, a wizard who is also her trusted subordinate and a potential bride, unexpectedly confesses his love for her...? A love comedy between a reincarnated princess with zero love skills and the strongest wizard with an intense love.

Genres: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Lalalab☆ ~Gal to Kagaku to Seishun to!~
Description: Lala Mizusawa might look like a flashy gyaru and act high-energy, but don’t be fooled—she’s a hardcore science geek and a third-year biology major with dreams of becoming a great scientist! While her lofty goal sometimes shakes her confidence, she’s got her quirky labmates to keep her going: the refined and otaku-spirited Hanako Naito, and the lazy pajama-wearing Toki Busujima. Together, they celebrate the thrill of growing microbes, steam sweet potatoes in the autoclave, and dive headfirst into their delightfully chaotic campus life (if you can call it that)! ☆

Genres: Oneshot, Historical, Romance
Title: Kyousou Silent
Description: A romance set in 1920s Hollywood, during the era of silent films, the main character faces a unique challenge: she must resist the temptation to fall in love with a leading actor if she wants to achieve stardom herself.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama
Title: Rekkyou Sensen
Description: The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!

Genres: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life
Title: Yamazaki-san
Description: Won a Semi-Grand Prize from the *Tonari no Young Jump* COMITIA 145 4-Hour Speed Manga Awards.

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Heisei Haizanhei ☆ Sumire-chan
Description: A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being. Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea. “You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook.” Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Stay tuned!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life
Title: Uso Kareshi Demo Ii Kara Tonikaku Shitai Mashiro-chan
Description: Mashiro Naomoto wants to have a taste of romance and even get to try lewd things, now that she has become a high school student. However, she has low self-esteem and as a result of lacking confidence in herself, she began to think that it's probably impossible for her. Right at that moment, to her surprise a handsome male classmate named Oosagi-kun confesses to her. Mashiro starts to suspect that his confession must be some sort of punishment game, but her own desire to do lewd stuff wins over it and as a result, she does the opposite and makes a move on him... it's a case of sexual desire winning over suspicion?! This is a romcom where a high school girl's libido will run wild!! (Source: Comic-Meteor) --- * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomattaaaaan/status/1851462156996551019) (Preview) *Posted with the caption: Doushitemo Sukebe Shitai JK no Manga Kakimashita (どうしてもスケベしたいJKの漫画描きました) "I drew a manga about a high school girl who wants to do perverted stuff no matter what"*

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
Title: Kaze no Iro made Oboeteru
Description: The first year of high school: Spring Mori, who has just entered school, learns of his classmate, Michioto, who is rumored to be the "treasure of the boys' school." Mori volunteered to ask for Michioto's contact information on behalf of a friend who was too scared to talk to him. Mori headed towards Michioto without really thinking about it, but the moment Mori sees him, it's love at first sight....

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Amai Seikatsu
Description: The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company. One of the very first harem manga, done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies (was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump. Volume titles and Romaji equivalent: 2. ランジェリーに恋してる♥ (Ranjerī ni Koishiteru ♥) - 愛の悩み (Ai no Nayami) - 恋模様みだれ髪 (Koi Moyō Midare-kami) - おかしな二人 (Okashina Futari) - 弓香の日記 (Yumika no Nikki) - 二人の気持ち (Futari no Kimochi) - 伸介の選択 (Shinsuke no sentaku) - おかしな気分 (Okashina Kibun) - おかしな三角関係 (Okashina Sankaku Kankei) - よみがえる美 (Yomigaeru Bi) - 東京ショック (Tokyo Shock) - ユミカ・センセーション (Yumika Sensation) - セルフヌード (Self-nude) - 能力喪失 (Nōryoku Sōshitsu) - お嬢様の初体験 (Ojō-sama no Shotaiken) - 巴の目覚め (Tomoe no Mezame) - ぱんつのお披露目 (Pantsu no Ohirome) - 女優・佐倉澪 (Joyū Sakura Mio) - 弓香が女優 (Yumika ga Joyū) - 美人双子姉妹 (Bijin Futago Shimai) - 政略結婚！？ (Seiryaku Kekkon!?) - 触りのライセンス (Sawari no License) - がんばれ！！大統領！！ (Ganbare!! Daitōryō!!) - ブービー・トラップ (Booby Trap) - ガマン大会 (Gaman Taikai) - 世界新記録！？ (Sekaishinkiroku!?) - 殿・姫・伸介 (Tono Hime Shinsuke) - 姫のお目覚め？ (Hime no o Mezame?) - ニューゴッドハンド？ (New God Hand?) - コスプレ秘書 (Cosplay Hisho) - 天才×天才 (Tensai × Tensai) - ナマで大事件！？ (Nama de Daijigen!?) - 4回転マッサージ (4 Kaiten Massage) - 官能タイフーン (Kan'nō Typhoon) - デザイナーの資質 (Designer no Shishitsu) - 伸介の痴漢騒動 (Shinsuke no Chikan Sōdō) - ベガスの狂乱 (Vegas no Kyōran) - 1000万ドルの下着 (1000 Man-doru no Shitagi) - 幼なじみの下着 (Osana Najimi no Shitagi) - 呪いのコルセット発動！？ (Noroi no Corset Hatsudō!?)

Genres: Romance, School Life
Title: Boku Datte, Kiss Shitai
Description: Natsushiro Seiichi, a first year high school student who is living a smooth sailing high school life. However, his everyday life changes after he encounters a popular beauty, Miho, in the first school year!!

Genres: Action, Survival, Sports, Drama
Title: Harukanaru Ring
Description: (from [wikipedia.ja](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%81%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0)): Yu Takamine was fascinated by the female pro-wrestlers she saw as a child, and overcoming her parents' opposition, she auditioned for and passed the Tokyo Women's Pro Wrestling Association Match to become a pro-wrestler. However, this was only the first step to becoming a wrestler. This is the story of Yu, an amateur wrestler who is not particularly strong, and her growth as an apprentice, rookie, heel, idol, and senior wrestler as she explores various fighting styles.

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess
Title: Akujo ga Kishi no Kyouai Kara Nogareru Houhou
Description: “A fate where you’re destined to be killed by an obsessive knight…!!” The protagonist finds herself reincarnated as Victoria, the villainess in a romance novel. Victoria’s inevitable fate is to be killed by her loyal knight, Cain. Under the influence of a charm spell, Cain loves her blindly, and eventually, that love spirals out of control. On top of that, if Cain discovers that the real Victoria’s soul has been replaced by someone else, things will definitely not end well…! To avoid this deadly future, Victoria decides to break the charm spell while pretending to be the villainess. However, Cain’s gaze, which initially felt terrifying, gradually becomes sweeter and more affectionate…!!

Genres: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls
Title: Kono Healer, Mendokusai
Description: Fantasy adventuring comedy starring Karla the dark elf cleric who invested too much on her taunting skills and Alvin the swordsman who has to put up with her.

Genres: Action, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Otogi Matsuri
Description: The manga starts off with a very odd killing. Then, it jumps to a few days later where Yousuke ends up breaking a small shrine. It later gives him the guardian Suzaku - just in time too, for he must face the murderer that opened the manga. Note: Retail links are for the New Edition which has 8 volumes instead of 12.

Genres: Historical, Demons, Mystery
Title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Oni
Description: Taisho, year 12 (1923). A tragedy in Hinamizawa village changes the fate of a girl and her friends. The turbulent early life of Oryou, head of the Sonozaki family, one of the Three Great Families, who would later be feared and known as Empress Sonozaki. The missing link to the original *Higurashi no Naku Koro ni* is now revealed.

Genres: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Osu!! Karate Club
Description: The series began as a fairly humorous and lighthearted satire of Japan's teenage delinquent-gang subculture told from the perspective of Matsushita Tadashi (who also narrates these early Karate Bu stories), a 2nd year student at Kangokou High and a constant target of Kangokou's numerous bullies who beat him up routinely after school. He is almost always accompanied by his best friend Saitou Takaki, who is also constantly harassed. As the pair grow increasingly tired of being victimized they decide to join the titular Karate Club, which is notorious throughout Osaka's youth gangs for training and producing the city's most hardened and toughest teenage thugs while maintaining the facade of a legit school sports club. But when they join the club, they find themselves picked on just as much if not worse by the club's current members. But as the story progresses they grow to be increasingly capable fighters. Along with the manga's change in attitude and central character, the various teenage fighters throughout the series grew increasingly stronger and even began to tap into superhuman ki abilities, putting Osu!! Karate Bu in the company of other similar epic Shōnen fighting manga such as Yu Yu Hakusho, Dragon Ball, and Fist of the North Star. Osu!! Karate Bu was wildly popular in its native Japan, but is otherwise almost completely unknown in most other countries. It spawned a four episode OVA mini-series released over a period of two years from 1990-1992, a 1990 live action movie, and a 1994 Super Famicom fighting game.

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari
Description: Naofumi Iwatani, an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga, suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction. As the Shield Hero, the weakest of the heroes, all is not as it seems. Naofumi is soon alone, penniless, and betrayed. With no one to turn to, and nowhere to run, he is left with only his shield. Now, Naofumi must rise to become the legendary Shield Hero and save the world!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Tamaranai no wa Koi na no ka
Description: Misuzu became a delinquent through a trivial chance and spends his days getting into fights. One day, Misuzu finds Kitahara, an honor student in a special class, getting involved with some delinquents and helps him out. Kitahara then tries to get involved with Misuzu. Misuzu tries to push him away, saying, "If you get involved with me, the people around you will leave you," but his feelings are wavering...?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
Title: Kasanegasane no Hatsukoi Desuga
Description: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...

Genres: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Web Comic, Mystery
Title: Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou Hanashi
Description: A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination. --- Note: The original web comic that was released on on Twitter and Pixiv has been compiled on Amazon into 1 ebook volume titled Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou (幻覚少女がつきまとう) "A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around" and released on March 25, 2024. * Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)

Genres: Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Magabanashi: Ghost Stories Spreading on Social Media
Description: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

Genres: Adventure, Fantasy
Title: Hibiki's Magic
Description: Some of our most cherished manga characters are blessed with magical powers…others have an extraordinary combination superhuman strength and cunning intellect. But Hibiki? Her only real skill seems to be making a pot of delicious tea… Or is it?!

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Harem, Adaptation
Title: Honmono no Kanojo ni Shitakunaru Made, Watashi de Tameshite Ii yo.
Description: In the reality dating show "Our Season," stunning high school students come together for what seems like the ultimate dream—a perfect youth filled with romance and adventure. But behind the glamorous facade lies a more complicated reality: a false school life where they barter their youth for a chance at stardom in the entertainment world. Aoishi thought he’d follow the script for a picture-perfect experience. But when he meets Karen, eager to fulfill her first love, and Emma, his scripted girlfriend, everything shifts. Add to that his secret relationship with Asuka, and Aoishi finds himself tangled in a web of desire and deception. As they go through their lives on camera, the lines between real feelings and fake romances start to blur, pulling them into a storm of complicated relationships and strong emotions. Can Aoishi find a way to untangle the mess before it takes over their lives? The most dangerous part of their youth is just about to begin! Adapted from a popular light novel, now in manga form!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kawaii Kouhai ni Iwasaretai
Description: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life
Title: Kurai Anoko to Shitai koto
Description: That gloomy girl is so beautiful! Let's aim for it!

Genres: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Military, Philosophical
Title: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)
Description: The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited! Yujiro Hanma, the world's strongest creature, vs. Baki Hanma, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Hazukashigariya no Tsuma to Shinkon Seikatsu Hajimemashita
Description: Eat lunch at the convenience store, go home, take a bath, sleep. This was how I lived my life, but that ends today! My cute wife is now... wait why's she so distant?!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
Title: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka: Familia Chronicle—Episode Freya
Description: "Uh…Freya-sama left a letter and has left…" The members of the Freya Familia all turned at once to look at the messenger. Leaving the shocked first class adventurers aside, the uninhibited Goddess of Beauty leaves on a journey to fulfill her desire!

Genres: Psychological, Drama
Title: Kunigei - Okuni University Art Department Film Program
Description: Daisuke Kanami has enrolled in the film department of an art college. He had won a film award when he was in high school, and was filled with anticipation for his promising youth, but he was shocked by his classmate Kado Osawa, who is overflowing with talent...!? Aspire to be a famous director! A modern story of youth in film school

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Iinchou Desu ga Furyou ni Naru Hodo Koi Shitemasu!
Description: Ryoko Masaki is a serious class president, yet she has decided to become a delinquent to catch the attention of her childhood friend, Masato Todoroki. The reason is that as a discipline committee president, Masato always goes out of his way to remind delinquents about their attire, yet he doesn't pay any mind to the serious Ryoko. That's why Ryoko decided to dye her hair and shorten her skirt, and when Masato saw her, he was devastated and concerned. Is this what Ryoko had hoped for...? A ridiculous rom-com between a serious class president and a dense discipline committee member!

Genres: Action, Crime, Fantasy, Police
Title: Yona Yona Yona
Description: In Hakone, phantom thief Yona and her team of specialists try and recover pieces of art stolen by the corrupt police force.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy
Title: Ore no Choukyou Skill ga Nanka Hen
Description: Takashi, a beast tamer who can't use his training skill well, is constantly suffering rebellion by his beasts. However, on a particular occasion, his skill is activated! For some reason, the companion it worked on was a girl!? It's a beast taming x pitiful heroine erotic fantasy adventure! (Source: Futabasha, translated)

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls
Title: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi
Description: Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

Genres: Psychological, Crime, Drama
Title: Shippai Kazoku
Description: A reclusive son, a daughter looking for sugar daddies, and a cheating husband. "This family is a failure." Noriko, a housewife who thinks so, has no dreams or hopes for the future, and her days just pass by. However, her fate changes dramatically when she impulsively kills her husband's boss. "The only way for the whole family to live happily is to hide the body." A strange bond is formed as the broken family cooperates in concealing the body.

Genres: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji
Description: He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash. He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Tragedy
Title: Kami no Fune de Nemuru
Description: Kitahara Kei is a screenwriter whose prodigious talent is taking the world by storm, but the people on whom he models his protagonists invariably end up dead. Dismayed by the misfortunes piling up in his wake, he abandons the pen and falls into dissipation, spending his days drinking in underground bars. One night when Kei is drunk and collapsed in the street, he is approached by a young amateur photographer named Youichi. Kei finds himself irresistibly drawn to Youichi’s ever-changing expressions, his radiantly pure smile, and sometimes sultry gaze… Being with Youichi, Kei finds the words spilling out of him once more, and yet he knows that he will only bring misfortune to Youichi…

Genres: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
Title: Journey to Seek Past Reincarnations
Description: The story is about a little Master, Gong Yao Ying, in order to accomplish the assigned tasks, she travels across the different periods. The stories are created after meeting with the famous historical figures.

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Adaptation
Title: Power-Hara Genkai Yuusha, Maougun kara Koutaiguu de Scout sareru ~Yuusha Ranking 1-i na no ni Tedori ga Gomi sugite Seikatsu Dekimasen~
Description: In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode... "That never happened!" Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero. "Hero! Get hired on these conditions!" The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Vampires, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Gyaru
Title: Vampire
Description: I am a hungry Vampire. I longed to suck the blood of my destined one, which is said to be the finest, but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day, I got a hateful comment--. Based on the song Vampire by DECO*27

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life
Title: Yumizuka Iroha wa Tejun ga Daiji!
Description: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!

Genres: Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Break Shot
Description: A boy named Oda Nobusuke is very infatuated with billiards. Problems arise when a new student body president, Mako, suddenly decided to cut the funding for his billiards club. Unhappy with that, Oda wants to convince Mako that his billiards club is worthy of the funding. He decided to challenge a two-time former national billiards champion. Will Oda be able to defend his club? --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media

Genres: Romance, Drama, Monster Girls
Title: Mikane and The Sea Woman
Description: It's not like I don’t belong here... One year ago, a young boy named Mikane moved back to a small island in Kyushu. The locals are warm, his father is brusque yet kind, and he has a good friend who worries for him. Despite having so much, Mikane feels dissatisfied and lonely. Then, one day, he saves a mysterious, beautiful woman from the sea. His meeting with this "onee-san" will drastically change his destiny!!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Tomehane!
Description: Tales of a high-school calligraphy club. A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition. Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho. Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

Genres: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Otsubone Reijou to Shiyuka no Kisetsu
Description: Alellia, who has had her engagement broken off, is past the marriageable age, and is known behind her back as the "domineering female supervisor." She spends her days performing her duties as the right-hand woman of Marquess Istilia Wegmund, "the cold-hearted prime minister." One day, while performing her duties, the Prime Minister asks her to marry him. Rumor has it that the Prime Minister is in love with another woman. Alellia accepts the engagement, believing that she is being asked to enter into a contractual marriage. A newly-married life with the cold-hearted prime minister begins...!

Genres: Slice of Life
Title: JK Modeler's Guide
Description: Can a listless high school girl shine as a JK model maker!?

Genres: Genderswap, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Bonnou☆Saiyuuki
Description: The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjō and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gokū, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Slice of Life
Title: The Woman Who Messes With My Emotions (2022)
Description: Yuta was your typical introverted loser. One day, he got invited to an IRL meeting by someone he met online with a shared interest. He wondered what kind of person will be there, and it turned out to be a beautiful lady far beyond his expectation! Yuta felt thrilled but guilty, and he was flustered at every turn. Seeing his nervousness, she tried to draw him out of his shell...? --- The serialized version of the original webcomic A Woman Who Will Mess Up Your Emotions.

Genres: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Taro Miyao Becomes A Cat Parent?!
Description: Taro Miyao is a renowned novelist and ardent admirer of Niccolò Machiavelli. Use whatever means necessary to achieve a goal…Taro has modeled his life after his beloved Renaissance philosopher. One day, he is struck by an epiphany: having a cat around would cure his stiff shoulders! Lo and behold, Taro becomes a proud cat owner but it’s not all kittens and rainbows… A warm and fluffy comedy about living with a cat by Sho Yamazaki, the creator of “Excuse Me Dentist, It’s Touching Me!”

Genres: Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation
Title: Meccha Shoukan Sareta Ken
Description: Name’s Inori Takafuji. I’m not really much of a “go-getter,” if you catch my drift — sleep’s more my style — but getting summoned to another world kinda messed things up. Bit hard to chill when you’ve got a king in your face telling you there’s a bad guy you’ve gotta go slay or whatever, you know? Plot twist, though — it’s actually not so bad. Getting the hero treatment sounds pretty nice, right? But then it happens again! Some other clown summons me, I get my obligatory superpower, and off I go. And sure, that’s fine. It happens, sometimes you get isekai’d to the wrong place. But then it happens AGAIN! Someone ELSE summons me, I get ANOTHER superpower, and then I’m somewhere totally new. Repeat ad nauseam. No idea what’s going on, but all I want is one thing: stop !@#$ing summoning me! [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/oversummoned-overpowered-and-over-it)

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation
Title: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome
Description: Choose the world or choose her. Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret" - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. However, that was a story of his past life. In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.

Genres: Romance, Comedy
Title: Magokoro Scramble! What Lies in Your Heart?
Description: Is this love natural instinct or fate? Koharu is born to a bloodline who can read people's minds. Although he told himself he would never open up to anyone besides his family, those plans are thrown off when he meets an eccentric girl by the name of Yuki. With their encounter, Koharu begins to fall deeper and deeper... into the pit of romance!

Genres: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu
Description: "It's safe because it's a desk job, super stable because it's public work!" Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life... but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina's treasured job forbids side hustles. So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret...!

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Kougekiryoku Zero Kara Hajimeru Kenseitan
Description: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Sekai Saikyou no Kouei: Meikyuukoku no Shinjin Tansakusha
Description: Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world. In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her. And thus starts Arihito's adventure as a "Rear Guard".

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Bonkura Bonbon House
Description: A neet, building a house?! From “3am Dangerous Zone” and “Third-Generation Chemist Kyubee” author, Nemu’s Yoko’s latest work! After dropping out of college without her parent’s consent, Kazuki returns to her hometown. Back in home, she manages to get her furious parents give her the remaining 2 million yen from her tuition and decides to live in her grandmother’s renovated beauty parlor. However, even with her unstoppable 2 million yen, it isn’t enough for Kazuki to work on the house and fulfill all of her desires!!! She ends up renting a part of the house to Seidai, a hairdresser, who was looking for a place to settle down his shop, but before that… it must be renovated… With the help of Eikichi, a former interior designer, walls and ceilings will be teared down, restoring Kazuki’s house from top to bottom, and with that, Kazuki’s DIY life will officially begin…! What’s to come to the DIY life of this blockhead? Maybe love will come?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Kuro Gal-san ga Kuru!
Description: A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts. What will become of this unlikely friendship?

Genres: Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: Yuusha ni Narenakatta Sanbaka Trio wa, Kyou mo Otoko Meshi wo Koshiraeru.
Description: In the forest, the rich smell of roasting meat and bread fills the air... The three idiots—Azuma, Nishida, and Kitayama—who were summoned to another world, hunt in the mountains, forests, and jungles to survive. They hunt and eat wherever they can! "Itadakimasu!" is their motto, and today, like every day, they’re making hearty meals.

Genres: Romance, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: The Blond Yankee and The Punishment Game
Description: As part of her punishment game, the transfer student, Shindou Eruko, must talk to the coolest delinquent in the school, which turns out to be Hoshi Natsuki, the blonde delinquent in the class next door. However, she soon found out that Hoshi-kun might not be as scary as he looks... This manga is Konogi Yoshiru's fantasy take on [Shingeki no Eroko-san](https://mangadex.org/title/bdfc7777-f1ee-4131-82cb-2fb5861d32e1/shingeki-no-eroko-san-hen-na-oneesan-wa-danshikousei-to-nakayoku-naritai), depicting a setting with Eruko being in the same age as Hoshi-kun. It was later adapted in the main title as Eruko's dream sequence.

Genres: Reincarnation, Animals, Romance, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Zense Reitetsu Ouji no Uma deshita - Hito ni Natte mo Anata wo Aishite Ii desu ka?
Description: When I woke up, I, a horse, had the body of a human!? I was Lukania, the beloved horse of the lonely second prince, Ladius. However, I lost my life in an attack aimed at Ladius. "Until the day of brightness, guide him from the brink of despair—,” given power by a goddess and reborn as a human, Lukania heads toward Ladius. He rejects the kindness around him and believes that Luccanya, who disappeared, is still alive, and continues searching. Amidst the darkness of loneliness. "I'll make you smile,” Luccanya decides to hide her past as a horse and vows to rescue Ladius from his loneliness within her limited time.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Isekai de Cheat Skill wo Te ni Shita Ore wa, Genjitsu Sekai wo mo Musou Suru ~Level Up wa Jinsei wo Kaeta~
Description: Since a young age, Tenjou Yuuya was continuously bullied. He is staying in his beloved grandfather's home while he goes to school and, as usual, he receives a harsh bullying, and takes an extended absence from school in order to have some time to heal his wounds. While on this long time of absence, he takes the opportunity to clean his grandfather's house and finds a room he never had seen before. Due to this being where his grandfather kept many different objects that he gathered from his travels around the world, it needed tidying! While Tenjou was arranging the objects, he found a door, yet it didn't seem to go anywhere since it was standing upright and not attached to any wall. Out of curiosity, Tenjou opens this door, and what he found on the other side is… [Official English Light Novel](https://yenpress.com/series/i-got-a-cheat-skill-in-another-world-and-became-unrivaled-in-the-real-world-too-light-novel)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
Title: Ayashii Iyashi no Yakumo-san
Description: With his eyes narrowed, his kimono on, and his pipe in hand - the big brother I admire, whom I see every morning, is definitely playing around... Or so I thought, but in fact he's incredibly pure--!?

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Gal to Bocchi
Description: Stone-faced Hina Kawai says she is not good with gyarus... but that's not an impediment for Hayashibara, her classroom's most noticeable gyaru.

Genres: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Drama, School Life, Horror
Title: Nejimaki Kagyu
Description: Negizawa Kamo and Kagyuu Jyuubee; two childhood friends who made a fated promise to each other are once again reunited as Kagyuu reaffirms her dedication to defending Kamo's dream, and her own, with the monstrous power of her martial arts. However, they soon discover that force alone is not enough, it's character, individuality, that rules this school and pits the students against each other in a brutal contest of dueling personalities vying for supremacy. Because in this school, those with the superior strength, the superior character, are king, and those whose individualities are overwhelmed are discarded. Join Kagyuu, Kamo, and their companions as they struggle to overcome the hidden evils lurking within this school, and discover the voice of each other's hearts and true desires. Do not edit genre to Shounen, series serialized in a seinen magazine (Weekly Young Jump) - [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AD%E3%81%98%E3%81%BE%E3%81%8D%E3%82%AB%E3%82%AE%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC)

Genres: Action, Romance, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Shin no Jitsuryoku wa Girigiri Made Kakushite Iyou to Omou
Description: A world where you can form a pact with gods and gain skills. Born as the third son of a famous knight family, Yuno was so busy controlling his innate power that he was eventually called "incompetent.". However, in the magical knight academy, where he was enrolled for some reason, he fulfilled his fateful encounter with an unnamed god who was despised as "incompetent" like himself.. Yuno, who formed a pact with the goddess and named her [Athena], secretly decided to make her the highest god, and decided to get a little more serious.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Souzou Renkinjutsushi wa Jiyuu wo Ouka suru: Kokyou wo Tsuihou saretara, Maou no Ohizamoto de Chouzetsu Kouka no Magic Item Tsukuri-houdai ni Narimashita
Description: Thor Regus, a boy who lived in the empire, was banished to the territory of the Demon Lord by the hands of his father, the Duke. The reason was that he could only use [Alchemy] and didn’t have any combat skills. The empire was a military country, and those without combat skills were discriminated against. That is why the Empire decided to make him a hostage and sacrifice to the Demon Territory.

Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Saint Seiya: Another Story of Hades - Dark Wing
Description: A high school student suffers an accident and wakes up in Elysium, the World of the Dead. In search of answers, he meets Hades, the God of the Underworld, who sends him on a mission only he can fulfill.

Genres: Action, Ghosts, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
Title: Global Ghosts Warden: I have 100 million Contracted Ghosts
Description: Lin Mo, who plays games during class, has crossed over to a parallel world infested with ghosts and monsters. As the one with the worst talent, he unexpectedly gains the Breakthrough System. All he needs to do is break a ghost’s defense to forcefully contract it. Now, things have taken an incredible turn. While others typically contract two ghosts on average, Lin Mo has contracted billions. With a single summon, a myriad of ghosts descends! Drowning ghosts, starving ghosts, alcoholic ghosts, chainsaw ghosts…

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: The World of SKK Girls
Description: In a mysterious world devoid of humans, Saya, Katana, and Kodachi are three inseparable friends. Their days are filled with laughter and games in the eerie quiet. But beneath this calm, an obscure presence lurks in the shadows…?! From the creator of “Muto to Sato,” Akatsuka-sensei, comes a new, uncharted adventure—innocence meets mystery in a world unknown!

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Horror
Title: Himeanole
Description: The protagonist, Okada, is in his mid-twenties and works part-time for a building cleaning company. He lives his life feeling anxious and dissatisfied with his unremarkable days. What will he do when he can’t think of anything to get a fresh start?

Genres: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life
Title: Toratsuki-kaicho, Teawase negaimasu!!
Description: Saruta Torasuke, an idiot who loves to fight, senses the hidden strength of student council president Fujishiro Senju, and challenges him to a match. In the midst of their fight, something changes in Fujishiro...?

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Love in the Bottom of the 9th Inning
Description: As a manager, having a "favorite" is improper. And yet, Honda can't seem to shake off the feelings she has caught for Yazaki....? *(Published in the Oct 2023 issue of LaLaDX)*

Genres: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Spring Breeze of the Wasteland
Description: Caught in a tragic cycle of betrayal and revenge, Ezen helps Cliff, a slave and enemy of her family, escape—only for him to return years later with overwhelming power, seeking vengeance. Forced into marriage, their pain intertwines, ending in her death during childbirth. Yet, her soul awakens in the past, uncovering hidden truths that could change their doomed fate.

Genres: Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural
Title: Vampire Princess Yui
Description: A mysterious girl arrives at the door of a church covered in blood. She utters out the name "Nagi" before collapsing. She's taken in by the priest of the church. She starts out with no memories of her past, but slowly has strange dreams about her mother, and from that she discovers her name, Yui.

Genres: Romance, Drama
Title: Doll
Description: Muriel takes a chance and hurries over to try out for a casting. On her way there, she is knocked off her bike by the dance prodigy, Alosza. Somehow, she is cast into a musical as his partner!

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Drama
Title: Family Plan
Description: Yusuke and Ayano have been married for a year. They want to buy a home of their own… but it would have to be second-hand. Kids… maybe they can afford one. Being greedy is no use. They were content with what they had… The “family image” they envisioned for themselves was “just enough." Money can really drive people crazy. A neo-suspense story about the bonds of "family."

Genres: Ghosts, Anthology, Horror, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Endan Yobanashi
Description: This horror anthology presents a collection of eerie ghost stories based on real-life accounts gathered over two decades by the renowned storyteller Yama Yuu. Adapted by Hokamoto Kensei, the manga explores the unsettling facets of human nature and madness, as a mysterious young girl narrates the tales within a secluded room. The stories promise a dark, chilling atmosphere that immerses readers in an eerie journey into the supernatural.

Genres: Historical, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Boku to Eve no Muikakan
Description: Leopold, a young boy, wakes up from a frightening dream to find himself alone with the maid Eve in a dark, spacious mansion. He lives his life in the mansion, keeping the mysterious promise he made with Eve, but gradually mysterious events begin to take hold of Leopold.

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love
Title: Katakoi Strategy
Description: My dear best friend likes someone else...?

Genres: Romance, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Vampire Knight Memories
Description: Beginning as four bonus chapters following the end of 'Vampire Knight', 'Vampire Knight Memories' is now an official sequel series written and illustrated by Matsuri Hino. The series follows the events that occurred whilst Kaname slept for a thousand years, as well as his time in the future with Yuuki's daughters, Ai and Ren.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore
Title: Astro Baby
Description: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Seventh
Description: Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his family’s territory. Except around when he was 10 year old, his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister, Ceres. On his fifteenth birthday, he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses, being cast out of his family. Afterwards, he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyle’s grandfather had entrusted to him. From there, he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée, Novem, and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories, personalities, and Skills of seven of his ancestors.

Genres: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Adaptation
Title: Dogs and the Brave Are Not Showy
Description: Summoned to another world to defeat the demon king, Satou Sousuke, 18 years old and only finished elementary school, is brought back to his world after several years had passed. While unable to find employment anywhere and living off a part-time job, Sousuke encounters a battle between a magician and a demon he thought didn’t exist on earth! He easily defeated the demon, so being marked for his power he’s involved in Demon subjugation?!

Genres: Anthology, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: filament ~Works of Yuki Urushibara~
Description: Includes: She Got Off the Bus at the Peninsula (chapter 1): Mitsuko Kunizaki has inherited a small grocery store from her grandmother. Being a single mother to a little boy, she intends to close it down and move on with life. However, in the solitary store that sits next to the last bus stop at the tip of a peninsula lie some long-buried memories that slowly reemerge as Mitsuko arrives at what used to be her home—memories of a lonesome childhood and of people who came to the peninsula to end their lives. The Labyrinth Cat (chapter 2): Residents who have just moved in are always lost in this complex apartment. However, there is one little feline that will help them get back to their apartment house.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Ryuusa no Ori
Description: The Solminati Academy is a prestigious school that harbors the dreams and hopes of ambitious students. A young man named Nozomu Bountis entered the school for his lover's dream. As time went on, his powers deadlocked and could no longer advance, and his grades fell. Eventually, his lover was stolen by his at-the-time best friend. Heartbroken and lost on what to do next, he focused even harder on his training. Eventually, he meets an old woman, who triggers the catalyst to his growth. The future is uncertain but gradually, his world changes. --- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7408y/)

Genres: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: The Elusive Samurai
Description: Yusei Matsui, creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective, is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods, our hero Hojo Takatoki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji, Takatoki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him, and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Koi Koi Koi
Description: This is a romantic comedy about Sakura, a girl who gives her all for love and Matsuyuki, a boy who absolutely hates romance.

Genres: Oneshot, Ghosts, School Life, Supernatural
Title: Oshi ga Yuurei ni Narimashite
Description: We are sad to inform you that our member "Yumemomo" has passed away. Our idol of choice has died. In front of the wisdom of idol otaku who cannot accept the reality, Yumemomo, who was supposed to be dead, appears as a ghost.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Military, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Patalliro!
Description: Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.

Genres: Oneshot, Drama, Web Comic
Title: Tonari no Kumazawa-kun
Description: What I want is not a place to fit (in), but a place to eat

Genres: Action, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: The Lazy Boy Is, In Fact, the Strongest and Most Brutal Assassin.
Description: In a certain kingdom’s capital, war is approaching. A young boy named Il, an apprentice guard, is treated as a useless person who can’t do his job properly, living a lazy life while constantly relying on his stepsister. Amidst this, a certain rumor is spreading throughout the city. It is said that a mysterious group of assassins known as the Night Dwellers are operating in the shadows. This is the story of the worst assassin among them. --- **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66455)

Genres: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: Youheidan no Ryouriban
Description: The story begins when Azuma Akari, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gangreve, the leader of a mercenary group. Akari joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Akari connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Akari is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Akari does not yet know that he will become a hero.

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love
Title: Kon-kon Ton-ton
Description: A manga where nothing happens because neither characters can give into the other.

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, School Life
Title: High Spec Lovers
Description: A romance about an unlikely couple. Asakura Rin and Hasegawa Kengo are a perfect couple that everyone admires. They are attractive, have perfect conduct, and excel both in sports and academics. They are the embodiment of a perfect boyfriend and girlfriend. However, for Hasegawa, things are not what they seem…

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Motto mo Kirawareteiru Saikyou no Akuyaku ni Tensei
Description: Arima Seto is a 23-year-old part-time worker. One day, he is reincarnated as Lobelia Crowley, the most vicious villain in the popular smartphone game Arcadia Fanrasy! He tries to do good deeds to avoid the catastrophe ending, but he can't stop using his sharp tongue...!?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Soshiki no Shukuteki to Kekkon Shitara Mecha Amai
Description: "...I hate you!" "What a coincidence. So do I." The two once belonged to opposing organisations of supernatural power users, and fought for their own opposing goals. Roushi Saikawa, also known as the "Feather Hunter," and Ritsuka Yanagi, the strongest supernatural power user known as the "White Demon." The two spent their days battling each other and had no normal social experience, but... "I love you, Rou-kun." "Me too, Ritsuka." After their organisation was disbanded, they somehow started dating and then got married! Is their hatred 100 times more adorable? Now, they are the epitome of a lovey-dovey couple, kissing each other at the door every morning when they go to work. But the husband had just one problem. That is, he had never shared a bed with his wife... In other words, even though he was married, he was still a virgin! This is the story of the hardships faced by such a husband, who gets caught up in numerous troubles but continues to make desperate attempts to deepen his love with his strict wife.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Inukai-san Chi no Oshikake JK
Description: One day, the thirty-something salaryman Inukai met a high school girl Komugi who claimed to be the reincarnation of his childhood dog. Now she comes over every day looking to play with her owner, but her pet antics don't seem so innocent in human form! A semi-cohabitation comedy between a dog-girl and a single office worker!

Genres: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: RG Veda
Description: **From TokyoPop:** 300 years ago, a powerful warlord rebelled against the Heavenly Emperor. After killing the Emperor, the warlord crowned himself as the new Emperor, starting a cruel reign. But there is a prophecy: Six Stars will one day assemble and overthrow his tyrannical rule … Now, the ruler of the Yasha Clan has found Ashura, the last of the Ashura Clan, and together they set out to find the Six Stars and fulfill the prophecy.

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: Sutochiru
Description: The story of three street children, Chamcham, Stella and Ozaki, seeking to change the world tied to adult rules.

Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: List Rouge
Description: In a world where humans are protected by the Chimera tribe as an endangered species. As he spends time with a human girl, a certain emotion begins to grow in the heart of a Chimera boy.....!
