Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Slice of Life
Title: Smoke Blue no Ame Nochi Hare
Description: Sakutaro's former colleague and No. 1 sales rival, Shizuka Kuji, saved him from danger when he was out having a good time one night.When Kuji left the company a step earlier than Sakutaro, he looked at him with envy, thinking that he must have a brilliant second career now.But when Kuji reunites with Sakutaro for the first time in eight years, his sarcastic personality is still the same, but for some reason, he is now working as a translator, looking languid and with long hair...

Genres: Action, Demons, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Supernatural
Title: Tougen Anki
Description: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

Genres: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: You’re So Sloppy, Hotta-sensei
Description: Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his school’s most popular teacher, the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob, the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now, Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?

Genres: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Kuu-chan ga Iku!
Description: Cute short story about Kuuchan the cat and his adventures at the animal hospital.

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: The Modern Witch's Employment Prospects
Description: Tamashiro Neko is a young witch in training, sent off by her parents to finish her studies. In her search for a place to stay, she arrives in a quiet town in the countryside, but then her first trial begins.

Genres: Monsters, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Isekai ni Teni Shitara Yama no Naka datta. Handou de Tsuyosa yori mo Kaitekisa o Erabimashita
Description: One summer day, Jin Konohana, is forced to carry luggage to a firework festival by his outrageous older sister, and before he knows, he finds himself in an unfamiliar mountain. In the mountains where no one is around, Jin begins a life of survival all by himself. In order to survive... I want to throw away all the troublesome things and live peacefully and comfortably! A slow life in another world that begins in the mountains!

Genres: Ghosts, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Yuuan no Kanata
Description: The presence of 'it' can be felt everywhere. Kanata, a woman who lost her sense of fear after a certain incident, searches for moments that freeze her heart as she follows the traces of 'it'...!? In parks, on emergency staircases, and in the cracks between walls, people who accidentally draw close to the presence of 'it' experience indescribable terror, leaving their everyday lives irreparably changed. After all, ghosts really are the scariest...

Genres: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Tenchou to Mujikakuna Tennin
Description: Mitsu Kumano, a JK who works part-time at a cafe, is a stylish and mature 16-year-old. However, she is "unaware" of everything she does, including her thoughtful remarks and bold behavior. Thanks to this, the manager of her part-time job, Yuya Higurashi, has his heart overloaded everyday!

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Music
Title: Shitto wa Ai wo Kumoraseru
Description: “Falling in love, I didn’t expect it would only take an instant.” A gifted but burned out pianist x a late blooming genius. A progressive love story about being bound by an inferiority complex! Kirino feels that his talent for piano is at its limit. On the other hand, his junior, Takase, who is naive and loved by everyone, is blossoming with talent. Kirino feels annoyed by Takase’s admiration for him and views him as a thorn in his side. However, Takase doesn’t even hesitate when he tells Kirino, “Senpai is my everything”…… Kirino doesn’t trust Takase, and uses his longing for him to play with his feelings, wanting to make him feel troubled. “You’re too shy to even look at me when I’m by your side, it’s so cute how you look like a puppy when you’re trembling with expectation.” Feeling complacent because of Takase’s affection, Kirino gradually starts to depend on him…!?

Genres: Philosophical, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: Shirokuro Sekai
Description: A series of stories between a girl with black hair and a girl with white hair

Genres: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Wheel of Reincarnation Rinne
Description: As a child, Mamiya Sakura mysteriously disappeared in the woods behind her grandma's home. She returned whole and healthy, but since then, she has had the power to see ghosts. Now a teenager, she just wishes the ghosts would leave her alone! At school, the desk next to Sakura's has been empty since the start of the school year. Then one day her always-absent classmate Rokudo Rinne shows up, and he's far more than what he seems! After school one day, Rinne helps Sakura deal with the ghost of a boy who has a crush on her. Rinne, it seems, knows just how to handle such ghosts, and has the skills and tools to properly dispatch them to the afterlife (for a small fee of course). Sakura starts to learn more about her mysterious classmate, and her curiosity about Rinne draws her deeper into the amazing world between life and death.

Genres: Monsters, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: The Frontier Alchemist ~ I Can't Go Back to That Job After You Made My Budget Zero
Description: Rust worked in the alchemist association. He specialized in basic research, but the current president, a former government official, failed to understand the importance of the basic research department and slashed its budget. To make matters worse, he was made to transmute basic materials for alchemists of other departments. But one day, his budget for the next term was reduced to zero, and the president announced the basic research department was disbanded. The same day, a friend from his academy days invited him to help develop her new dominion in the borderland, and Rust, seeing no future for himself in the association, decided to quit. Rust was actually one of the greatest alchemists on the planet. The basic materials he transmuted were of the highest quality, and could not be acquired anywhere else. These high quality materials covered a lot of gaps in the association, and Rust’s departure made a big mess. Feeling liberated after leaving the association, Rust worked in the borderland with a newfound enthusiasm and vigor.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
Title: Kimi no Love woo Misetekure!
Description: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?

Genres: Oneshot, Fantasy, Slice of Life
Title: Touhou Gumonshiki ~ Perfect Memento in Strict Sense.
Description: It'a autumn in Gensokyo. Hieda no Akyu is about to finish the next chronicle of Gensokyo when she is visited by several inhabitants of the land.

Genres: Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Usotsuki Majo to Haiiro no Niji
Description: "Everything looks the same in this ashen world. Flowers, birds, rainbows, myself. I wonder what 'color' we are. If I meet a witch, will I be able to see 'colors' too?" This story takes place in a world that has lost its "color". Only "witches" can see them. One day, Luma, a boy who longs for a vibrant world, heads to a forest where witches are said to live. After getting lost, he meets a witch named Ilya, and their encounter changes the fate of their "colorless" world. An adaptation of the light novel of the same name, which was written by Soraru and illustrated by Tsukasa Kiryuu.

Genres: Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Tensei Youjo. Kamikemono to Ouji to, Saikyou no Ojisan Youhei-dan no Naka de Ikiru.
Description: Lise found herself alone in a strange meadow as a young girl. Also, there is a big dog in front of her. There wasn't a dog like that in the neighborhood, and that's when Lise was convinced. "I see... This is what they call reincarnation in another world!" Then, a group of muscular mercenaries appears in front of Lise. It seems that they have come to defeat this dog. But to her surprise, this dog is a divine beast! Ranagh, the divine beast, has grown fond of Lise, who is the only one who can understand him. So, the leader of the mercenary group, Arlagia, offers to protect Lise and Ranagh with his mercenary group...? A young girl, a divine beast, and the strongest group of mercenaries - a wacky otherworldly fantasy with a cast of unorthodox characters!

Genres: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Nanairo Sekai
Description: 1: The Glasses Thief A cute story about a boy with bad eyesight and the girl who is in love with him. 2: Convenience Store Honey A boy worries about his quiet boyfriend. 3: Adult Uniform A girl wonders why her childhood friend does not speak to her anymore. 4: Refrigerator Chocolate Satoru is going to have heart surgery with a 50/50 chance of survival. One day, he comes across a girl in a refrigerator…

Genres: Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru
Description: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?

Genres: Romance, Drama
Title: Saikai Shita Osananajimi ga Watashi o Suki da Nante Kiitenai!
Description: Nao, a first-year university student, is quietly enjoying her campus life. The school is buzzing with talk about her handsome classmate and model, “Sho,” but she assumes such a glamorous world has nothing to do with her plain self. However, to her surprise, her crybaby and clumsy childhood friend turns out to be “Sho”! Not only that, but they suddenly start living together in secret from everyone…?! A love story between two people who can’t be honest with their feelings begins to unfold after their reunion.

Genres: Oneshot, Slice of Life, Full Color
Title: Non Non Biyori Vacation - Nyanpasu Picture Diary
Description: A booklet that came with the Non Non Biyori Vacation Movie Bluray showing the picture diary renge was making.

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: Noyu Girl
Description: Hibari Otaka, whose hobby is to have a bath in such wild hot springs, travels alone around the country to visit them! You'll be fascinated by the unknown world of wild hot springs! (Source: Shogakukan, translated)

Genres: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka o Tamemasu
Description: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she's always dreamed of!

Genres: Action, Ghosts, Supernatural
Title: Ghost Fixers
Description: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Shimotsuki-san wa Mobu ga Suki ~Hitomishiri na Kanojo wa Ore ni Dake Dere Amai~
Description: ***Only you are special.*** After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile. But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru
Title: Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan
Description: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?

Genres: Drama, Slice of Life, Music
Title: Singing The Superstar.
Description: "I don't know if I want to rap. I don't have anything I want to sing about...Or anything I want to say." Oji Yukito is a 17-year-old drug dealer living in the desperate environment of the streets of Osaka, suppressing his emotions each and every day. He lost his drug-addicted mother and his beloved sister when he was a child, leaving him an orphan. Despite his loneliness, he has a best friend who believes in him. In the midst of continuing to sell drugs, enduring beatings from his boss, and bleeding...Just what is it that lies in his heart?

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!
Description: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Isekai de Mizu no Dai Seirei Yattemasu
Description: When the laid-back high school student Saejima Nagi wakes up from a nap, he finds himself in a lake in another world!? After learning that he is the "Great Water Spirit" whose essence is the lake, Nagi uses the power that resides within him to heal those suffering from injuries and illnesses. One day, Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and is summoned by a boy. This encounter will greatly change Nagi's fate...

Genres: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Adaptation
Title: Shoujo Seikan Hyouryuuki
Description: A spaceship in the shape of a horse-drawn carriage travels across the galaxy. Riding in the carriage is Ridley, the scientist who built this eccentric spaceship, and her partner Watari, a shy girl. The two leave Earth, which has become uninhabitable due to environmental pollution, and set off in the carriage. Their goal is to find a safe planet to settle. However, all the planets they visit are very strange! A planet with a god who can bring all things back to life, another planet where the luckiest people are considered the greatest, and a planet with countless libraries… The two girls are sometimes thrown for a loop by these strange worlds…

Genres: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Mystery
Title: Jupiteria
Description: The year is 2150, and humanity has entered the Space Age of Exploration. The largest planet in the solar system, Jupiter, in particular is a treasure trove of natural resources. Seeking those resources, humanity has built up numerous biospheres in its vicinity. Those who are born in zero gravity in the Jupiter Zone are known as "Jupiterians". Rico Alberoni is one such person. He lives on Callisto, Jupiter's fourth moon. For him each day was a torment — bullied at school for his peculiar Jupiterian constitution and poked and prodded like a guinea pig at the lab. Until one day he met a man who makes his living recovering wrecked spaceships, a "salvager" named Reiji... This is a story about a boy who couldn't seize today cutting his own path into the unknowable tomorrow. This is an outer space frontier tale for a new generation!

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
Title: The Band
Description: The series is a new band story following a young man who sets off on a music journey when his soul is set aflame after discovering a guitar Source:ANN

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life
Title: Killing Line
Description: Mako, a high school girl who has been abandoned by her father who disappeared, is forced to resort to papa-katsu (dating a sugar-daddy) to survive. On her first night, while she is taking a shower after finishing her business, her sugar-daddy is killed by a hitman, and he is about to kill Mako as well, but the hitman seems to recognize her somehow. Caught in a desperate situation, Mako has one last chance! Selling flattery in order to survive! Operation Fake Lover is about to begin!

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Atarashii Kimi e
Description: Sakuma, a teacher at an all-girls school, sees his wife in the red-light district cheating on him one day. In response, he runs away and decides to tour Japan, going wherever his heart may lead him. He finally reaches Odawara and meets a young girl, that looks like the one he always sees in his dreams. He barely manages to stop himself from crossing the line with the girl, and he eventually returns to his normal life, having discovered that his wife's alleged cheating was all a misunderstanding. But then...

Genres: Sci-Fi, Mecha, Military, Drama, Aliens, Adaptation
Title: Guilty Children
Description: The story begins with an attack on humanity by giant indestructible monsters named "Enemies." The Enemies drive humanity to the brink of extinction… but the one to save the world from the depths of hell is a lone boy! The SF novel series by Kafka Asagiri (*Bungou Stray Dogs*) jumps into the manga scene with art by Anri Sakano (*Sayonara Peter Pan*)! Is he God or is he the Devil… will the amnesiac protagonist Kyle Kamishiro bring a future filled with hope, or?!

Genres: Action, Magic, Military, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Kage no Eiyuu no Nichijou-tan
Description: In the Great War of Heroes, the heroes and the Demon King fight for survival and power in each reincarnation. In the fourth war, the heroes defeated the Demon King... but that is only on the surface. The true hero who defeated the Demon King was Tweight, a shadow agent who would destroy any enemy who asked him to. After the Great War, Tweight, who wished to lead a peaceful life as an unsung hero, wished to enroll in the Normal Course of the Bildarz Royal Academy.

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Mousou Sensei
Description: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Hazure Waku no [Joutai Ijou Skill] de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete o Juurin Suru made
Description: Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself. The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?! ___ **Compositor:** [Uchiuchi Keyaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3b71274c-d84b-4505-bed0-1ee2adda188f) **Character Designer:** [KWKM](https://mangadex.org/author/d7705978-2785-490d-8292-71738dc20ef3)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete
Description: One day, a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant. “We have nothing to do with anything else… We just have to do it, that is, you have to get me pregnant, and I have your baby. The loveless relationship between the two had begun. Although the condition was not to fall in love with each other, the distance between the two gradually narrowed. The romance story between a typical worker and a divorced female boss. It has officially begun.

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Kon no Ki Konoha
Description: Only in autumn when the dead leaves flutter about can Akino meet the mysterious boy who lives inside the deep blue tree.

Genres: Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Kashimashi Meshi
Description: Three friends get together for an unfortunate occasion. Each of them is facing a difficult moment, between finished or complicated loves. But even if it is difficult and it seems to you that your heart is about to dry up, you can always find new light and hope if you reunite with people you love to eat rice together.

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
Title: Daybreak
Description: Marcus has a crush, and Cog is completely unprepared for the hijinks that follow. Hopefully in their efforts to grow closer, they can brighten each other's day.

Genres: Romance, Drama
Title: Yesterday o Utatte afterword
Description: A compilation collecting the new one-shot which depicts the later developments following the final chapter of the main story, a previously uncollected one-shot, latest interviews with Toume Kei and the director of the anime adaptation, Fujiwara Yoshiyuki, and more.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai.
Description: Arata Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arata doesn't realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.

Genres: Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Nito no Taidana Isekai Shoukougun ~Saijaku Shoku "Healer" nano ni Saikyou wa Cheat desu ka?~
Description: Hidako Masamune is a high school student who suffers from continuous bullying by his classmates. Becoming tired of it all, he decides to commit suicide, but instead he is transported to another world along with all his classmates. When they arrive, they find that they now possess amazing abilities but he was only granted the status of a "healer," the weakest skill of all. The king decides to get rid of him by transporting him to another faraway place, but not before Hidako swears revenge against the king, the kingdom, and all of his classmates.

Genres: Action, Crime, Mafia, Crossdressing, Mystery
Title: Nibiiro no Chameleon
Description: During the Japanese Asset Price Bubble, everyone, men or women, young or old, lived in a world that was filled with frenzy. In the air where strength overruns weakness, there is a "woman" who tries to avenge her past. But, there's a twist with this "woman". One is that she was a cold killer. Second is that this "woman" is actually a man.

Genres: Romance, Drama, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Yane Urabeya no Koushaku Fujin
Description: The new life of Duchess Opal all started from a dusty attic. The house she resided in after a political marriage with the young Duke, Hubert, was full of hostility. There was also a woman named "Angel," who is treasured by the mansion's owner... Opal gained a bad reputation because of a disgraceful rumor and as a result, she was treated like a hindrance. However, the Duchess doesn't like losing, so it won't end like this! The woman is unrelated to the management of the territory. I will outwit those who let their guard down…!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Mafia, Delinquents, Police
Title: Tyranno
Description: Sexual violence tag is for chapter 1 only. The setting is the year 202X, in Kamata, Ota Ward, Tokyo, which has become one of the world's leading entertainment districts due to the opening of the Kamata Line. The area attracts huge economic benefits and is surrounded by organized crime, foreign mafias, terrorists, smugglers, prostitution rings... and the hidden agendas of political, financial, and governmental power players. A newly assigned police officer, Nonogami, stationed at the station's front police box, feels despair over the corruption of power. However, with the overwhelming violence of "Tyranno," a massive female police officer, the cases begin to be solved.

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Kuro no Shoukanshi
Description: "If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself." While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on! Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! ___ **Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16) **Additional Links:** - [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/) - [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)

Genres: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: I Parry Everything: What Do You Mean I’m the Strongest? I’m Not Even an Adventurer Yet!
Description: Ever since he was a young boy, Noor has wanted to be like the adventurers in his father’s stories — dragonslayers, cursebreakers, heroes who always save the day. But as everyone knows, to be an adventurer, you’ve gotta have the right skills! Unfortunately for Noor, his [Parry] is bottom-of-the-barrel useless, his prospects are nonexistent, and everybody he knows is telling him to throw in the towel. Faced with this harsh reality, he figures there’s only one thing to do: make up for it with effort! An intense, solitary training regimen ought to do it. If one year won’t cut it, he’ll train for five! If not five, ten! Now facing the tail end of his twenties with no new skills to show for his labors, Noor sets out to become an adventurer anyway, determined to try one last time to make his dream come true. He might be clueless when it comes to adventuring, but he’s no stranger to hard work! Now, if only he can figure out why everyone keeps looking at him like that... ___ **Character Designer:** [Kawaguchi](https://mangadex.org/author/5de43f9b-53f5-4ff9-a411-ce159f4d1bd4) **Additional Links:** - [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6537fu/)

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~
Description: The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it. In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

Genres: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural
Title: Hope You're Happy, Lemon
Description: "I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that." Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning... To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: KiraKira☆Pretty Cure A La Mode
Description: 14-year-old Ichika Usami loves sweets and wishes to become a patisserie. When she encounters fairy Pekorin, she is able to transform into Cure Whip to protect Kirakiraru, an energy that represents the feelings put into making a sweet, from the Kirakiraru Thieves. Ichika joins five other girls to form the KiraKira Pretty Cure team and protect the sweets!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, School Life, Police, Mystery
Title: Unmei no Makimodoshi
Description: An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case!

Genres: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Supernatural
Title: Gachaman
Description: One day, high schooler Kaito Kuji lost his memory. When he came to, he found the word "Thank you" written on his chest above a dial for a capsule toy vending machine. It's a mysterious capsule toy vending machine, which contains his lost memories and also some special supernatural abilities. But in order for him to turn the dial, he has to have someone tell him, "Thank you"...?!! So he needs to gather people's gratitude and use the toy capsule machine to fight!!

Genres: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Yameru Hoshi yori Ai wo Komete
Description: Suicide is a daily occurrence for people on this planet, where they coexist with "Fluffy," a special clinical creature provided by aliens with the ability to give super-powerful healing to its hosts. What is the drama for people living in this strange world?

Genres: Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Zekkyou Gakkyuu Tensei
Description: A reboot of the award winning series Zekkyou Gakkyuu, with brand new stories.

Genres: Thriller, Horror, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: Tenshi no Saezuri
Description: Sanae Kitajima is a psychiatrist specializing in end-of-life care. Her boyfriend, Takanashi, who once struggled with a deep fear of death, returns from an Amazon expedition profoundly changed. What happened during the expedition? What is the true meaning behind his cryptic words, "I can hear the whispers of angels"? A complete manga adaptation of Yusuke Kishi's original novel, known for producing numerous masterpiece horror novels such as The Black House and Lesson of the Evil.

Genres: Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Seikatsu Mahoutsukai no Gekokujou
Description: I'm not "useless"! I'll prove it by conquering dungeons! Suddenly, magic and dungeons appear in modern Japan, and life has changed completely. I, Midorimu Sakaki, am born with a talent for life magic that cannot be used for exploring dungeons or defeating demons. I was born with a talent for life magic, but while exploring dungeons, I got my hands on a rare item, the "Sage System," which allows me to create new magic...? ___ [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816452218254294002) (jp)

Genres: Reincarnation, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Tensei Slum Machi kara no Nariagari
Description: At the age of 6, Ed, a boy suddenly recalls that he is a reincarnated individual from modern Japan. However, his current life unfolds in the slums of another world! Struggling with a poverty-stricken existence in his daily life, he shares his living space with and eats with his childhood friend, a girl named Miinya. Their daily fare consists mainly of 'boiled beans.' Ed, drawing upon his knowledge from modern Japan, discovers edible wild plants and leaves suitable for making tea to improve their dietary situation. In pursuit of a slow life, Ed's life of gathering and hunting begins!

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Yuusha-sama no Osananajimi to Iu Settei no Make Heroine ni Tensei shita no de, Chougoushi ni Job Change Shimasu
Description: As the monster's teeth drew near, it was then that I remembered. "I've witnessed this scene before." This was the world of an RPG I played in my previous life. And I, as the main character's childhood friend, was the losing love interest who would be turned down by him in the future. The childhood friend whose role ended one hour into the opening after confessing to the main character as he was about to set off into his journey. The one many players sympathized with as the main character would meet another girl who would cling onto him during his journey. If I remain in this village, in the future I'll be the losing love interest?! To prevent that from happening, I'll leave the village and make use of my newly blossomed ability in compounds with becoming an alchemist at the royal capital as my aim. I don't give a damn about some job that requires me to be the main character's childhood friend. I'll be seizing happiness with my own hands!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Kanchigai no Atelier Meister: Eiyuu Party no Moto Zatsuyougakari ga, Jitsu wa Sentou Igai ga SSS Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi
Description: Kuruto gets kicked out of the hero's party for being too useless in combat. However unknown to him, he's SSS Rank in skills like cooking, building, magic tool crafting, etc. WN Raw: <https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/292207951/264201950>

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
Title: Keikenzumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai Suru Hanashi
Description: Ryuuto Kashima is a gloomy high school student. Because of a punishment game, he was forced to confess to Runa Shirakawa, a girl from the top of school caste and admired by everyone. They ended up going out for the unexpected reason of "Err, I'm free now so..." but, Ryuuto ends up following and eavesdropping Runa getting confessed by a handsome soccer club member, and Runa bringing Ryuuto, whom she just started dating, to her own room as a matter of course. They have different friends and ways to have fun, different in just about everything. And yet, surprised by their differences everyday, accepting it, they begin to relate with each other. ___ **Character Designer:** [magako](https://mangadex.org/author/fd30d521-18ba-4638-94c3-700858ce7c43)

Genres: Demons, Romance, Fantasy
Title: Akuma de Kore wa Koi janai!
Description: Aguri, is a young girl who is a demon apprentice. She comes to the human world after her teacher assigned her "to make a human fall in love with her". She thinks it will be easy since she is quite famous in the demons' world, but her target, Kyou-kun, is much better than her...

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Boukenroku: Jichou o Shiranai Kamigami no Shito
Description: Shiina Kazuya, the protagonist of the story was killed by a stranger in front of a convenience store when he tried to protect two young girls escaping from the stranger who is trying to stab them. The girls fall and are too overcome with fear to get up and continue running away. When Shiina Kazuya awakens he realizes that he was reincarnated as the young noble Cain von Silford, the third son of an aristocrat (Margrave Garm Von Silford) and his second wife (Sarah) in a world filled with sword and sorcery. Prior to the age of ten Cain grew up in the Gracia Territory surrounded by gods that don't know self-restraint, in the upper echelon of nobility, and a loving family (father Garm Von Silford, mother Sarah, and older sister Raine). At the age of ten Cain is given peerage (Title of Duke, own estate, and an engagement), which leads to him living in Esfort the Royal Capitol. This is a classic isekai fantasy about an overpowered young man who just wants to be an average adventurer. He has received the maximum level of divine blessings from all seven gods, overcomes any obstacle that comes his way while hiding his unbelievable status and tends to build a harem of highly influential nobles.

Genres: Historical, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
Title: Crimson Cross ~Till Death Do Us Part~
Description: Carl van Hellsing has vowed to hunt down the vampire Elliot for eternity. But, that's exactly what Elliot wants.

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
Description: Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn’t have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called “Incompetent” by his classmates. The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a “Synergist”, and his very mediocre stats. “Synergist”, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive? --- **Links:** - [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)

Genres: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Myou-chan-sensei wa Kaku Katariki
Description: Sasafune Miyoko, the nurse at a certain high school, is often asked for advice by the students. Almost every day someone comes to ask her about their worries, and this and that… But since these are high school students going through puberty, helping them is usually not that simple! Myō-chan-sensei is hard at work answering questions that are sure to make you blush like "Have you ever had sex outdoors?" or "I wonder which panties my boyfriend likes more".

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: The Lady's Servant
Description: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
Title: Gin no Kutsu
Description: This is the story of Jun, a (nearly) six-year-old boy. Life from the point of view of a little rascal with two loving dads and a pair of adorable friends.

Genres: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: Watashi wo Suki Sugiru Yuusha-sama wo Riyou shite, Konse koso Nagaiki suru Tsumoridattanoni (Tabun, Mata Shippaishita)
Description: Lisette, the daughter of an earl, is destined to be killed and eaten by a monster on her 20th birthday. She is currently living her fourth life with all her memories intact. In order to live longer this time, she goes to live in a sanctuary (the countryside) where monsters do not appear, but one day she reunites with Ralph, the handsome son of an aristocrat. He is the young man whom Lisette saved when he was an orphan in her childhood. The first words he says to her are, "I lived for you." The first volume of a fantasy about a heroine who fights against her fate of death and a submissive, high-spec yandere hero, a devoted and doting love story!

Genres: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Gotou-san wa Furimukasetai!
Description: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?

Genres: Psychological, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Mystery
Title: Watashi no Hara no Naka no Bakemono
Description: ***Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.*** Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature. (Source: Comic-Days)

Genres: Romance, Comedy
Title: Kowamote Koukousei to Jimiko-san
Description: “I’ve come back for you.” The handsome boy who moved away ten years ago has returned… with a super scary face?! Sachi, the 26 year-old manager of a little florist shop, was closing up when suddenly a high schooler with a terrifying face approached saying, “I came as promised.” The manly and earnest high schooler with a terrifying face X the super dull plain jane, in a heart bursting love story! ♥ <Translated from comic.pixiv>

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Madowasenaide Yamori-kun
Description: Mori and Yamori, who sits behind him, decide to change their image for the summer vacation. They make their summer vacation debut without any problems, but for some reason Yamori starts cross-dressing. And he keeps saying and doing flirtatious things...!? A hot topic on social media!! A comedy about the mismatched love between a handsome guy and a beautiful girl!

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: Tensei Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa Fukushuu wo Nozomanai THE COMIC
Description: “I’m not interested in revenge!” Rosemary was branded as a villainess and hanged for a crime she didn’t commit. She reincarnates as the commoner, “Marie,” while still retaining the memories of her previous life and hopes to live peacefully this time. However, contrary to Marie’s wishes, she ends up returning to the royal palace. “Sister, how do you want to punish the people who killed you?” Her brother, whom she doted on in her previous life, had changed completely and intended to take revenge on behalf of his sister. “Master, please tell me your desire.” The knight who swore allegiance in the previous life swears his allegiance this time as well. I’m not thinking of taking revenge on the person who killed me. However, the people around me will not allow that…

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Slice of Life
Title: Yakuza ni Ofuro de Hatarakasaretemasu.
Description: Miyako Yamazumei, who grew up in a single-parent household, returns to her hometown for the first time in 10 years after the death of her father. Her father left Miyako with the public bathhouse that he cherished, and a debt of 10 million yen that he owed to the yakuza. Miyako and the yakuza money-lender are determined to rebuild the bathhouse to make it profitable again. (Source: Natalie.mu, translated)

Genres: Comedy, Self-Published, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: ATTITUDE: 13
Description: Life's an adventure dammit! A group of high-school kids goofing around instead of studying, teachers struggling to get a grip on their work and personal lives, a man worrying about his looks, and so on. This surreal comedy is full of odd, interesting, positively absurd people who live in dizzying harmony, dealing with the nonsense of daily life. Beauty in chaos. Sunshine in disaster.

Genres: Thriller, Sports, Drama
Title: Get Away, Matsumoto！-100 days escape-
Description: Formerly a three time back-to-back winner of the All-Japan Intercollegiate Road Cycling Championships, Mastumoto now spends his days doing bike deliveries to pay the bills. Just as he contemplates giving up cycling for the sake of his future, Matsumoto suddenly finds himself at the center of an unbelievable incident...! Make way for this hard-hitting high-speed action!!

Genres: Romance, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, School Life, Delinquents, Music
Title: Kuse ni Narisou ♡
Description: ☆ I'm Shiratori Nagisa, an idol! Tossing people around is a hobby of mine. Is there a strong and cool boy out there somewhere? Finally, a super hilarious romantic comedy! Includes 2 other stories.

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: 12 Suicidal Children
Description: The story is a locked-room mystery where 12 kids go into an abandoned hospital to give up on life. In the room where they meet, a boy is already lying dead, and no one knows who he is.

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Sekai no Owari no Encore
Description: The valuable treasure, the “Encore” which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero, has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero, he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the “Fake Brave Hero”. The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische, who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline, though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him, but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. “Do you want to come with us?”. This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes. The boy known as the fake Brave Hero cross paths with the legend now! ---

Genres: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Taiyou no Ijiwaru
Description: A collection of four short stories by Fuyumi Souryou. The Rainbow Fish is a story about a painter and her problems dealing with a culture that doesn't leave too much space for artistic inspiration. From a little girl to adulthood, Sari struggles to show how she sees life through her eyes. This story is something of an autobiography. Damned Sun is about a cynical girl who isn't very enthusiastic about most things teenagers like. She meets a man, a funny, interesting gangster. They get along very well from the beginning, understanding each other without too many words… But it only lasts one day, since what shakes Maki from her apathy can't last long… Strange Trait asks the question: Are human beings are like groceries? Do they really have a certain durability? A writer thinks so, and she bases her novel on the idea. A Strange Gene is about Ayano Yoshimusa; a superb worker, efficient, accurate, and cold. Saegusa, her colleague, is her opposite: messy, chaotic and warm. He admires his boss, whenever he talks to her he realises what a perfect creature she is. But as always, not everything is what it seems. When a sixteen years old appears and tells him she lives with Ayano, Saegusa seems to perceive that something might be hidden under the perfect appearance of this beautiful woman.

Genres: Thriller, Crime, Drama
Title: Smother Me
Description: In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life…!

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Sekai Saikyou no Assassin, Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei Suru
Description: The most dangerous prey... When the most accomplished assassin on Earth meets his end just before retirement, he finds himself standing before a goddess. Her world is headed for disaster, and she has need of his particular set of skills. Armed with powerful new abilities and decades of deadly knowledge, he begins his second life as Lugh, young scion of the Tuatha Dé clan of assassins. His mission: to find and eliminate the strongest individual in this world—the hero!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls
Title: Peach Boy Riverside
Description: Sarutorine Aldike, or Sari, is a bright, cheerful princess who wants to go on an adventure because she is bored of her tiny little castle in the countryside. One day, a hoard of vicious demons known as "Oni" come knocking on her doorstep, threatening the lives of everyone in the Kingdom. Thankfully, they are saved by a lone traveler named Kibitsu Mikoto who slays these monsters with a mysterious "Peach Eye". Shocked by the dangers of the outside world, Sari decides to set off on a journey of her own. Little did she know that she will set in motion a chain of events that will come to determine the fate of this magical world. Remake version of Cool Kyoushinsha’s popular webcomic of the same name.

Genres: Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: S-Kyuu Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi: Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku 'Buki Master' de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru
Description: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!

Genres: Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
Title: A Livid Lady's Guide to Getting Even: How I Crushed My Homeland with My Mighty Grimoires
Description: Lady Elizabeth has her engagement annulled at a party by the crown prince, whose heart has moved on to another young noblewoman. She is then imprisoned in the dungeon over unjust accusations, and learns she has been betrayed by the country to which she has devoted everything... At the peak of her frustration, Elizabeth finally decides to defect, with a grimoire holding hidden and formidable powers in hand!! She begins her new life and trade with the help of Viscount Lucas from the neighbouring country. With a fierce desire for revenge against her home country in her heart.

Genres: Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Martial Arts, Samurai, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
Title: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau
Description: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches”. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0171) **Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-war-of-greedy-witches)

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Apparently, Disillusioned Adventurers Will Save the World
Description: Life isn’t going well for veteran adventurer Nick. Despite his loyalty to his party, he was betrayed by a teammate who accused him of embezzlement, then kicked out by his mentor. On top of that, his girlfriend dumped him too! Tired, heartbroken, and looking for a drink, Nick chances upon a few kindred spirits who are as jaded as he is. Can these disillusioned heroes put their faith in each other long enough to save the world together…?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation
Title: Kimitte Watashi no Koto Suki Nandesho?
Description: “Hey Kuroya-kun, do you like me?” “How did you know!?” Unrequited love. What a shame for Kuroya, a gloomy student in high school. The other party is Kasumi Shiramori, a senior in the literature club and a transcendentally beautiful girl. While spending time alone in the club, I should have hidden this feeling for a long time…! Senior told Kuroya in desperation. “Then -? Want to try dating me first?” There’s no way a relationship exists in the minds of these two!? No, wait, it should be like this- Both the feelings and the super-sweet romantic comedy of youth are full of faintness in the misery of a longing senior who is teased despite being in a relationship! --- **Links:** - [Official LN (EN)](https://tentaibooks.com/en/books/you-like-me-dont-you-so-wanna-go-out-with-me-volume-1)

Genres: Psychological, Crossdressing, School Life
Title: Ore no Dankon ♡ Sacrifice
Description: In order to lose my family's debt (4 billion), I decided to go to a girls' school by dressing as a woman, as per the order of "a pervert who loves romantic comedy and has too much power". School life is full of confusion, but fortunately, in the midst of misfortune, all the members of the student council are "men" who go to girls' schools in the same circumstances. Can you win a peaceful school life despite the perverted old man who wants romantic comedy troubles? (source: mangaupdates)

Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life
Title: AV Danyuu Hajimemashita
Description: When your company goes bankrupt and your marriage is on the rocks, what’s a guy to do? Move to Tokyo to become an adult film star, of course! This diary-style comedy explores the pitfalls of an everyman who tries to break into the world of porno because it seems like a pleasurable way to restart his life. He soon learns that it’s a harder job than he bargained for!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life
Title: Metsuki Warui Ko Kawaii Ko
Description: This delinquent is stupid cute! High schooler Tanaka-kun believes that scary girls are actually cute. Thus, sitting next to the delinquent Mizuno-san he strives to get closer to her. However, in addition to having a scary expression, she's the subject of many rumors and feared by her classmates!! Although getting the cold shoulder at first, Tanaka's feverish offensive opens Mizuno's heart up bit by bit. But Tanaka's plan to help her fit in with their classmates during the school festival is threatened when disaster strikes! (Translation of the Volume 1 synopsis on Amazon by KasketBox) A twitter short by @hamita1220

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
Title: Drama na Koi wa Kihon kara
Description: Shinji Yuuki is an ordinary businessman, 35 years old, single, no girlfriend, living at home. He is worried about his future as a single man, but he has little experience in love and is afraid of marriage activity. But when he meets a female doctor, he falls in "love beyond his imagination," a love that turns his life upside down!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Futari Solo Camp
Description: Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. Thus Gen and Shizuku's days of solo camping together begin. **Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning. The series resumed its publication in December 2023.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Military, Drama
Title: Gundam EXA
Description: Gundam EXA (ガンダム EXA) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2011. Being Gundam Ace's 10th Anniversary Project, it is tied in with the arcade and PS3 Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Full Boost. The story takes place in unnamed timeline, where humanity has highly advanced technology. However, the human population is decreasing and it seems that they're on their way to extinction. The protagonists are Leos Alloy, Sthesia Awar and their Haro. They work on a Jupiter base called "Jupiter X", using "General Answer" (or "GA") which contains a massive repository of data about the previous eras of humanity, Leos travels to the Earths' of the previous eras in an effort to collect data that might give them a hint for the evolution of mankind.

Genres: Psychological, Ghosts, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Kanjuten
Description: An interconnected omnibus of stories that explores the subtle distortions of everyday life, delving into how ordinary experiences can take unsettling turns. Each narrative weaves together to examine the eerie sensations that arise when the familiar becomes uncanny.

Genres: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Braid into Love
Description: A young boy finds himself fascinated by the long hair of the boy in class who sits in front of him.

Genres: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
Title: Quality Assurance in Another World
Description: Haga is one of the debuggers that gets stuck in the world of an incomplete VR game. Though he eradicates a monster from a village, the destruction event that ends with the villagers' deaths triggers without fail. However, Nicola, the villager girl he saves, revives before his eyes.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life
Title: Kimi ni Koisuru Sanshimai
Description: In the world of daily full-throttle dedication to his studies, there's Itsuki, a high school boy. The reason he's putting in so much effort into his studies is to reunite with his first love, a girl named Amane, and go on a date with her. While he's immersed in these study-centric days, by a twist of fate, he ends up living together with Amane and her sisters, Shion and Mone...!?

Genres: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama
Title: The Blue World
Description: The Blue Hole is a gateway that takes you back in time to a prehistoric age. In anticipation of the astonishing discovery, the United Kingdom and the United States dispatched a joint team to the Jurassic world 145 million years ago and embarked on a full-scale investigation. Just then, a sudden phenomenon cuts off communications with the modern world. Few people with limited equipment are left behind. Survival in a terrifying world where everything is unknown and dinosaurs roam free has begun!

Genres: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Midnight
Description: Midnight is the story of a taxi driver named Shinya Mito (whose name is literally Japanese for "mid" and "night") and his various passengers, each of whom he helps in various ways. Shinya drives a taxi as a way to earn money for the treatment of a young woman named Mari, whose brain was injured sometime earlier as the result of an accident Shinya was responsible for causing. The taxi Shinya drives is equipped with a fifth wheel which makes the car more maneuverable under any kind of road conditions. --- **Volumes 354-359 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

Genres: Sci-Fi, Action, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Grand Metal Organs
Description: A boy killed by his superhero idol, then he decided to become a Dark Walker. "Saving the world by destroying the world"

Genres: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Nami no Shijima no Horizont
Description: Riku is an elementary school boy who loves football. Yori is a high school girl who is the ex-girlfriend of Riku's brother, and she is full of secrets. This is a story of first love that unfolds with the sea breeze, from a pre-adolescent perspective.

Genres: Historical, Action, Crime, Cooking
Title: Drunk Bullet
Description: After surviving World War I, Gary, a liquor-loving ex-serviceman, finally makes his way home. To his shock, Prohibition has post-war America in a chokehold! The curtains open on Gary's action-packed quest for a sweet, shining glass of booze!

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: Akuyaku Reijou no Tsuihougo!
Description: Event planner Yuka Sawatani‘s life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact, she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate, but at the ending of the game, she is promptly banished.

Genres: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
Title: GO ANd GO
Description: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

Genres: Historical, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
Title: The Bride who Raises the Villainous Dragon
Description: "It seems a magnificent dragon has fallen head over heels for me?" Pearl, the cursed daughter of a noble, was on her way to being sold off to a neighboring lord when she was suddenly kidnapped. But the one who kidnapped her is none other than Erik— a descendant of the Great Dragons. This enchanting yet fierce dragon confronted Pearl with a single demand, to say the words "I like you."...

Genres: Horror, Mystery
Title: Zashisu
Description: One day, junior high school teacher Yamauchi Umi sees a news report about a murder case. The murderer is Suzuki Yumi, a classmate from junior high school. A few days later, Yamauchi's girlfriend, Tamahuri Yagisawa, a rookie editor of literary books, finds a work that closely resembles the murder in a novel that was unsuccessful in a public contest. The author's name is Haruto Saeki. Soon, just like in the novel, an invitation to a class reunion arrives for an old friend... The first suspense horror volume by Masanori Morita!

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color
Title: Ore no Level Up ga Okashii! ~Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei~
Description: Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel. The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement... [Impregnation confirmed.] [Level up!] "Does this mean that the more 'seeding' I do, the stronger I get?" An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!

Genres: Romance, Drama, Adaptation, Music
Title: Idol Shikkaku
Description: Keita, a boring university student, is a gachikoi (fan who's seriously in love) otaku of Mimika, the center of the idol group Tetra. Even though he's aware that it's a love that will never happen, he continues to push on with giving her his emotional support. On the other hand, as her group's popularity continues to rise, Mimika bears anxiety over the uncertainty of the future even while she's happy with the fervently cheering Keita's affection. One day, Mimika falls into despair after her mother gets into a traffic accident, and with the help of social media, she heads towards Keita's part-time workplace...

Genres: Magic, Harem, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Henkyou no Yakushi, Miyako de S Rank Boukensha to naru ~Eiyuu-mura no Shounen ga Cheat Yaku de Mujikaku Musou~
Description: Leaf has been enjoying a peaceful life in his village at the farthest end of the country, but everything gets turned upside down when his fiancée betrays him, robbing him of his home, work, and everything he cherishes. Wandering around, lost on what to do next, he encounters a distinguished lady in peril who will change his life forever! Using the cheat-like power of medicine and drugs the world scoffs at, Leaf now begins his journey to become the almighty healer!

Genres: Genderswap, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Back Street Girls
Description: A group of 3 yakuza failed their boss for the last time. After messing up an important job, the boss gives them 2 choices: Honorably committing suicide, or go to Thailand to get a sex reassignment surgery in order to become "female" idols. After a gruesome year long training to become idols, they successfully debut, with overwhelming popularity, much to their dismay. This is where their tragedy truly begins. Link: [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20851) (anime)

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life, Delinquents
Title: Punch Rush JK Tara-chan
Description: Nikaido Katsuo, AKA “Fist King”, is the most powerful and undefeated delinquent in Japan. However, no one knows that behind the stories of his legendary battles, there is a girl behind the scenes… Her name is Tabara Nikaido. She is the fighter who took her brother's name and fought in secret, and defeated all the strong men in her way…… A slightly naughty story about a legendary fighter who happens to be a “tsuyokawa” JK! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550689798659821656)

Genres: Comedy, Sports, School Life
Title: Winning Pass
Description: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?

Genres: Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga
Description: Growth cheats? Infinite magic power? The ability to utilize all archetypes? What’s the point if instant death ends everything with a single attack? Awaking to absolute chaos and carnage while on a school trip, Yogiri Takatou discovers that everyone in his class has been transported to another world! He had somehow managed to sleep through the entire ordeal himself, missing out on the Gift — powers bestowed upon the others by a mysterious Sage who appeared to transport them. Even worse, he and another classmate were ruthlessly abandoned by their friends, left as bait to distract a nearby dragon. Although not terribly bothered by the thought of dying, he reluctantly decides to protect his lone companion. After all, a lowly Level 1000 monster doesn't stand a chance against his secret power to invoke Instant Death with a single thought! If he can stay awake long enough to bother using it, that is...

Genres: Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
Title: Hazure Potion ga Shouyu datta no de Ryouri suru koto ni shimashita
Description: Yuuri, a 30-year-old housewife who was unilaterally abandoned in marriage, suddenly gets lost in a different world. She, who was introduced to the work of potion harvesting by an S-class adventurer and gradually got used to life in a different world, realized the ridiculous secret of the harvested potion. The potion without the recovery function that she thought was off was actually soy sauce. In addition, dishes made with it have a bonus of correction function! Will Yuuri's dishes change the common sense of the other world?

Genres: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Adventure
Title: T・P Bon
Description: There exists a secret organization that has members traveling across time to save people from their wrongful deaths. Bon Namihira accidentally learn about the Time Patrol, and is recruited as an apprentice member. Together with Ream, the patroller in charge of mentoring him , Bon goes to various historical periods to rescue innocent people, trying not to alter history in the process.

Genres: Monsters, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: "Omae ga Kawari ni Shine" to Iwareta Watashi. Imouto no Migawari ni Reikoku na Henkyou Haku no Moto e Totsugi, Shiawase wo Teniireru
Description: Both my parents had only loved my sister and I had no place at home. I lived my life believing that as long as I worked hard, I would someday be loved. One day, my sister received a royal order to marry a frontier count who was rumored to be ruthless. My father, who loved my sister, said to me, "You will marry into the frontier count's territory instead. But on the way, the carriage will be attacked by demons - you will die." As planned, I was attacked by monsters, but the one who rescued me was the ruthless Count of the Frontier, a beautiful man with bright red hair and sharp golden eyes...

Genres: Horror, Mystery
Title: SCP tte Nan desu ka?
Description: A request was sent to two manga artists, M and H, from the editorial department of the Ichijinsha comic HOWL. "I would like you to create artwork based on the name (storyboard) for 'SCP,' which is popular on the internet. Additionally, I would like you to draw a manga that serves as an introduction to 'SCP." The two accepted the project, but there were many unknowns about the original name. While tilting his head in confusion, M — who is learning about SCP from H, who is knowledgeable about horror — continues to draw the manga. M will be in charge of the introduction part, and H will handle the artwork for the original name part. The most popular horror author on the web, Pear, returns to her roots. A thought-provoking horror story that will surely help you understand what SCP is once you read it.

Genres: Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
Title: LILI-MEN
Description: Succubi, a species that uses humans as seedbeds to reproduce, and humanity, which is set on the eradication of every single succubus. As the unrelenting war between these two incompatible groups wages on, a "king" who will bring about the end of the war is born. The one chosen for the role of king is...?!

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Sayounara Ryuusei, Konnichiwa Jinsei
Description: The strongest and oldest dragon who had lived through eternity allowed himself to be killed by Hero. Just as he prepared for eternal sleep, he realized himself reborn as Dran, a villager in the frontier. Working the field, hunting forest animal, and having a warm life has filled his heart with joy he never experienced in his whole dragon life. One day, when he's patrolling the forest near his village, he encountered a powerful demon army.

Genres: School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Gakuen Sousei Nekoten!
Description: Cat Paradise Yumi enrolls at Matabi Academy for one reason: with permission, you can raise your cat there. After the entrance ceremony, a monster suddenly appears, endangering her and her new friend. Given a mysterious power, Yumi and her cat Kansuke stride into battle.

Genres: Action, Supernatural
Title: Empyreal Cabinet
Description: The long-awaited series by the up-and-coming writer of the Jump+ one-shots "O no Utsuwa" (under the pen name Kyo Oribe) and "Kuga Masamune no Junan." A mystical epic drawn with stunning penmanship is about to unfold...

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kirio Fanclub
Description: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.

Genres: Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Suterare Hanayome no Saikon - Koori no Henkyou Haku wa Saiai o Chikau
Description: Chloe has just finished a five-year contract marriage, despite being abused by a hostile marquess family. Unable to decide what to do with her life after the divorce, she finds herself living with her former fiancé and childhood friend Theodore, her first love! He has become a frontier count, but he remains as kind as he ever was--and he is still the same man. Chloe has begun to be attracted to Theodore.

Genres: Reincarnation, Historical, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Hyakkakyu no Osoujigakari
Description: "You, that's His Majesty the Emperor, you know?!" "Is that more important than a steamed bun?" Yui Mei has two secrets. First, she retained the memories of her past life. Second, it is highly probable that she is a daughter of the Sai Kingdom’s Emperor. As a certified die-hard fan of Chinese dramas in her past life, she willingly participated in the court lady selection just for the sake of seeing the imperial harem in the flesh. --- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4104ev/)

Genres: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy
Title: The Banished Court Magician Aims to Become the Strongest
Description: "This party doesn't need an incompetent magician who can only use supportive magic. You're fired, Alec Yugret." Suddenly, Alec, a court magician who had joined the crown prince's party to help him conquer dungeons, was banished from the party. And not just the party, but the crown prince's harassment has banished him from the royal palace as well, and a friend from the "magic academy" approached Alec, who was at his wit's end. "Hey, Alec. Do you want to try to conquer the dungeon with us again?" And so, together with the friends he used to party with, Alec begins his second journey in life.

Genres: Action, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo, Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita
Description: "Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!" Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted. While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—!?

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: At Summer’s End
Description: Natsukawa, a member of the beautification committee, often finds her gaze lingering on her schoolmate Aihara. One fateful day off, she spots Aihara walking alongside another girl... As summer’s heat stirs the air, a delicate tale of first love begins to take shape...

Genres: Ninja, Slice of Life
Title: Ninja to Koroshiya no Futarigurashi
Description: Many fatalities?! A naive female ninja and a high school assassin live together in an unpredictable way! A naive female ninja who escapes from a ninja village meets a high school girl assassin!? Their life together, which begins by chance, is full of danger (and excitement)...!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Nikagetsugo ni Seibetsu ga Bareru Josou Danshi
Description: I enrolled in a prestigious girls academy, even though I'm actually a crossdressing boy?! But, in my class lies a secret as well...? This prestigious school, St. Aster Girls Academy, is where I am entering as a first year. Unexpectedly, I had to crossdress in order to enroll! If my roommate or classmates found out I am a guy, it would be inexcusable!

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Realist Maou ni Yoru Seiiki Naki Isekai Kaikaku
Description: In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his ‘wisdom from his past life,’ he would rule over his lands as a thorough ‘realist.’ “Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?” “Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy.” “Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?” “To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct.” “The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?” “Not bullets, shoot them with cannons.” And like that, Astaroth ‘reformed’ the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.

Genres: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Isekai Walking
