Description: Ordinary student Sora has been summoned to another world as one of seven "chosen heroes" meant to battle the Demon King. While the other six are blessed with grandiose titles and superlative stats, Sora is stuck with no title, no level, and a single, underwhelming skill: he never gets tired from walking. After being judged useless to the cause, Sora is thrown out into the streets and left to fend for himself. Nevertheless, he grows determined to turn his unjust treatment and seemingly "useless" skill into a positive by earning money, making friends, and seeing sights he's never seen before! ___ [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/isekai-walking)

Genres: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Konjiki no Word Master -Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat-
Description: In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea. However, this isn't their story. Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure. Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.

Genres: Psychological, Survival, Fantasy, Mystery
Title: Maimaimaigoen
Description: ### **Sanrio's first ever innocent suspense comic!** New teacher Okada Yuu and his senior, Ms. Rumi are on a field trip with their 16 preschool students to Sanrio Puroland. But suddenly they wander into a mysterious and horrific theme park called "Yuropia"! Amid their confusion, ominous Frog Egg mascots announce that the only way for them to escape is to "conquer the attractions and gather 10 medals." Will they be able to get out of "Yuropia" in one piece?! This is a story for "those of you" who "carry pain in your heart"―. ©2021 SANRIO CO., LTD. TOKYO, JAPANⒽ

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: The World's Fastest Level Up!
Description: It’s been 20 years since dungeons suddenly appeared in the world. Humanity got supernatural powers like Level, Status, and Skill. Dreaming of becoming rich quickly, Amane Rin, an adventurer challenged to capture dungeons. Even though he possessed a skill unique to even adventurers, Transfer within dungeon, he was deemed as incompetent because of the poor usability of the skill. However, the turning point for him came. After a year since he started capturing dungeons, Transfer within dungeon evolved with a level up. As a result, Rin became an existence unrestricted by the rules of the dungeon. Rin, who became the only singularity, continued to level up with overwhelming speed and climbed to the strongest position in the world in the blink of an eye. This is the story of a boy who was looked down upon because of his incompetence but eventually became the strongest in the world.

Genres: Action, Crime, Mafia, Video Games
Title: Minami no Teiou
Description: Centers around Ginjirou Manda, a loan shark who charges toichi — 10% more interest every 10 days, or 365% every year. Thanks to his unrelenting money-collecting tactics, he is feared as "Minami no Oni" or the "Demon" of Osaka's Minami business district.

Genres: Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Monster Girls
Title: Roro-chan wa Kahogo na Kyodai Musume
Description: (Translated from Amazon description) Paolo, a hunter who makes a living hunting monsters, sets forth into unknown lands to capture a legendary Divine Dragon... but when losing his grip while climbing a deep valley, he loses consciousness. And when he comes to, he finds himself in a bath with a legendary dragon! And she's adorable! Now kept against his will as a giant dragon girl's pet, the initially hostile boy tries to escape, but... when he sees how earnestly this giant girl takes care of her pet (him), his feelings begin to waver. Should he run, or let her keep him? A gentle giant girl and a tiny hero's fluffy, heartwarming... pet-raising comedy!?

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life
Title: Mabataki no Oto
Description: The young boy “I” becomes swallowed up by the pleasure of drawing and completing a painting, embarking on a long creative journey. Along the way, he must confront “you” who lies in the shadows. What is the true nature of “I,” that weaves between impulse and imagination?

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Video Games, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
Title: Online - The Comic
Description: Mai Yashiro (22) was an average office worker until the day a video game console arrived in her mailbox. The game she is forced to play, "Nightmare," is a dangerous game in which one risks both the lives of the ones they love and their own body!! If you refuse to play, those dear to you die. If you lose battles in the game, parts of your body (your arms or legs, your voice, etc.) cease functioning. The horror of this game spreads throughout society in a flash, and, to fight it, Mai's company creates a "Nightmare" Strategy Team. After being assigned to this team, Mai and her dependable comrades boldly rise up against this hellish game. Adapted from the super-popular novel which has received over 40,000,000 hits online!!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru
Title: Gal niPA-chan wa Semararetai
Description: The popular teen model niPA, aka Asahino Futaba, is strong willed and independent, but the plain guy who is her seatmate refuses to budge before her... "Damn that four-eyed loser, how dare he tell me off!". However, at the same time, remembering that makes her feel somehow strange. Her fingers slip beneath her skirt as if by reflex and while thinking about getting assaulted by that disgusting man, she pleasures herself against her better judgment while she is brought to climax in her fantasies!?

Genres: Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Music
Title: Dropout kara no Sai Shuushoku-saki wa, Isekai no Saikyou Kishidan deshita
Description: Violinist Masumi Todo gave up her professional career after failing in an international competition. Despite her disappointment, she is unable to give up the violin, but one day she suddenly falls down a flight of stairs and is lost in another world. In the midst of the confusion, she is accused of espionage and taken to a place where she is forced to explain herself to the Knight Commander Arc. In a situation of absolute desperation, Masumi's destiny is illuminated by a "violin" that has come to the other world with her.

Genres: Award Winning, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Iyahaya Atami-kun
Description: A handsome boy, the most handsome in his school, who is constantly receiving and rejecting girls' confessions. What they don't know is that he is in love with another boy.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Boukenka ni Narou! Skill Board de Dungeon Kouryaku
Description: Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday? Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer," winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.

Genres: Slice of Life, Supernatural
Title: Sazanamimachi to, Hazama no Ko
Description: A young woman visits a seaside town. Even though it's her first time there, everything seems strangely nostalgic. Somehow she ends up working at an empty little shop serving the local customers. But what will she discover in this strange town that carries the scent of the sea ?

Genres: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls
Title: Shounin Skill de Maoujou no Kouryaku wo Mezasu ~Isekai Tenishita no de Saikyou Item to Tookujutsu de Ikinuku to ni shita~
Description: One day, Sota, a university student, is summoned to another world! Moreover, after being summoned, he was mistaken for a hero and imprisoned in the Demon King's Castle, where he was in a desperate situation...! Sota gets through the predicament with his natural skill, but for some reason he ends up solving the embarrassing problem of Fafnir, a super beautiful demi-human...!? Win the hearts of the demi-human girls living in Demon King's Castle and aim to escape from Demon King's Castle! A fantasy romantic comedy that opens up a different world with its natural business spirit, begins!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?
Description: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition...

Genres: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Mizu Zokusei no Mahoutsukai
Description: Upon being reincarnated into a fantasy world, Ryo wants to live out his days in peace with his newfound water magic. He can only conjure a cupful at a time, but it’s enough to eke out a comfortable existence — or so he thought. The powers that be cast him into the wild outlands with nothing more than a humble shack, a single knife, some food... and abilities that are yet beyond his comprehension. The area is overrun by monsters and there’s nary another human in sight. Ryo must now figure out how to survive above all else, but he’s ready to take bulls, boars, and a whole host of other monsters by the horns if it means seizing the life he wants for himself. Each new victory brings a new challenge, but what could a fateful encounter with a headless horseman, a dragon, and a castaway swordsman have in common? They’re the first steps on a grand journey that will take Ryo beyond the borders of all he knows to become the greatest water magician the world has ever seen — one adventure at a time.

Genres: Comedy, Survival, Tragedy
Title: Ambivalent ~Doutei wo Sutetara Shinu Sekai~
Description: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!

Genres: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Bishuu Gyakuten Sekai de Chiryoushi Yattemasu
Description: One day, Towa was suddenly transferred to a new world. This world resembles a world from a novel that Towa recently read. It's been half a year since he came to this world. Towa opened a clinic as a Healer using the ability he received from the Goddess. However, the only ones who come are well-groomed, servile beauties. This is because this was a world where the value of beauty and ugliness were reversed. He is kind to everyone, no matter how ugly (beautiful in Towa's eyes), and wins the hearts of the ugly beauties in the world.

Genres: Slice of Life, Mystery
Title: Karakida-ke no Kosho Gurashi
Description: The world's largest collection of used bookstores, Kanda-Jinbōchō. There begins the story of the unforgettable days the three Karakida sisters spend surrounded by the scent of used books when they inherit the used bookstore their grandfather left behind. **Note:** Has been on hiatus since October 2024 due to author Toume Kei's health. ([Announcement](https://x.com/gj_karakida/status/1846204960293507390)) ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://twitter.com/gj_karakida)

Genres: Traditional Games, Drama
Title: Legend of the End-of-Century's Gambling Wolf Saga
Description: In the world, there is a gambler here named Saga.

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy
Title: Boku de Mitashite
Description: Noah, a wolf with no family, was banished from his beloved pack after presenting as an Omega. While wandering alone in a village of herbivores, he meets Henri, a rabbit who lives alone with his little brothers. In a town where carnivores are feared, Henri bravely takes Noah in and offers him a job. When Noah accidentally goes into heat, it suddenly awakens Henri's Alpha instincts. Will a world divided between carnivores and herbivores accept the relationship between a little Alpha rabbit and a big Omega wolf?

Genres: Psychological, Drama
Title: Sonna Kazoku nara Sutechaeba?
Description: "My wife made a rule for our home: 'Don't talk to Dad.'" "Isn't that domestic violence? Weren't you sending me an SOS for help?" Reitarou Shinotani has been long ignored by his wife and daughter, left all alone, and forced to do nothing but eat and sleep in a small, dark, cramped room in the house. What fate awaits him, as he aims to revitalize his family...?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
Title: Hana to Gin
Description: Four years ago, Souda Gin and Hanai Kosuke worked a case together as two anti-organized crime police officers. Now they’ve both quit the force, Gin to become a private detective and Hanai to become a yakuza! A heartwarming romantic comedy unfolds in a retro cityscape!

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
Title: Ashita, Watashi wa Dareka no Kanojo
Description: A bitter love story depicting the realities of love between female college students who earn money by renting themselves out to men as their girlfriends.

Genres: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Listener ni Damasarete Dungeon no Sai Kasou kara Dasshutsu RTA suru Koto ni Natta
Description: A dungeon explorer, or dungeon tuber, is a person who explores dungeons while streaming. On his first day of broadcasting, a rookie dungeon tuber, Sekai Kotoba, is accidentally transported to the lowest level of the dungeon, which he has not yet explored. The bottom level is a sea of lava, and he is suddenly doomed! He is level 2, his skills are non-combat related, and he has no knowledge of dungeons. The only people he can rely on are the listeners on the feed! Aim for the upper levels by relying on the comments!

Genres: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Iki Okure Seijo no Shiawase
Description: “Huh? You’re already 27 years old”. The Saint Marialite’s engagement with the crown prince was called off because of her age! Due to various circumstances, the level-headed Marialite acknowledges this and returns to her hometown. However, she encounters a child raised in secret…? What's more, after growing up in a short amount of time, he falls for Marialite, and wants to take her back to his own country! A romantic fantasy story about a level-headed saint who gets dumped for being in her late twenties and ends up living with the demon prince instead! The adored fantasy's long awaited serialization! --- **Adapted From:** [Light Novel (Official English)](https://www.crossinfworld.com/The-Saints-Belated-Happiness-Newly-Single-Now-Living-with-the-Demon-Prince.html) **Promotional Video:** [行き遅れ聖女の幸せ PV](https://youtu.be/qjDjuDng6j8?si=onbw8A62tvnJ6Bb-)

Genres: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Kaijuu no Hanataba
Description: New life love with a quirky guy she met at the share house she moved into, and the cohabitation romance begins....

Genres: Sports, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Bukuro Kicks
Description: The setting is Tokyo. Rumors are going around Tokyo of a prize of ten million for beating "Gyokutei Shinjuku" at blind soccer, and blind soccer experiences a sudden surge. Meanwhile, not far away in Ikebukuro, a South Korean girl named Ji-he recruits members for a blind soccer team. And one day, while working at a cabaret club, a blind young man named Oyamada comes in. Despite never playing blind soccer before, Oyamada is somewhat forcefully dragged into the team to fill out the numbers. However, this man actually is...

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: Cuddle: Juujin Omegaverse
Description: For the sake of those we love, we take turns to lie Beryl, an omega who lost his husband and was burdened with debt, decides to have an arranged marriage with an aristocratic Alpha in order to protect the house of his memories. However, the beautiful beastman Shia appears and sets out conditions for him to take his turn. To enter the same school, to become a servant, And - good physical compatibility. Shia is arrogant and throws Beryl around, but he also has to protect him. There's a reason... Also includes twin brother Hugo x servant Theo!

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Koushaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta node, Mental Otome na Ore wa, Zenryoku de Onnanoko wo Tanoshimimasu
Description: A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists! He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll. As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily. And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest! What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love
Title: Imitation Play
Description: Nagisa, who is the bar owner, has unrequited feelings for his junior at work, Yuuma. To him, I’m nothing more than an “admired senior”. Nagisa hides his feelings by sleeping around with strangers. However, while he was meeting up with his partner, he was caught by Yuuma. If he is going to end his one-sided feeling, he wanted to make Yuuma feel disillusioned. “I’ll be your sex partner from now on” They come to an agreement with each other and Nagisa is stuck in a predicament that leaves him tattered and torn deep down… A charming younger bartender and a strong, beautiful shopkeeper who is clumsy in love. A mild, sweet and emotional love story that will keep you twisting and turning the love that you’ve been keeping deep down in your heart.

Genres: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy
Title: Souzoushu nano de Motto Yasashikute Kudasai!
Description: Tohru Jin is a middle-management employee who has lost his place in a game company. He died in an unfortunate accident, and when he woke, he found himself in the world of a game he had once designed. Now reincarnated as a little girl in "Rune Fantasia". He should be able to live a cheat-like life in this isekai… right? --- **Note:** The author announced on May 17, 2021 that the manga will be completed with the 7th chapter [[Twitter](https://twitter.com/boarinoshishi/status/1394146695856869380) ([archive.org](https://web.archive.org/web/20210517042441/https://twitter.com/boarinoshishi/status/1394146695856869380))].

Genres: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Mujikaku na Tensai Shoujo wa Kizukanai
Description: She is a genius in all fields of magic, swordsmanship, alchemy, domestic affairs, music, painting, and novels?! She was able to do anything. However, she always tried not to be selfish, and decided to run away from home...! She is now an adventurer in a new world due to a chance encounter. Liliane unknowingly demonstrates all her talents...?! --- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3032hc)

Genres: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
Title: Kimi no Koto Tabeteii?
Description: I eat the same things at the same time. Your protagonist Omi Sorasaki is a high school student who's a devotee to the ordinary. But one day, a mysterious and beautiful girl transfers over and says to him "I have something to say to you alone after school." Omi's in a panic wondering "am I getting a confession?" as the things she has to say are… … and what happens after is only just the first wave of an assault on all that is ordinary! Thrust into an unusual world, a forbidden and "predacious" love comedy begins!

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
Title: Zaijian no Yoake Made
Description: Akio Fujisawa was a quiet loner—obviously the total opposite of the sociable and confident Tingyu, a Chinese exchange student who joined his class. But when Tingyu revealed the insecurities behind that confident exterior, a friendship started to blossom. Fast-forward to years after graduation, and that friendship is still going strong. Tingyu’s frequent visits to Japan keep their connection alive, all while Akio harbours some more-than-friendly feelings...

Genres: Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Music, Full Color
Title: Himitsu no AiPri Full Color Osarai 4-Koma
Description: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
Title: Ai da nante Iwanai kara
Description: Unexpectedly, he crossed paths with his old high school friend, Yachiyo, during his grandmother's funeral. It had been two long years since they last saw each other, right after Yachiyo's wedding. Their friendship had become distant due to a past incident in high school. "At that moment, I failed to comprehend the significance of it all, and by the time I did, it was already too late—a haunting memory. The emotions that I believed I had let go of resurfaced, engulfing me as we crossed paths once more..."

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
Title: Kimi wa 008
Description: Akashi Eito has failed miserably on all high school admissions exams but somehow, he receives a letter of acceptance from a school he does not remember applying for. He nevertheless happily enrolls, expecting to live the ideal school life, but his aspiration are quickly destroyed as he discovers that this mysterious school is a training institution for secret agents! Immediately, Eito wants to return home and live a normal life with his normal family, until the director of the school makes a shocking revelation: Eito's deceased father was also a secret agent! He subsequently wants to know more about the past and memories of his father, so he decides to stay in this school. However, as a student of this institution, Eito will have to face a deadly exam made to test the skills of all new students… Follow this story of action and espionage, in which our hero, who lacks physical strength, compensates for it with great bravery, and captivates everyone around him with the power of his courage and friendship!!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Mukiryoku Neet na Moto Shindou, Boukensha ni naru
Description: Ilvis is a genius boy who has been called a prodigy from an early age. However, his motto is "I don't want to work"! After graduating from school, he was living his long-cherished NEET life, but one day, his sister Arisa finally told him, "If you don't work, you will be kicked out of the house." Ilvis aims to be an adventurer in search of a free way of working!? A misunderstanding warrior tale by an unconscious former cheat prodigy!

Genres: Fantasy, Supernatural
Title: The Shop With No Name
Description: In a deserted alley travelled by few, is an antique shop. It has no sign, no name. It sells the usual items, but if you believe the rumors, this particular shop also sells undisclosed wish-granting items—for a price, of course. And buyers who fail to follow an item's directions for use will pay an especially high price.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.
Description: Lloyd, the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby, has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country’s joke. Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It’s become too much of a despairing environment that he’s come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather. The mage, who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easygoing life!

Genres: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Arafoo Kenja no Isekai Seikatsu Nikki
Description: Satoshi Osako, a 40-year-old man, had become addicted to a virtual reality role-playing game and rose to become a top player. Tragically, a fatal accident during a login session abruptly ended his life. But this was not the real end for him, as he found himself reborn in a world brimming with swords, magic, and monsters! To his surprise, he retained the skills and abilities from his previous life's gaming experience. His life takes an unexpected turn when he is tasked with tutoring a young girl. Delve into the diary of a sage residing in this fantastical realm, where his guiding principle is "Peace and tranquility every day."

Genres: Demons, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
Title: Maou Reijou no Shikkousha
Description: "From now on, you will become the butler of the Demon King’s Castle and live for me!" Ryuto, a young boy who was summoned to another world, but was abandoned due to his incompetence. The one who took his hand was the Demon King’s only daughter, Lurunoa. That encounter turns everything upside down. Three demon princesses with great hidden powers and secrets. When the mysteries of the continent are revealed, the boy becomes the world’s trump card!

Genres: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable
Description: A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.

Genres: Slice of Life
Title: Walking
Description: Through the ordinary small events of his professional and personal life, a forty-year-old man lets himself go on impromptu escapades at random along the paths that the big city offers. This vagrant impulse soon takes on the appearance of a sentimental journey, punctuated by images of the walker's youth.

Genres: Reincarnation, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Ouji, "Auto Craft" Skill de Ryouchi o Bakusoku de Kaitakushi Saikyou no Mura o Tsukutte Shimau
Description: Third Prince Theodulf has been banished to a wasteland known as the Land of Death because he didn’t receive a gift from the Goddess. It’s a barren land where the air is so noxious, nothing can grow there. Surviving there is impossible…or so everyone thought! As it turns out, Theodulf is a reincarnated being and has received a power known as “Auto-Craft” from the Goddess. Using this powerful gift to automatically create everything, the prince proceeds to turn the Land of Death into one brimming with life!! (Source: K Manga)

Genres: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Sekai de Tada Hitori no Mamonotsukai: Tenshoku shitara Maou ni Machigawaremashita
Description: After searching for a long time, Noah finally found the [Divine Job Tome]. With it, he just might be able to get away from his current Divine Job [Hero] and its responsibility! Or so he thought. Because the new job that had been granted to him, [Monster Tamer] was completely unheard of…!?

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
Title: BL Drama no Shuen ni Narimashita
Description: A popular BL manga is going to be adapted into a live-action drama. The double lead roles will be played by Aoyanagi Hajime, a talented actor who used to be a successful child actor but is not so successful anymore and Akafuji Yuuichirou, a popular and handsome actor. Aoyagi has a hard time with Akafuji who has an unfriendly attitude, but on the other hand Akafuji has too much love for Aoyagi... Will the two stars succeed in their BL drama?

Genres: Historical, Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Samurai, Gore, Horror, Supernatural
Title: Ghost Story: Snow Woman
Description: Six classic chilling stories populated with yokai, ghosts and demons. A work that enchants with aesthetic refinement and imaginative suggestion. Inspired by Lafcadio Hearn's celebrated Kwaidan: Stories and Studies of Strange Things (1904) and other famous legends from Japanese mythology such as the fascinating and frightening Snow Woman. An unforgettable journey into the mysterious Japanese spectral realm.

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love
Title: Love your love enemy
Description: “I hate him, but I want this face all to myself!” Yousuke and Daichi, students at the same university, are romantic rivals for Mitsuru. However, as a result of a stratagem of Mitsuru’s, they get locked in a room and can’t leave until they have sex! The two love rivals. Yosuke kisses Daichi in an attempt to tease him, but to his surprise, Daichi has such a sexy reaction…!?

Genres: Romance, Harem, Drama, School Life
Title: GE ~Good Ending~
Description: Utsumi is your everyday student. He is also a boy that has always had a strong sense of what is right in the world. With nothing but innocence and a mind that longs for his "significant other," Utsumi takes on one of the toughest subjects: love. With the help of the devious and mysterious Kurokawa Yuki, will Utsumi learn how to be fortunate in the game of love? Only through the ups and downs of real life, and the assistance of his friends, will Utsumi be able to take a bite out of life and learn just what love is. - Alternative English: [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/ge-good-ending)

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
Title: Osananajimi Kanojo no Morahara ga Hidoin de Zetsuen Sengen shite Yatta
Description: My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true, right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I can’t take it anymore. So I’m left with no choice, I’m going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity, it’s the only option. And thus, the story of my break up begins…

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Mafia
Title: My Crazy Boyfriend
Description: “Please be my friend.” Suzu, a young man searching for his missing brother, gets tangled up with Yakuza, but ends up being saved by Hana, a mysterious and beautiful boy. Suzu works with Hana to find his younger brother, but he almost gets drawn to the innocent looking Hana… Is this friendship? Obsession? Or maybe… love? A pure and dangerous crime love story between a clumsy young man and a handsome yakuza boy!

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Maigo no Onnanoko o Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita
Description: One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! "As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!

Genres: Romance, Drama, School Life
Title: Dramatic Irony
Description: Can you give me a happy ending? Komatsu Risa is in love with her childhood friend, Sano Chihiro. Although they have a very close relationship, and are often mistaken for a couple, Chihiro is unaware of how Risa feels and accepts a confession from another girl… Heartbroken about her first love, she confides in her seemingly indifferent homeroom teacher, Natsuo.

Genres: Time Travel, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: From the Dust
Description: Hajime leads an unremarkable life as an undertaker, but he likes his job and has no reason to complain. Nor can he complain of being always called "onii-san" by one of the top star actresses in the country, Kidō Kotone, a childhood friend. Their relationship has always had a touch of awkwardness due to the parents of both having died violent deaths, but nothing could have prepared Hajime - or Japan - to the deed Kotone decides to perpetrate seemingly out of the blue.

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
Title: Wakaranai Desu Yoshida-san
Description: Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student. As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual, a solitary beautiful woman, Mao Yoshida, who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess," passes by. While the boys are in an uproar, Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone, Yoshida presses against him. In fact, Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship... However, he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless, and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life, unable to go from "friend" to "lover".

Genres: Romance, Comedy, Drama
Title: Rakujitsu no Pathos
Description: What happens when next door to upcoming mangaka Fujiwara moves Yuuki, who was his teacher back in high school and first crush? Yuuki, now a married woman, is starting a new life in the city, however her husband is always away on business trips. She finds comfort in the company of her former student, but what she doesn't realize is that Fujiwara can listen to everything happening in her apartment through the building's thin walls…

Genres: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life
Title: Shihai Shoujo Kubaru-chan
Description: After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”. Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.

Genres: Action, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Vampires, Slice of Life, Adaptation
Title: Mori de Seijo wo Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime ~Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!~
Description: The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today. The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?! After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption. Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection. One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath! The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means! A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection! ___ **Character Designer:** [Yoshimoto](https://mangadex.org/author/212b80e5-09a9-47ea-8da0-9064f16815fb)

Genres: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Gore, Police, Mystery, Adaptation
Title: Murdist: Shikeishuu Kazami Tazuru
Description: Tazuru Kazami is a death row inmate who murdered 89 people in just a few years. With her murders gaining a reputation as beautiful "art," the number of copycat crimes has recently skyrocketed and become a social problem. In the midst of this, the imprisoned Kazami offers to hand over information about the copycats on the condition that she speak to a certain someone. The young man she chooses is a run-of-the-mill college student.

Genres: Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
Title: Bambino! Secondo
Description: Shogo Ban is now a chef at Ristorante Legare. As the Yokohama branch of the Trattoria Baccanale he used to work at, he has been entrusted with the responsibility of head of the pasta section. Rejoin Ban as he struggles to meet the expectations of work and develop his personal relationships.

Genres: Adventure, Drama
Title: K
Description: K is the name of a mysterious mountaineer who routinely exposes himself to mortal danger in order to complete miraculous one-man mountain search and rescue missions for lost expeditions. Although he conquers the world’s tallest mountains, he himself is of unknown origin—hearsay has it that he is of Japanese descendance. His extraordinary skillset as a rock and ice climber have singlehandedly turned him not only into a legend among local tribes of the Himalaya mountain range but also a highly sought-after lifesaver—even when it comes to the most desperate of situations where other ascensionists have already given up all hope. Regardless, K is not in it for the money. He perceives of mountains as both an opportunity for personal growth and a way of strengthening his bond with mother nature herself, utilizing the lessons learned from regional mountain folk and by observing animal behaviour to solve the increasingly more difficult challenges thrown at him by the eight-thousanders. Equipped with this adventure-packed drama as your mountain guide, your spirit shall be elevated to the height of manga—and beyond.

Genres: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
Title: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki: Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowai Sugirundaga
Description: Haruyoshi Kuga’s power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars! He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can’t use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn’t need to. Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! --- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)

Genres: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy
Title: Long Live the King
Description: An ordinary student accidentally traveled into another universe and became the king of a small kingdom. He had gotten a “Cheating Code” of life and was able to complete something extraordinary. This is the story about a king that was able to conquer continents and leave behind him an ultimate legend that will be recited between every generation to come. The MC also travels to the world of Diablo 2, but it seemed a bit too real to be just a video game. People in that world are living their life, death permeates. There are evil machinations at play here. To find out why he was sent to this world, look as he unravels the secrets in the story.

Genres: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
Title: Full Clearing Another World under a Goddess with Zero Believers
Description: After his class gets buried alive on their way back from a school trip, 18 year old Makoto Takatsuki and class get transported to another world. Unlike the rest of his classmates who gained powerful abilities, Makoto barely gains any power. "This other world is unbalanced!". With the threat of a great Demon Lord rising again and a goddess with zero followers, can Makoto make his way through this new world and clear the isekai!?

Genres: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
Title: Koboreru Ambivalence
Description: Wataru, a 3rd year student, has to do the cleaning at school in order to get enough credits to graduate. His partner in cleaning is Yugo, a 1st year student who tends to be absent at school. Yugo's arrogant attitude piques Wataru's interest since he sees in Yugo his childhood friend and, as a result, Wataru feels it's his duty to take care of him. But Yugo hides a secret...

Genres: Historical, Romance, Drama, Tragedy
Title: Boukansha no Koi
Description: "I want to be by my sister's side until the last moment..." In the fall of her twenties, Rachel married her childhood friend Noah, who had been her longtime crush. She knows that the person Noah really loves is Alicia, his older sister and Rachel's best friend... Noah and Rachel live a married life full of deceit while Alicia has only a short time left to live. Rachel feels as much guilt and heartache as she does happiness, but who is the real 'bystander' in this love? The long-awaited first volume of the comic adaptation of the pinnacle of "a fake marriage of unrequited love" that wrenches the heart with hidden love, irreplaceable friendship, and the sadness of passing each other!

Genres: Romance, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
Title: Girl Crush
Description: Momose Tenka is a first year high school student who can sing, dance, and has a killer body. She's good at everything… except love. She meets a K-pop obsessed girl named Satou Erian, and is dazzled by her earnest nature. This is the story of two young girls dreaming of becoming K-pop idols! A heart-throbbing story about pure love! *Serialized in [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000965) (by Line Digital Frontier) and [Comic Nicola](https://ebook.shinchosha.co.jp/book/F914001/) (by Shinchosha), follow latest news & updates at the [Official Twitter Account](https://twitter.com/girlcrush_comic)* NB: The LINE link is not broken, but Region Locked.

Genres: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery
Title: Shoukan Suru Sekai
Description: A brand-new series from the creator of *Blood Lad!* When creatures, items, and even space itself can be summoned from other worlds, no one should want for anything…right? Tokoyo, a boy who was abandoned to live with the Summoned in the Fantasy District aims to become a summoner to help all his Summoned friends. When he arrives in Tokyo to attend the Summoning Academy, he’s told he’ll never make it by the first summoner he meets! Tokoyo realizes he has a lot left to learn…and finds a new dream: to become the bridge between humanity and the Summoned! - [Official English by Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/the-world-of-summoning/)

Genres: Thriller, Reincarnation, Historical, Monsters, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
Title: Gantz: E
Description: The manga's story begins when a peasant named Hanbē asks a girl named O-haru for her hand in marriage, but O-haru confesses that she is already thinking of another man named Masakichi from a neighboring village. When Hanbē seeks out Masakichi, he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it, despite being a peasant.
